

<pb n="1"/>

2
<head>siri-vaddha māṇasūri- viraiyaṁ<lb/>
jugāijiṇiṁda-cariyaṁ<lb/>
( siri-risahanāhacariyaṁ )</head>
<lg n="1">
  <l>namaha' jugāijiṇidaṁ purisōttimanābhisaṁbhavaṁ payaḍaṁ</l>
  <l>varanāṇa- daṁsaṇa- raviṁ sugayamaṇaṁtaṁ mahādēvaṁ</l>
</lg>
<lg n="2">
  <l>ēgamaṇēgasarūvaṁ dullakkhaṁ paramajōgi paccakkhaṁ</l>
  <l>avvayamasaṁkhamakkhayamōsappiṇipaḍhamatitthayaraṁ</l>
</lg>
<lg n="3">
  <l>saṁkuddha - sakka - vikkhitta ditta daṁbhōli-dahaṇa bhayabhīō</l>
  <l>saraṇaṁ saraṇaṁ ti tumaṁ bhagavaṁ ! maha hōha jaṁpatō</l>
</lg>
<lg n="4">
  <l>jassa bhuvaṇēkkaguruṇō payaṁtaraṁ pāviūṇa asuriṁdō</l>
  <l>sakkāō vi na saṁkai sō saraṇaṁ maha mahāvīrō</l>
</lg>
<lg n="5">
  <l>ajiyāī jayapayaḍē arihaṁtē paramapūyamarihaṁtē</l>
  <l>arahaṁtē aruhaṁtē namāmi siripāsanāhaṁtē</l>
</lg>
<lg n="6">
  <l>suya-sāyara-pāragayaṁ bharaha - suyaṁ risahagaṇaharaṁ paḍhamaṁ</l>
  <l>viyasiya- puṁḍariya-muhaṁ puṁḍariyaṁ gaṇaharaṁ vaṁdē</l>
</lg>
<lg n="7">
  <l>khaṁtimaṁ vijiyakhaṁ dakkhaṁ kiriyāsu mōkkhagayalakkhaṁ</l>
  <l>vīrassa paḍhamasīsaṁ gōyamagaṇahāriṇaṁ namimō</l>
</lg>
<lg n="8">
  <l>jāō ajōggayassa vi jāṇa pasāēṇa majjha guṇajōgō</l>
  <l>tāṇamaṇaṁta-guṇāṇaṁ guruṇa paya-paṁkayaṁ sarimō</l>
</lg>
<lg n="9">
  <l>aṇṇēya mahākaiṇō varamuṇiṇō jē ya kē vi iha guṇiṇō</l>
  <l>kali-kayavara - kamalasamā jayaṁtu tē piṁḍiyā 3 savvē</l>
</lg>
<lg n="10">
  <l>ēgēṇa vāma- hatthēṇa pōtthayaṁ bīyaēṇa maṇiyāli</l>
  <l>taiēṇa 4 dāhiṇēṇaṁ karēṇa kamalaṁ dharēmāṇī</l>
</lg>
<lg n="11">
  <l>saralaṁguli -vivara - viṇissaraṁtalāyanna-jala pavāhēṇaṁ</l>
  <l>turiēṇa tihuyaṇassa vi varappayāṇaṁ karēmāṇī</l>
</lg>
<lg n="12">
  <l>viyasi vara kamalagayā siya-vasaṇā kuṁda- kaliya- sama-dasaṇā</l>
  <l>kaviyaṇa-muhakayavāsā sarassaī jayai supayāsā</l>
</lg>
<lg n="13">
  <l>asḍhayanayaṇāṇaṁdō nivvaviyāsēsa mahiyalābhōgō</l>
  <l>sāraya-sasi vva suhaō jaya-payaḍō sajjaṇō jayai</l>
</lg>
<lg n="14">
  <l>amuṇiyaguṇaparimāṇō gayaṇābhōgō vva nimmala-sahāvō</l>
  <l>jō khaṁḍiō vi na muyai niyapayaī caṁdaṇa - taru</l>
</lg>
<lg n="15">
  <l>lēi guṇē cciya, dōsē dūraṁ pariharai kavvamajjhāō</l>
  <l>dhayaraṭṭhō viva suyaṇō mōttūṇa payaṁ payaṁ piyai</l>
</lg>
<lg n="16">
  <l>dōsamalipi kavvaṁ suyaṇē paḍiyaṁ sunimmalaṁ hōi</l>
  <l>maliṇō vi ki kuraṁgō na sahai sasi-maṁḍalārūḍhō ?</l>
</lg>
<lg n="17">
  <l>samalaṁ pisuddha hiyayā dasadisi - pasaratanimmala-payāvā</l>
  <l>vimalaṁ kuṇaṁti kavvaṁ bhuvaṇaṁ dinanāha-kiraṇō vva</l>
</lg>
<lg n="18">
  <l>tē viralā jē guṇiṇō guṇarāgō jāṇa tē vi iha viralā</l>
  <l>na guṇī na ya guṇarāgī na maccharī tē vidullabhā</l>
</lg>
jē guṇarahiyā guṇapakkhavāya vimahā muhā vi macchariṇō । baṁbhaṁḍa-maṁḍalaṁ pihū na pahuppai tāṇa purisāṇa॥19 ॥ 
<lg n="20">
  <l>khaṁḍē kalāvaṁtaṁ duṭumuhō mittamaṁḍalaṁ duhai"</l>
  <l>na gaṇai guruṁ pi pisuṇō tamō vva guṇamaccharī pāvō</l>
</lg>
<lg n="21">
  <l>dahṇō dahai sarīraṁ laggō aṁgēsu na uṇa dūraṭhiō</l>
  <l>pisuṇō puṇa dūratthō vi dahai dēhaṁ na saṁdēhō</l>
</lg>
<lg n="22">
  <l>dujjaṇa- duvvayaṇa-mahāhisaṁkiō bhamai sajjaṇō niccaṁ</l>
  <l>jaṁ parachiddaggāhī gharē gharē saṁti pisuṇāhī</l>
</lg>

<lg n="27">
  <l>laṭṭhīē pīliō vi hu kusaēṇa samāhaō vimuha-mūlē</l>
  <l>taha vikhalōna vi mēllai khalattaṇaṁ kaḍuyabhāvaṁ ca</l>
</lg>
<lg n="28">
  <l>avagaṇṇiōvi na muyai maggaṁ' ḍaṁḍāhaō vi nō ṭhāi</l>
  <l>pisuṇō sayā bhasaṁtō uvvēyaṁ kuṇai kavilō vva</l>
</lg>
<lg n="29">
  <l>aṇadiṭṭha- dōsa-pajjaliya- hiyaya-dhūmaṁdhayāra- khala- vayaṇē</l>
  <l>caṁda- kiraṇa vva dhavalā kaiṇō rēhaṁti guṇanivahā</l>
</lg>
<lg n="30">
  <l>ahavā (na) cēva niṁdā kāyavvā dujjaṇāṇa vi jaṇāṇaṁ</l>
  <l>garuyāṇa ēsa maggō dhamma kahāē visēsēṇaṁ</l>
</lg>
sā puṇa kahā duvihā -- purisapahāṇā itthipahāṇā ya । tattha purisapahāṇā harivaṁsāi, itthipahāṇā taraṁgavaīyāi । 
ēkkkā puṇō tivihā- atyapaḍibaddhā, kāmapaḍibaddhā, dhammapaḍibaddhā ya । tattha jīsē avahatthiyā - sēsapurisatyō atyō
cēva kēvalō salahijjai -- jahā : atthavaṁtassa aṁguṇā' vi guṇā, asajjaṇā vi sajjaṇā, apaḍhiē vi paṁḍiyattaṇaṁ, kurūttaṇē
vi surūyattaṇaṁ, thērattaṇē vi taruṇattaṇaṁ, aditassa vi vallahattaṇaṁ । avi ya---
dhaṇavaṁtahaṁ suhi sayaṇa huṁti jaṇu āṇa-paḍicchau । kajjakāli sayamēva lōu tasu hōi biijjau॥
5
rāvala dēulu gaṇai bhai ēhi īsarapaisari, dālidiya mana saṁdhi ṭhāu tuhuṁ bāhari' nīsari॥31॥
<lg n="32">
  <l>jāī kulaṁ kalāō rūvaṁ viṣṇāṇa nāṇasaṁbaṁdhō</l>
  <l>atthēṇa viṇā savvē vi guṇagaṇā tiṇasamā huti</l>
</lg>

māyā bhāyā bhajjā suhi sayaṇa-suō na uṇa aṇṇō॥33॥
sabvō vi jaṇō bahumannai, aō atthō cēva pahāṇapurisatthōṁ,
jīsē puṇa itthi - purisāṇa siṁgārāgāra - hāva-bhāva bibbōya - vilāsā kāmasatthapaḍibaddhā pahāṇataṇēṇa paruvijjati । 
tadyathā--
<lg n="34">
  <l>priyā darśanamēvāstu kimanyairdarśanāntaraiḥ</l>
  <l>prāpyatē yēna nirvāṇaṁ sarāgēṇāpi cētasā</l>
</lg>
<lg n="35">
  <l>jai natthi tattha sīmaṁtiṇīō maṇaharapiyaṁguvaṇṇāō</l>
  <l>tā rē siddhatiya ! baṁdhaṇaṁ ti mōkkhō na sō mōkkhō</l>
</lg>
ran anukūla gharighariṇī, annu lōi jasa paḍahara bajjai । ētthu samappaṛa mōkkha-suhu, mōkkha sukkhu kiṁ kavalihi khajjai ?॥
<lg n="37">
  <l>vēraggamaṇusaraṁtā jai nidaṁ liti litu varamuṇiṇō</l>
  <l>hiyaē puṇa tāṇa vi abhiramaṁti taruṇīyaṇa - vilāsā</l>
</lg>
ēvamāi jatthōvadaṁsijjai sā kāmakahā । 
jatya purṇa hiṁsā liya- cōrikka paradārapariggaha parihāra-parama-saṁdhi' baṁdhaṇō suvivēya kaṇṇadhārō, saṁvara ṭhaiya-
chiddō, sacca-sōya- siyavaḍō, jiṇa nijjāmayāhiṭṭiō, saṁsāra - samudda- nimajjata-jaṁtu nitthāraṇa' samattha-parama- pōya-samāṇō,
sayala-jaya-jīva-dayālaṁkiō, dukkhiya-jaṇa-jaṇaṇi- sannihō, sayala-kallāṇa-kāraṇaṁ, saggāpavagga-saṁsaggi-nibaṁdhaṇō, asēsa-
duha-dāru- dahaṇa - dāvānalō, gōyamāi - parama-purisa nisēviō kamma vāhi-mahōsahi samāṇō । avi ya-
- ।

kāma kāraṇa dukkhanivāraṇu, sōkkhaha mūla bhavaṇṇavatāraṇa । chaṁḍivi sēsu savvu jagasārau, jaṇa sēvijjau dhammu bharāḍau । 38 । 
dhamma atthu hōi hiyaicchau, dhammiṇa labbhai jaṁ maṇavaṁchiu । dhammavihūṇa u" bhavibhavi dutthiu, dhammiṇa jīvu" hōi
parasutthiu॥39॥
ēvaṁ dhammō cēva kēvalō jattha pasaṁsijjai sā dhamma kahā । 
sōyārā vi yativihā -- atthatthiyā, kāmatthiyā, viralaviralā dhammatthiyā । phalaṁ puṇa attha- kāmakahāṇaṁ caugai-
saṁsārapariyaṭṭaṇaṁ, aō tapparihārēṇa appaparōvayāriṇī sayā sappurisasēviyā dhammakā cēva kahēyavvā । sā puṇa parisāē । 
parisā vi duvihā uvaṭṭiyā ya aṇuvaṭṭiyā ya । uvaṭṭiyāē kahēyavvā, na uṇa iyarāē । jaō bhaṇiyaṁ--

  <l>vicchāyaṁ hōi muhaṁ vijjhāyariṁga dhamaṁtassa</l>

<pb n="3"/>

siririsahanāhassa dhanasatthavāha-bhavō

<lg n="41">
  <l>pallava mēttaggāhī nāṇalavēṇāvi uttaṇō bhamai</l>
  <l>ginhai na aṇṇa bhaṇiyaṁ duviyaḍḍhō vajjaṇijjō u</l>
</lg>
<lg n="42">
  <l>duhaṁ puṇa parisāṇaṁ uvadviyāṇaṁ buhēṇa agilāē</l>
  <l>saṁsāra- dukkha dalaṇī dhammakahā hōi kāyavvā</l>
</lg>
<lg n="43">
  <l>alamittha vittharēṇaṁ kallāṇayapaṁcarayaṇacicaiyaṁ</l>
  <l>paṁcāhigārabaddhaṁ sui- suha-jaṇayaṁ maṇabhirāmaṁ</l>
</lg>
<lg n="44">
  <l>pūṇṇaṁ paraṁ pavittaṁ kallāṇaṁ maṁgalaṁ sivaṁ dhaṇṇaṁ</l>
  <l>vimalaṁ vimaliyabhavvaṁ jayajīvāsāsayaṁ suhayaṁ</l>
</lg>
<lg n="45">
  <l>maha - nijjharāō jhariyaṁ cariyaṁ pāēṇa risahanāhassa</l>
  <l>kannaṁjalīhiṁ pijjau jalaṁ va sai sajjaṇajaṇēṇa</l>
</lg>
siririsahanāhassa dhanasatthavāhāibhavā-
m
atthi ihēva jaṁbuddīvē dīvē avaravidēhē vāsē sayalamahīmaṁḍalamaṁḍaṇaṁ, uvahasiyasurapuraṁ niyasamiddhīē, suvibhatta-tiya-
cakka caccaraṁ, suppavaṁciyavicittanaravai-pahaṁ, niyasōhāviṇijjiyasaggaṁ, visāla- vivaṇi maggaṁ, gayaṇagga- lagga-dhavala-visāla-
sālōvasōhiyaṁ, pāyālōpara-gaṁbhīra-bhīma parihā-parigayaṁ nimmala maṇimaya pāsāya- sihara pasaraṁta kara samūha-dūrōsāriyagahagaṇa-
tēyappasaraṁ, tiyasavai- sahāmaṁḍavaṁ va vibuhā hiṭṭiyaṁ sugayāṇugayaṁ ca mayalaṁchaṇamaṁḍalaṁ va ānaṁdiyaṁjaṇaṁ jayapāyaḍaṁ ca,
sālāhagāhākō sasatthaṁ va sarasajaṇa manōharaṁ sālaṁkāraṁ ca sugayavayaṇaṁ va karuṇāṇugayaṁ dhammakittisaṇāhaṁ ca, dasarahabhavaṇaṁ
va rāmāṇurāyaraṁjiyaṁ lakkhaṇāṇugayaṁ ca ahivaisarūvaṁ va mahābhōgasāraṁ suppaiṭṭiyadharaṇimaṁḍalaṁ va khiipaiṭṭiyaṁ nāma nayaraṁ । 
<lg n="46">
  <l>ēkkō cciya para dōsō aha tammi purammi guṇasamiddhammi</l>
  <l>jaṁ vasai sayākālaṁ paradukkhē dukkhaō lōō</l>
</lg>
<lg n="47">
  <l>tatyatthi vijayapaḍivakkha pakkha-saṁgijjamāṇaguṇa-niyarō</l>
  <l>nāmēṇa amarasēṇō rāyā jayapāyaḍapayāvō</l>
</lg>
,
tattha ṇaṁ nayarē ēkkō vi bahupariyaṇāṇugaō, niggayaguṇō vi bahuguṇālaṁkiō, paramahēlāsattō vi apāradāriō,
atilōyaṇō vi saṁkarō, dūruṇṇaō vi guruyaṇapaṇaō, amayalaṁchaṇō vi caṁdajasō; tahā jalanihī guṇarayaṇāṇaṁ, kulabhavaṇaṁ
sayalasaṁpayāṇaṁ, kappapāyavō sayaṇajaṇa sauṇāṇaṁ, kulasēlō kittisariyāṇaṁ, kusalō sayala - lōyavavahārāṇaṁ, viyakkhaṇō dēsa-
kālakāyavvāṇaṁ, vajjapaṁjaraṁ saraṇāgayajaṇāṇaṁ; jassa ṇaṁ aṇavarayadēva -guru- dīna-duhiyaniyadavvaviyaraṇēṇaṁ riddhīṇaṁ sahalattaṇaṁ,
sayala-jaṇasamucipatthasaṁpayāṇēṇa jasavitthāraṁ, viṇayārihaviṇaya karaṇēṇa mahākulasaṁbhavaṁ, sarīragayasirivacchāilakkhaṇāva-
lōyaṇēṇa sayatthasaṁpatti, viusajaṇasaṁsaggīē suya-saṁpayaṁ guṇānurāgēṇa amaccharittaṇaṁ, muṇijaṇasussusāē dhammapaḍivatti,
citiyamēttakajjasaṁpattīē puṇṇapabbhāraṁ aṇukūla divvadaṁsaṇēṇaṁ jammaṁtarasukayaṁ vihalajaṇasamuddharaṇēṇaṁ mahāṇubhāvattaṇaṁ, sama-
sattamittaṇēṇa majjhatthabhāvaṁ viusāvayaṁti jō ya mūō aliyapayaṁpaṇēsu, paṁgulō paradavvāvaharaṇēsu, aṁdhō paradōsadaṁsaṇēsu,
luddhō guṇarayaṇāvajjaṇēsu, citāurō satthatthēsu, dhaṇau vva aparimiyadhaṇō dhaṇō nāma satthāhō' parivasai । 
<lg n="48">
  <l>kiṁbahuṇā bhaṇiēṇaṁ ? dhaṇiyaṁ dhaṇasatthavāha - dēhammi</l>
  <l>rayaṇāyarē vva rayaṇāṇa natthi aṁtō guṇagaṇāṇaṁ</l>
</lg>
tassa ṇaṁ dhaṇassa kitti vva mahāmuṇiṇō, juṇha vvaṁ sasiṇō, lacchi vva dāṇavāriṇō, mayalēha vva kariṇō, khaṁti
vva khamiṇō, sai vva hariṇō, buddhi vva suraguruṇō, laliya vva tiurāriṇō, paha vva raviṇōṁ, puhai vva bharahavaṁiṇō,
kaṁti vva maṇiṇō, rai vva kusumēsuṇō, kusumasamiddhi vva surataruṇōṁ, cūla vva sura-giriṇī, karuṇa vva muṇivaiṇō, kaha
vva guṇaḍḍhakaiṇō, sīya vva dāsarahiṇō, niyaguṇagaṇadhavaliyā rāmaṁḍalāsayalajaṇamaṇōhāriyā dhaṇavatī nāma bhāriyā । 
<lg n="49">
  <l>ai kasiṇa- kuṁḍila susiṇiddha-masiṇa- laṁbaṁta - ciharapanbhārō</l>
  <l>sōhai niyaṁbalaggō jīsē jauṇāpavāhō vva</l>
</lg>
<lg n="50">
  <l>achivaṁtēṇa va vihiṇā karēhi aṁgāī tīya ghaḍiyāī</l>
  <l>jēṇa karālidvāṇaṁ na hōi ēyārisī sōhā</l>
</lg>
<lg n="51">
  <l>nivvattiūṇa rūvaṁ kaha vi tulaggēṇa jīya' divvō vi</l>
  <l>mayaṇāurō viyaṁbhai kō kira taṁ vaṇṇiuṁ tarai ?</l>
</lg>
<lg n="52">
  <l>aha tassa tīya samayaṁ visayasuhāsēvaṇaṁ kuṇaṁtassa</l>
  <l>vaccai suhēṇa kālō amuṇiyapiyavippaōgassa</l>
</lg>
aṇṇā kayāi suhi-sayaṇa parivāriō atthōvajjaṇōvāyasaṁkahāhi gamiūṇa paḍhamapaharaṁ jāmiṇīē visajjiyāsēsa-

1. satthavāhī pā0 । 2. tīē pā0 । 3. jīē pā0 । 4. pahallira pā0 ।

gaēṇa maṁgalapāḍhaēṇa -

jugāijiṇiṁda-cariyaṁ
ēyaṁ sōūṇa sasaṁbhaṁtō paribuddhō dhaṇō citiumāraddhō-- " kō mannē ēttha satthē sutthiō dutthiō vā ? ' ō ! '
nāya accaṁta 'dutthiyā sāhuṇō, jaō na tāṇaṁ āma-kaṁdāīyaṁ sara-sariyāigayaṁ vā payaṁ kappai । ēvaṁ vicitayaṁtassa pabhāyā
rayaṇī, udayagirimatthayatthaṁ jāyaṁ taruṇataraṇimaṁḍalaṁ, uṭṭhiō sayaṇijjāō, kayaṁ gōsakaraṇijjaṁ, kaivayapurisaparivāriō
gaō gurusamīvaṁ । diṭṭhā ya pavisaṁtēṇa nāṇāvihatava - sōsiyasarīrā appēgaiyā māsōvavāsiṇō, appēgaiyā dumāsakhavagā,
appēgaiyā timāsanirasaṇā, ' appēgaiyā caumāsābhiggahadhāriṇō, ' appēgaiyā ūṇōyariyāē jāvitagā,appēgaiyā laddhāva-
laddhavittiṇō appēgaiyā jalla- malladhāriṇō, appēgaiyā dīharōma- nahaṁsiṇō appēgaiyā ēkkārasaṁgadhāriṇō appēgaiyā
paḍipuṇṇacōddasapubviṇō, appēgaiyā uḍḍhabāhū ahōsirā āyāvaṇaṁ āyāvēmāṇā, sayāsayācāraparāyaṇā sāhuṇō । 'ahō !
mahātavasṇiō' tti pasaṁsaṁtō gaō āyariyasamīvaṁ, diṭṭhā sōmō vva sōmamuttiṇō dhammaghōsasūriṇō, vaṁdiyā viṇayasāraṁ । 
'sōma ! sāgayaṁ ?' ti bhaṇatēṇa ahiṇaṁdiō guruṇā dhammalābhēṇa uvaviṭṭhō samuciyāsaṇē । lajjōvaṇayaṁ bhaṇiyamaṇēṇa -
"ahō ! mē jahaṇṇattaṇaṁ, ahō ! mē vayaṇasārattaṇaṁ, ahō ! mē paḍivaṇṇānivvahaṇaṁ, ahō ! mē pamāyabahulayā, jaṁ tahā
paḍivajjiūṇa na kayā bhē sutthā - sutthaciṁtā, marisiyabvaṁ mē bhagavaṁtēhi, khamāpahāṇā cēvaṁ mahāmuṇiṇō bhavaṁti । " guruhiṁ
bhaṇiyaṁ -- " mahābhāga ! mā saṁtappa, kayaṁ bhavayā jaṁ kāyavvaṁ, rakkhiyā kūrasattōvaddavāō, pāliyā cōrāibhayāō, āhāraṁ
puṇa dēsa - kālāṇurūvaṁ jahāsaṁbhavaṁ sasattīē satthiyā cēva payacchaṁti । " dhaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- " bhayavaṁ ! kimaṇēṇa aliyasaṁṭhavaṇa-
vayaṇēṇa ? savvahā lajjiō haṁ imiṇā attaṇō pamāyadōsēṇa, karēha ṇē ṇuggahaṁ, pēsēha sāhuṇō jēṇa payacchāmi sāhujaṇa-
jōggamāhāraṁ । " sūrīhiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ -- " satthavāha ! kahiō cēva tuha kappākappavihī । " dhaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ---"jaṁ kappaṇijjaṁ taṁ
viyarissāmi । " gayā sāhuṇō । bhaviyavvayāniōēṇa na kiṁ pi sāhūṇa jōggamāhārajāyamatthi, tatō pavaḍḍhamāṇasuhajjhava-
sāēṇa uggamāidōsarahiēṇa ghaēṇa paḍilābhiyā । tahāvihabhaddagabhāvamuvāgaēṇa baddhaṁ mōkkhatarubīyabhūyaṁ bōhibīyaṁ' ti
vaṁdiuṁ visajjiyā sāhuṇō gayā saṭṭāṇaṁ । bīya diṇē puṇō vi samāgaō gurusamīvaṁ dhaṇō, kayappaṇāmō uvaviṭṭhō uciyāsaṇē ।

4
ēvaṁ saṁṭhaviṇaṁ kaha kaha vi atāṇayaṁ visāya - visavihariyaṁgāṇi ṭhiyāṇi tāṇi । sā vi kaṇṇayā ayaṁḍē cēva
mēhamuhapallīvaiṇō bhavaṇasayaṇijjagayaṁ pēcchai attāṇayaṁ । taō taṁ daṭṭhūṇa sāhiyaṁ mēhamuhassa dāsīē- "sāmi ! saggāō
viva pabhaṭṭā surasuṁdarī, pāyālāō viva samāgayā nāgakaṇṇayā ēgā kaṇṇagā tuha sayaṇijjamajjhagayā dīsai । " taṁ
suṇiya vimhayapūrijjamāṇamāṇasō samāgaō pallināhō । diṭṭhā ya tēṇa 'hā ! kimēyaṁ' ti vimhiēṇa pucchiyā tēṇa
- "vacchē ! kā tubhaṁ ? kattō vā samāgayā ? kamaliṇīē viva saraṁ kaṁ kulamalaṁkiyaṁ tumaē ?" sā vi adiṇṇa-
paḍivayaṇā bāhōllanayaṇā ruyai cēva, na kiṁpi jaṁpai । 'mahilāsajjhamiṇaṁ kajjaṁ ti citiūṇa niggaō mēhamuhō । 
bhaṇiyā ya nirdhāriṇī mēhamālābhihāṇā -- " thiē ! taha kaha vi uvayariūṇa bahuppayāraṁ kōmalavayaṇēhiṁ jaṇiūṇa vīsāsaṁ
vattavvā ēsā bāliyā jahā sāhēi savvaṁ niyaya-vaiyaraṁ । " tīya vi tahēva kāūṇa pucchiyā mayaṇamaṁjarīē, sāhiō
jahaḍiō samvō viniyayavaiyarō । paḍivaṇṇā mēhamālāē duhiyā niyayagharē' vva jahā samīhiyasaṁpajjaṁta-sayalamagōrahā
kālaṁ gamēi । 
,
iō ya kubērapurasāmiṇā kubēradattarāiṇō saṁdhiviggahiyamāhaṇassa puttō pahāṇapurisaparivāriō mayaṇaviggahō
nāma pēsiō mēhamuhapallīē । pattō sō tattha, āvāsiō bāhi । aṇṇammi diṇē sabahumāṇaṁ pavēsiō niyamaṁdiraṁ
pallināhēṇa । kahiyaṁ ca rāyasāsaṇaṁ । uvāyaṇīkayāṇi cittayacamma- daṁta maṇi-mōttiyāīṇi saṁpūjiūṇa pēsiō niyayāvāsaṁ । 
pamhuṭṭha maṇi- rayaṇaṁ samappiūṇa pēsiyā pacchaō mēhamuhēṇa mayaṇamaṁjarī gayā tassāvāsaṁ ।

paḍipuṇṇaṁ kāūṇa visajjiyā sāhuṇō gayā saṭṭāṇaṁ । bhuttā āgamavihīē । samāsatthamāṇasā samōyāriyā maggē
pulidēhi । vaṁdiūṇa niyattāṇi puliṁdāṇi । aṇṇayā alakkhiyāgaēṇa suhapasuttāṇi pāviyāṇi paṁcattaṁ paṁcāṇaṇēṇa । 
samuppannāṇi sōhammē kappē majjhimāuyā dō vi dēvā । tattha bhōttūṇa surasuṁdarīhiṁ samaṁ visayasuhaṁ ahāuyakkhaēṇa cuyā
samāṇā iva jaṁbuddīvē dīvē bhārahēvāsē vasaṁtaurē nayarē caṁdasēhararāiṇō caṁda sirīē bhāriyāē caṁdajasa sūrajasābhihāṇā kamēṇa
dō vi puttā jāyā । kayakalāgahaṇā uciyasamaē pahāṇarāyavaṁsasamubbhavāṇaṁ kaṇṇagāṇaṁ pāṇi- gāhiyā । aṇṇayā pavvai-
kāmēṇa piuṇā ahisittō mahārāyapaē caṁdajasō, sūrajasō juvarāyā kaō । nikkhatō caṁdasēharō mahāvibhūīē suṭṭiyā-
yariyasīvē । caṁdajasa - sūrajasā vi pasāhiyamahī - maṁḍalā pariṇayavathā niya-niyaputtasaṁkāmiyarajjadhurā jugaṁdharāyariyasamīnē
pavvaiyā । pāliyaniraiyārasāmaṇṇā samuppaṇṇakēvalavaranāṇa- daṁsaṇadharā kāūṇa aṇasaṇaṁ siddhi-vasahimuvagayā । 
pavarasurasuhāī maccamajjhē ya jāī, jayapayaḍapayāvā dō vi bhōttūṇa tāī । 
vihivihiyavaēṇuppā ḍiuṁ divvanāṇaṁ, sivamayalamaṇataṁ pāviyā siddhiṭhāṇaṁ॥145॥
dāṇaṁ sattāṇa tāṇaṁ visamamayaradasā saṁgayāṇaṁ pahāṇaṁ, dāṇaṁ dāliddakaṁdōdda laṇavihimahōddāmakuddālakaṣpaṁ । 
dāṇaṁ saṁsārasārātaṇuvibhavamahābhōga saṁbhārasāraṁ, dāṇaṁ sōhaggadāṇaṁ vasiyaraṇa - mahāmaṁtatullaṁ jāṇaṁ॥146॥
vivihavihipattaṁ phāsūyaṁ bhattijuttaṁ bhavajalahigayāṇaṁ tāraṇē jāṇavattaṁ । 
sayalasuhanihāṇaṁ savvadāṇappahāṇaṁ, jayai sivasuhāṇaṁ kāraṇaṁ pattadāṇaṁ॥147॥
<lg n="148">
  <l>dāṇaṁtarāyavivarullasaṁtatakkhaṇavisuddhapariṇāmō</l>

saṁpayaṁ sīlē sīladhaṇāudāharaṇaṁ--
atthi ihēva jaṁbuddīvē bhārahēvāsē bahudivasavaṇṇaṇijjaguṇagaṇaṁ dharaṇi ramaṇīmuha - tilayabhūyaṁ saṁkāsaṁ nāmaṁ nayaraṁ । 
tattha ṇaṁ dasadaviṇakōḍīsarō paramasammaddiṭṭhī paramēsarō nāma sēṭṭhī parivasai । tassa ṇaṁ nirūvama - sīlāharaṇahāriṇī
asāhāraṇarūva-sōhaggāiguṇagaṇa-viṇijjiyā sēsanārīgaṇā vīyarāya payapaṁkaya-mahuyarī sīlavaṇā nāma bhāriyā । jā ya
sarayasiri vva pariōsiya- rāyahaṁsa maṁḍalā acvaṁtanimmalā ya, dharādharāhiva mutti vva uṇṇayavaṁsā suvaṇṇa rayaṇujjalā ya
jidipāya- paṁkayāvalī viva varalakkhaṇā vibuhāhaṭṭiyā ya, tiyasa sariya vva sadayā paramēsarāṇugayā ya; jīsē kōhō
pāvakammēsu na pariyaṇēsu, jīsē bahumāṇō guṇagaṇēsu na saṁtēsu viniya jāi-kula- rūva-lāyannēsu; jīsē aliyāṇugayā
ciharā na samullāvā, nimmala - kavōlaparimāviraiyamayamaya- pattalēhākalaṁkakiyaṁ vayaṇaṁ na sīlaṁ, savaṇāsattāṇi suvaṇṇa-
rayaṇujjalāṇi kuṁḍalāṇi na pisuṇajaṇajaṁpiyāṇi, dūrunnaya-garuyasusaṁgaya supurisāṇugāriṇō payōharā na paḍivakkhā, muṇāla-
sukumālāō bāhulayāō na buddhīō, taṇuō majjhō na dāṇappasarō, vitthiṣṇō niyaṁbō na rōsō, kummunnayā calaṇā
na dasaṇā । 
kiṁ bahunā ? varajōvvaṇa-kaṁtikalāvēhi dāṇa- viṇaēhiṁ । sīladhaṇāē sarisā sīladhaṇā cēva na hu aṇṇā ॥ 149 ॥ .

  <l>bhavavisvikusumakaṣpā saṁtāṇaphalā suhāvahā visayā</l>
  <l>taruṇō viva phalarahiyā visayā vi visāyasaṁjaṇagā</l>

  <l>niyavaṁsa- vaṁsakēū niyabhavaṇutthaṁ bhaṇēkkathaṁbhaṁ va</l>
  <l>puttā jēhiṁ na jāyā viḍaṁbaṇā tāṇa visayasuhaṁ</l>

<lg n="168">
  <l>tā jāṇuō vi supurisa ! ayāṇuō taṁ phuḍaṁ na saṁdēhō</l>
  <l>ahavā appasaricchaṁ mamaṁ pi taṁ vavasiō kāuṁ</l>

<lg n="169">

  <l>citāurāṇa tāṇaṁ paramēsara sēṭṭhi-sīladhaṇayāṇa</l>
  <l>gahiūṇa suyaṁ vānari karāō gayagaṁgaō pavagō</l>

tā pāvakamma ! niddaya ! nikkiva ! nissaṁsa ! nigviṇa ! kayaggha ! । kaha caliō majjha suyaṁ ghēttūṇa mamaṁ pamōttūṇa ?॥171
<lg n="172">
  <l>iccāi vilaviūṇaṁ saraṇavihīṇā duhāulā dīṇā</l>

kiṁ vā haṁ niravacca ? tti kāūṇa dūsiyā vānarīē tumaṁ pi vānarēṇaṁ ? kiṁ nimittaṁ vā bhūmīgōyarāṇi vi hōūṇa
gayagaṁgaṇē uppaiyāṇi? savisāyaṁ sakōuyaṁ ca mē mānasaṁ kō ēttha paramatthō । " tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - "piē! dēvō vā dāṇavō
vā vijjāharō vā ēsa kō vi vānararūvēṇa puttaṁ para nirujjama ujjamaṁ kārēitti mē maī; tā tumaṁ kayamajjaṇō-

sīlē sīladhaṇāudāharaṇaṁ
13
vayārā vihiyavilēvaṇā varakuṁkuṁmakayapūyā puraō vitthariyabalivihāṇā dhūvakaḍacchuyahatthā pāyavaḍiyā karēsu sayaladēvayā-
rāhaṇaṁ, uvayarasu maṁtataṁtaviyāṇaē, pajjuvāsēsu bahusuē, saraṇaṁ pavajjasu kuladēvayācalaṇē; ahaṁ puṇa na jāva vānaravaiya-
rassa pāraṁgaō na tāva bhuṁjāmi-tti kāūṇa nicchyaṁ ṭhiō । samaikkaṁtā satta vāsarā, aṭṭamadiṇarayaṇīē aṁtarikkha-
māvaṇṇēṇa sinēhasāraṁ bhaṇiō niya jaṇaēṇa dhaṇamittēṇa - "vaccha ! kimēvamappā kilēsijjai ?" paramēsarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ --
"tāya ! kilēsō vi sahalō jēṇa maṇōrahāṇaṁ pi dullahaṁ tumbhēhi saha daṁsaṇaṁ jāyaṁ, kilēsakāraṇaṁ puṇa vānaravilasiyaṁ । "
jakkhēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- " mā saṁtappasu suṇēsu vānaravr̥ttaṁtaṁ, mariūṇāhaṁ samuppaṇṇō vaṁtarataiyanikāē viṇayaṁdharō nāma jakkhō,
diṇṇōvaōgēṇa diṭṭha-tumaṁ niravaccō puttōvāyaṁ para nirujjamō ya, aō samāgaṁtūṇa vānaravēṇa puttaṁ pai tumaṁ ujjamaṁ
kāriō, tā taha kaha vi samujjamasu jahā acirādēva bhē puttō bhavai । " savinayaṁ calaṇēsu nivaḍiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ paramē-
sarēṇa -- “ tāya ! tumammi suppasaṇṇē savvaṁ mē sāhīṇaṁ, na khēō kāyavvō । ” jakkhēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- vaccha ! asthi aṁgā baṁgāṇaṁ
jaṇavayāṇaṁ majjhabhāē mahābhēravā nāma mahāaḍavī, tīsē bahumajjhadēsabhāē maggāsaṇṇaṁ māṇavajakkhāyayaṇaṁ varārāmōya, atthi ṇaṁ
tattha suyasaṁpayā nāma mahōsahī, aṇēgahā diṭṭhapaccayā sā maē tuha puttanimittaṁ gahiumāraddhā, diṭṭhōhaṁ mānavajakkhēṇa,
sarōsaṁ khara- niṭhuravayaṇēha nibbhacchiūṇa bhaṇiō -- "rē pāva ! saṁpayaṁ tuṭṭhō vā viṇaṇārāhiō vā ahamēyamōsahi
viyarēmi, tumaṁ puṇa akarhitō takkarō viva gahiumāraddhō tā kuddhō tē kayaṁtō" tti bhaṇiya gāḍhaṁ pahaō tēṇa, satta diṇāṇi
mucchiō vivaḍiō, aṭṭamadiṇāō ihāgaō । paramēsarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- “ ahō ! suyasiṇēhayā, ahō ! puttavacchalayā tāyassa । 
<lg n="173">
  <l>puttō vā atthō vā suhaṁ va dukkhaṁ va anajammammi</l>
  <l>jaṁ jēṇa hōi diṇṇaṁ sō taṁ uvabhuṁjaē tāya !</l>
</lg>
ēvaṁ payaṁpiūṇaṁ pūyāpurassaraṁ visajjiō jakkhō । sayamavi bhuttō aṭṭhamadiṇāō । sāhiō savvō vi sīladhaṇāē
jakkhāgamaṇa-vānaravuttaṁtakahaṇavaiyarō । pucchiyā sīladhaṇā--"piē ! kiṁ kathaṁ dēvayāṇamārāhaṇaṁ ? pucchiyā maṁta-taṁta-
viyāṇayā ? sēviyā bahussuyā ?" tīē bhaṇiyaṁ - " savvamaṇuṭṭiyaṁ paramucchpupphaṁ va niṣphalaṁ jāyaṁ । " taō sēṭṭiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ-
"piē! daṁsiō uvāō tāēṇa, tā tamēva māṇavajakkhaṁ viṇaēṇa samārāhiūṇa mahōsahi maggāmō । " tīē bhaṇiyaṁ--
"ēvaṁ karēmō । " ubhayasammaēṇaṁ pāraddhā satyasāmaggī, kaivayadiṇēhiṁ satyasahiyāṇi payaṭṭāṇi aṁgābhimuhaṁ, parimiyavāsarēhi
paviṭṭhāṇi mahābhēravāḍavi, diṭṭhaṁ māṇavajakkhāyayaṇaṁ, samāvāsiō paripēratēsu satyō, vihipurassaraṁ viṇaēṇa pūjiō jakkhō,
ṭhiyāṇi tatthēva kaivayadiṇāṇi sapaccavāyaṁ ti kāūṇa pēsiō pahāṇapurisasahiō satyō ṭhiō tatthēva sakalattō sēṭṭhī । 
aṇṇammi diṇē pūiūṇa viṇṇattō sīladhaṇāē māṇavajakkhō -- bhayavaṁ ! paṇaīyaṇakappapāyava ! karēha mē suyasaṁpaya-
mahōsa hippayāṇēṇa aṇuggahaṁ, visayavisavimōhiyamāṇasēṇa tīsē rūva-sōhaggāiguṇagaṇāvajjiyahiyaēṇa majjāyamujjhiūṇa
payaḍamēva bhaṇiyaṁ māṇavajakkhēṇa - "suṁdari ! chammāsē jāva bhaē saha visayasēvāē kajjasiddhī । " sīladhaṇāē bhaṇiyaṁ --
" mahābhāga ! jāvajjīvamavi parapurisaparibhōganiyamō mē tā kayamimiṇā sappurisanidiēṇa samullāvēṇaṁ, mahōsahīē vi
mē na kajjaṁ । ēvaṁ suṇiya sāvēsa - hiyaō mōṇamāsiō gujjhaō । sā vi gayā sēṭṭhisamīvaṁ, sāhiō jakkhavaiyarō । 
"piē! pabhāē gacchāmō" tti bhaṇiūṇa suttāṇi rayaṇīē pabhāyasamaē viuddhā sīlakṣaṇā na pēcchai piyayamaṁ, pēcchai
māṇavajakkhaṁ paripēraṁtēsu pariyataṁ । taō sīlabhaṁga bhayabhīyā mucchāvasa - vēviraṁgī 'namōjiṇāṇaṁ' tti bhaṇamāṇī niviṭṭhā
dharaṇivaṭṭhē । jakkhō vi tayavaggaha makkamiumasamatthō 'ahō ! chāyā vi dullaṁghaṇijjā imāē, ruṭṭhā puṇa jaṁ karējjā taṁ na
pāṇāmi (tti) pariṇāmasuṁdaraṁ maṁtiūṇa paṇaō jakkhō, gaō saṭṭāṇaṁ । sā vi samuggaē sūriē piyavirahiyā । 
hā nāha! daiya! vallaha ! nimmalajasabhariyasayalabhuvaṇayala !
rairamaṇa ! rūvaguṇanihi ! katthagaō ? katthadaṭṭhavvō ?
ēmāi vilaviūṇaṁ dīhuṇḍussā sasē । siuṭṭhauḍā । pagalaṁtanayaṇajala sittakaṁcuyā baddhavēṇīyā
॥174॥

  <l>dōhiṁ vi duhēhiṁ duhiyā caliyā sā ēgamaggēṇaṁ</l>

uttēhi akkamijjai, na tēyassiṇā abhibhavijjai, nō vāēhiṁ chijjai, na purisakārēṇa laṁghijjai, na dēsaṁtarēṇa vi

pi subhagaṁ karēi, kayāi saguṇaṁ pi nigguṇaṁ gaṇāvēi, rōraṁ pi īsaraṁ karēi, dhaṇavaṁtaṁ pi niddhaṇaṁ dharēi, karayalagayamavi

vi sīhō, māyā vi vagghī "kiṁ bahuṇā ? savvaṁ pi vivarīyaṁ aṇukūlē puṇa imammi sattū vi mittō, visaṁ pi amayaṁ,
taṁ caiva savvaṁ vivarīyaṁ vattavvaṁ, savvahā namō citāikkaṁtakāriṇō divvavilasiyassa । ēvaṁ kiṁci kālaṁ sōiūṇa suttā
suddhadharaṇīyalē samāgayā niddā । ētyaṁtarē kattō vi samāgatūṇa gahiyā vāmapāē ayagarēṇa 'hā kimēyaṁ?' ti bhayabhīyā
uṭṭiyā, diṭṭhōṁ rāhu vva sasi-biṁbaṁ vāmapāyaṁ gasaṁtō ayagarī, aṇaṇṇasaraṇāē bhaṇiyamaṇāē-

aṇṇammi dinē mahābhēravīē aḍavīē hiṁḍamāṇīē । diṭṭhā akkha rapaṁtī silāē sēḍīē saṁlihiyā । 201॥

nayaṇujjharā jharaṁtā niraṁtarā bāhabiṁdu saṁdōhā । muttāhalahārō viva tīsē hiyayammi ghōliti

chuhiyā bharaṇa khuhiyā pivāsiyā tammi cēva silavaṭṭhē । piyalihiyakkharasuhaē suttā sariūṇa navakāraṁ
ētyaṁtarē davaggī puvvāvaradāhiṇuttarāhitō । taṇakaṭṭhāṇi dahaṁtō pattō tīsē samīvammi

sīlē sīladhaṇā udāharaṇaṁ

<lg n="262">

</lg>
<lg n="265">

  <l>maha sīlarakkhagō taṁ tumaṁ ca maha pāṇadāyā ya</l>
</lg>
<lg n="267">
  <l>nīsēsa bhuvaṇabhūsaṇa ! guṇamaṁdira ! parahiēkkarayacitta !</l>
  <l>ācaṁdasūriyaṁ naṁda bhāya ! kimihaṁ paraṁ bhaṇimō</l>
</lg>
<lg n="268">
  <l>iya bhaṇiē sō tīē kayappaṇāmō khaṇēṇa uppaiō</l>
  <l>niyaṭhāṇa pāvaṇaṭṭā tamāla-dala-sāmalē gayaṇē</l>
</lg>
17
sīladhaṇā vi saṁgōviūṇa khēya radiṇṇaṁ hāradugaṁ rayaṇāvali ca citiuṁ pavattā ' kaha ṇu nāma ēgāgiṇī vasaṇāvaḍiyā
sahasa tti māusiyāgharaṁ vaccāmi ?' ēvaṁ viyappiūṇaṁ gayā ēvaṁ saccha-sīyala salilapaḍipuṇṇaṁ sayalanayaranārī jalabharaṇaṭṭhāṇaṁ
mahāvāvi, paviṭṭhā tayabhaṁtaraṁ, niyasīla va nimmalaṁ pīyaṁ salilaṁ । nisannā tammi cēva vāvī (ta) ḍē vimaṇa-dummaṇā ahōmuhī,
nayaṇajalāsārasitta dharaṇītalā jāva ciṭṭhai tāva diṭṭhā jalāharaṇasamāgayāhi rayaṇasuṁdari dāsacēḍīhi । saṁjāyasaṁkāhiṁ pucchiyā-
" kā tumaṁ ? kattō vā samāgayā ? kassa duhiyā ? kimabhihāṇāṇi vā bhē jaṇaṇi - jaṇayāṇi ?" adiṇṇapaḍivayaṇāō cēva
gayāō tāō niyacaraṁ । bhaṇiyā ēgāē dāsacēḍīē rayaṇasuṁdarī - "sāmiṇi ! kā vi itthiyā acvaṁtarūvassiṇī aṇubhūya
pubvariddhivisēsā vasōvaha yā vāvitaḍē ēgāgiṇī aṇāhā pisuṇiya gurusōgāvēgā ruyaṁtī ciṭṭhai, sā puṇa bahusīladhaṇāē
aṇuharai, saṁjāyasaṁ kāhi pucchiyā ciramamhēhi ruvai cēva na kiṁpi sāhēi । " taō dāsacēḍīhiṁ samaṁ gayā tatthēva rayaṇasuṁdarī । 'cira-
diṭṭha' tti sāvi sammaṁ na pariyāṇas, kōmalavayaṇēhi nīyā niya maṁdiraṁ, pucchiyā rayaṇasuṁdarīē - "vacchē ! kahēsu niyavaiyara । ”
sīladhaṇāē citiyaṁ" - na juttaṁ mama ēyāvatthāē paratthāṇē appāṇaṁ pagāsēuṁ kayāi agōravēṇaṁ maṁ pēcchihaṁti" taō tayaṇurūvē
gōravē akīramāṇē gāḍhayaraṁ hiyayadukkhaṁ bhavējja, iharahā puṇa annāyaparamatthāē jai gōravō na kijjai taha vina dukkhaṁ । aviya-
<lg n="269">
  <l>gayapariyaṇāṇa vasaṇāgayāṇa parikhīṇabhāgadhējjāṇa</l>
  <l>niddhaṇavaṁgāṇa ya māṇusāṇa bhaṇiyaṁ na sōhēi</l>
</lg>
,
<lg n="270">
  <l>tā huikayē kayassa u niccamasaṁjāya hōmakammassa</l>
  <l>saṁtigha rahuyavahassa va majjhaṁ pacchannayā sēyā</l>
</lg>
ēvaṁ citiūṇa appagāsiya paramatthā nihuyā cēva ṭhiyā, kaō pahāṇabhōyaṇāiō uvayārō, na vhāyā, darabhuttaṁ kāūṇa
uṭṭhiyā, bhattāra- dukkha dukkhiyā citā-sōyasāya ragayā uṇhanīsāsānaladaḍḍha muhacchāyā abhikkhaṇaṁ abhikkhaṇaṁ rūyamāṇī rayaṇīsu
vi aladdhaniddā kālaṁ gamēṛa । 
-
iō ya nisuyaṁ sīladhaṇāē jaṇaṇi jaṇaēhi -- jahā kila jāmāuō vacchā sīladhaṇā ya na satthē nāvi
niyagharē na najjaṁti kiṁ pi avatthaṁ ramuvagayāṇi । taō paramadukkhamuvagaēṇa jāmāuyassa dhūyāē ya maggaṇā hēḍaṁ savvadisāmu-
hēsu visajjiyā paccaiyapurisā । ēgō ya puṇa sēdviṇō paramapaccayatthāṇaṁ sayā sannihiō vidiṇṇaviulasaṁbalō visajjiō
harippō nāma māhaṇō, bhaṇiō ya-- "vayaṁsa! vaccāhi nāṇāvihēsu dēsaṁtarēsu niuṇaṁ gavēsamāṇō mama jāmāuyassa dhūyāē
udaṁtaṁ lahāhi jīvaṁti mayāṇi vā, siddhayattō paḍiniyattāhi jāva mē pāṇā na vaccaṁti' । 'ēvaṁ karēmi tti bhaṇiūṇa
caliō harivhō । bhaṇiō rayaṇappahāē - “visālasāla - uramajjhēṇa rayaṇasuṁdarīē imaṁ va ( i ) yaraṁ sāhitēṇa gaṁtavvaṁ, māsā
vihipa pati labhējjā । ' ēvaṁ karissāmi' tti payaṁpiūṇa payaṭṭō pattō visālasālaṁ rayaṇasuṁdarī maṁdiraṁ ca । kayasamu-
ciōvayārēṇa sāhiō savvō vi jahatthavaiyarō harippahamāhaṇēṇa niyayāgamaṇapaōyaṇaṁ ca । taō gayā diyavarēṇa saha uvari-
bhūmiyāē rayaṇasuṁdarī diṭṭhā mahājōgiṇi vva ahōmuhī ki pi jhāyaṁtī sisiradaḍḍha - kamaliṇi vva vivaṇṇamuhapaṁkayā sīlaghaṇā ।

alēvārḍa pārēi, ēvaṁ dō tiṇṇi cattāri paṁca jāva chammāsā karēi alēvārḍa pārēi, puṇō vi chammāsaṁ karēi alēvāḍa
pārēi, ēvaṁ jahāvaḍiō tahēva paḍiniyattō jāva māsaṁ kāūṇa alēvāḍaṁ pārē । ēvamāi nāṇāvihaṁ gamapaccāgayaṁ tavō-
kammaṁ kāūṇa saṁlēhaṇaṁ karēi । 
cāri vigiṭṭhāī vigaī nijjūhiyāṇi cattāri । saṁvaccharāṇi dōṇi u ēgaṁtariyaṁ ca āyāmaṁ ।

vihaṁgēhi mukkō sayalapariyaṇēṇa piusayāsa pi lajjāē acayaṁtō gaṁtuṁ ētthēva ṭhiō । ēsa maha dujjāyajasassa va yarō asuō
caiva sōhaṇō । " kumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ "bhaddamha ! mā visāyaṁ karēhi । jaō bhaṇiyaṁ--

iccāi samāsāsiūṇa dhariō niyasamīvē cēva kumārēṇa sēṭṭhisuō । bīyadiṇē nimaṁtiō aṁgavaṇēṇa bhōyaṇaṭṭā
kumārō, bhuttō sapariyaṇō, tagguṇāvajjiyahiyaēṇa dinnā niyasuyā avaṁtasirī aṁgavaṇēṇa dhariō tatthēva kaivayadiṇāṇi । 
aṇṇamma dinē visūiyādōsēṇa uvaraō aṁgavadvaṇō । 'aputtō', ti ahisittāṇi divvāṇi । tēhi vi iō taō bhamiūṇa dēva-
dinō cēva paḍivannō । ahisittō maṁti-sāmaṁtāīhiṁ mahārāyapaē, vasīkaō aṁgājaṇavaō ।

āari frohasu, satyasāmiō aṇṇō kāyavvō, appaṇā pacchantrēṇa acchiyavvaṁ, mayaṇamaṁjarī vijaṁ kiṁ pi tuha satyamāgayā
pacchannaṁ muyai taṁ gahēūṇa alakkhiyaṁ cēva tīsē gharē mōttavvaṁ, taō tīsē gharasārō niyadaviṇaṁ ca tē saṁtiyaṁ bhavissai । " diṇṇa
sāmaggī rāiṇā । paccāsaṇṇagāmē gaṁtr̥̄ṇa kayasatyō nivēsiyā varasatthavāhō samāgaō aṁgauraṁ, āvāsiō avaradisāē । 
sōūṇa satyaṁ samāgayaṁ pubvapaōgēṇēvāgayā mayaṇamaṁjarī । ṭhiō pacchannō maisāgarō । nimaṁtiō niyagharāgamaṇēṇa tīē sattha-
vāhō । paḍivaṇṇaṁ tēṇa । didri vaṁciūṇa avallā majjhē chūḍhaṁ tīē niyamuddārayaṇaṁ । gayā satthavāhēṇa saha niyadharaṁ । maisāgarē
ṇāvi gahiūṇa avallāō mayaṇamaṁjarī nāmaṁkiyaṁ muddārayaṇaṁ samappiyaṁ niyapaccaiyapurisassa, bhaṇiō ya - " gaccha tumaṁ sattha-
vāhēṇa samaṁ, taha kaha vi jaiyanvaṁ jaha alakkhiyaṁ cēva kēṇai mayaṇamaṁjarī maṁdirē vīsamai । " tēṇa vi tahēva kayaṁ । kaō-
vayārō samāgaō niyasatyaṁ satyavāhī । mayaṇamaṁjarīē vi puvvapaōgēṇa kaō kōlāhalō । nīyādaṁḍavāsiēṇa naravaisamīvaṁ । 
bhaṇiyā mahārāiṇā - " kimēyaṁ samāulā ? । " tīē bhaṇiyaṁ - " satthavāhamisēṇa kō vi mē muddārayaṇaṁ gahāya gaō । " rāiṇā

āṇiō । rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ -- " satthavāha ! kiṁ nimittaṁ taē imīē muddārayaṇaṁ hariyaṁ ?" satthavāhēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ --- "saṁtaṁ pāvaṁ । "
mayaṇamaṁjarīē bhaṇiyaṁ -- " mahārāya ! kimannō vi kō vi cōriyaṁ kariyaṁ kahēi, visēsaō aṇēgakūḍa - kavaḍabhariō vaṇiya-
jaṇō । ” satthavāhēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ "āpāvē ! nagaraniddhamaṇasamā vi hōūṇa vaṇiyajāī dūsēsi ? " īsi hasiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ

"sayala satthadaviṇassa ēsā sāmiṇī, jai puṇa imāē cēva gharē bhavissai tā imāē kō daḍō ? । " mayaṇabhaṁjarīē bhaṇiyaṁ -
"sattavēṇīsamajjiyā kaṇayakōḍī maha gharē tīē tumaṁ sāmiō । " taō pahāṇarāyapurisasahiyā gayā satthavāhasatthaṁ, nirūviyaṁ
samaṁtaō satyavāhamaṁdiraṁ, visēsēṇa avallāō, na laddhaṁ kattha vi muddārayaṇaṁ । vilakkhavayaṇā disāmaṁḍalaṁ palōyaṁtī bhaṇiyā

purisēṇa muddārayaṇaṁ; daṁsiyāṇi mayaṇamaṁjarīna / makkharāṇi rāyapurisāṇa । tēhi vi kahiyaṁ rāiṇō । rāiṇā vi muddāviyaṁ
maṁdiraṁ, niddhāḍiyā nayarāō mayaṇamaṁjarī, diṇṇaṁ maisāyarassa mayaṇamaṁjarīmaṁdiraṁ । maisāyarō vi niyadaviṇajāyaṁ mayaṇa-

āisasutā mahāyasa ! kiṁ tujjha karēmi viṇayapaḍikammaṁ ? paḍibhaṇai pavaṇavēgō jaṁ kāyavvaṁ tayaṁ suṇasu
vijjāharō narāhiva ! ahayaṁ tuha daṁsaṇēṇa avayariō । paḍivajjasu sammattaṁ sivasuhyaṁ savvavirahaṁ ca
dhammāō attha- kāmā saggō mōkkhō ya haṁti purisāṇa । visayāsānaḍiyamaṇā mūṛhā taṁ cēva na kuṇaṁti
picchaṁtō vi na pēcchai aṇavarayagalaṁta chiddaduggaṁdhaṁ । nārī dēha - milicchō ki kīrau jēṇa rāgaṁdhō ?
naggō jahā paḍatthī tassa nimittaṁ na givhaē sutaṁ । taha visayāsānaḍiō mūḍhō dhammaṁ na sēvēi
jai icchasi visayasuhaṁ tā dhammaṁ kuṇasu niyayasattīē । jō mahai varāhāraṁ sō giṇhai tannimittāī
aimaṇaharavaṇavāsēkkasōkkha saṁpattagayavarō lahai । gaṇiyā riphāsaluddhōṁ dukkhāī bahuppayārāī
tilatusamittēṇaṁ ciya sayaṁbhuramaṇaṁ ca dūravitthiṇṇaṁ । narasōkkhēṇa hayāsō dūraṁ nāsēra sura- sōkkhaṁ
tā arihaṁtō dēvō sāhū ya gurū jiṇēhiṁ pannattō । dhammō jīvāīyā tattā tattēṇa sammattaṁ
ēvaṁ ca tēhi pavaṇagaivayaṇēhiṁ paḍivaṇṇasammattō kērisō sō nariṁdō jāō ? । avi ya--
avahatthiyamicchattōpasatyasammatta bhūsiyasarīrō । bahusō vi bhaṇṇamāṇō na ya viraī pāviō rāyā
āmaṁtiyaṁ naridaṁ khayarō naṁdīsarammi gaṁtūṇaṁ । namiūṇaṁ tattha jiṇē puṇō vi aha gayapuraṁ pattō
hēḍāūrūvadharō khayarō dāi rāiṇō turaē । rāyā vi divvaturayaṁ āruhaī tiyasanāhō vva
ārūḍhamma nariṁdē turaō mahimaṁḍalāō gayaṇayalaṁ । sahasa tti samuppaiō dīsaṁtō jaṇasamūhēṇa
jā chiṇṇakarō muṁbaī rajjuṁ turayassa dudrumahilaṁ va । tā nahahyalāō paḍiō turaṁgamō duṭṭapurisō vva
<lg n="357">
  <l>aha citēi naridō jai turaō kīsa nahayalē gamaṇaṁ ?</l>
  <l>jai mukkō ki paḍiō ? aha paḍiō kīsa nō diṭṭhō ?</l>
</lg>
tā savvā va divvē vivarīē jaṁ kuṇaṁti naṇu purisā । taṁ savvaṁ vivarīyaṁ jāyai natthēttha saṁdēhō
dudruturaṁgaṁ mōttuṁ khalaṁ va pāūṇa udayamamayaṁ va । bhōttūṇaṁ kaṁda-phalē vutthō tatthēva kaṁtārē
ēvaṁ tattha varadumēhitō phalarasamāsāyaṁtassa nijjharēhiṁtō sisiramudayaṁ pibaṁtassa kuraṁga mēhiṁtō sajjaṇa suhamaṇubhavaṁ tassa
aṇṇammi diṇē ciṁtā samuppaṇṇā - avvō! suṁdarī ēsa baṇavasō paraṁ piyayamārahiō, tā jai piyayamāē saha saṁbaṁdhō hōjja
tā aranaṁ pi suṁdaramiṇaṁ । avi ya-
sagasarisa vidēsō piyavirahē kuṇai ' dāruṇaṁ dukkhaṁ । ratnaṁ pi saggasarisaṁ jāyai piyasaṁgamāhitō
aha picchai appāṇaṁ sumiṇē lacchīē dhaṇiyamavagūḍhaṁ । paḍibuddhō paricitai jai ēsā hōjja ṇē ghariṇī
tā vaṇavāsō vi imō diyalōgāō havējja ahiyayarō । piyavirahiyāṇa jamhā saggō vi na nivvuī kuṇai
uṭṭhēvi satyarāō jā vaccai puvvadisi bahuhuttaṁ ? । tā muhalanēuraravō viyaṁbhiō tassa kaṇṇēsu
citēūṇa pavattō kattō kira urāṇa iha sahō ? । tā nūṇaṁ ēsa ravō sarēsu kalahaṁsavaṁdrāṇa
jaha phurai dāhiṇacchī jaha ya dihiṁ kuṇai ēsa maha saddō । jaha mē sumiṇō diṭṭhō taha hōjjā nēurāṇaṁ pi

paumarāyapamuhāṇi rayaṇāṇi viyarāmi kiṁ vā bhayabbhaṁtakuraṁgitārataralanayaṇajuyalāō, mattakāriṇāhakuṁbhatthalābhōyadūruṇṇaya-
pīṇapaōharāō, surasari- puliṇavitthiṇṇa niyaṁtrabiṁbāō, kummunnaya-calaṇa rēhira nahayaṁda-kiraṇa-niyara--paṇāsiyata maṁdhayārāō
dhayaraṭṭhagāmiṇīō mahumāsamattakalayaṁṭhijaṁpirīō, vijjāharamanariṁdakulavāliyāō, saṁpāḍēmi kiṁ vā pūriyasayala-
samīhiyāō, kamaladalalacchīō, payacchāmi । ahavā savvamēyaṁ gaya- kalaha-kannacaṁcalaṁ sarayanbhavinbhamaṁ iṁdayālaṁ piva
khadiṭṭha । 
<lg n="396">
  <l>tāki mimiṇā sarayanbhavinbha mē jīviyammi taha jōvvaṇē ya pēmmē ya</l>
  <l>jaha citiyadiṇṇaphalō dhammō cciya hōi dāyavvō</l>
</lg>
ēya citiūṇa giṇhāviō tumaṁ tēlōkkasārabhūyaṁ sammattarayaṇamimiṇā । puṇō vi parūviyā savitrā savvaviraī । 
na paḍivaṇṇā taē । taō gaṁtūṇa naṁdīsaraṁ tattō paḍiniyattēṇa savvaviraigāhaṇaṭṭhā turaṁgamavēsaṁ kāūṇa avahariō tumaṁ
aṇēṇa । pāḍiō aṇōrapārāē imāē mahāḍavīē । payaḍiyamayaṇaviyārāitthiyā vi tuha visaya paḍibaṁdhaparikkhaṇatthaṁ imiṇā
cēva viubviyā । ahaṁ pi vēyaḍaḍhāō tuha paḍibōhaṇatthaṁ imiṇā cēva ihāṇīō । 
<lg n="397">
  <l>tā parihara visayasuhaṁ muhamahuraṁ visasamaṁ ca pajjatē</l>
  <l>aṁgīkarēsu supurisa ! supurisaciṇṇaṁ samaṇadhammaṁ</l>
</lg>
taō nisāmiūṇa ēyaṁ vr̥ttaṁttaṁ citiyaṁ bhavabhīrurāiṇā - "ahō sē mahāṇubhāvayā ! ahō sē kajjākajjānirūvaṇaṁ !
ahō sē parōvayāranityattaṇaṁ ! jēṇāvahatthiyaniyakajjāraṁbhēṇa savvō vi imō parissamō mama samaṇadhammapaḍivattinimittaṁ
pavaṇagaīṇā kaō tti bhaṇiō bhavabhīrurāiṇā muṇivarō - " bhayavaṁ ! jāva niyataṇayaṁ rajjē ahiṁsicāmi tāva karēmi
duhapāyavā vaṁjhabīyabhūyaṁ tumha samīvē pavvajjaṁ ti । bhagavayā vi mamāṇuggahakaē akayakā lakkhēvaṁ dharaṇitilayaṁ nāma gayaura-
bāhirujjāṇaṁ samalaṁkaraṇīyaṁ । " ēyaṁ bhaṇiūṇa mōṇamāsiō rāyā । pavaṇagaī ki muṇiyanaravaihiyayābhippāō gahiūṇa-
rāyāṇaṁ gayaṇaṁgaṇamuppaiō । tamaṇu muṇivarō vi । khaṇadvēṇa pattā gayauraṁ । ṭhiō dharaṇitilaē pavaṇavēgamuṇī saha
pavaṇagaīṇā । rāyāvi paviṭṭhō sanagaraṁ । sāhiō savittharō turayaharaṇāiō samvō vi niyayavaiyarō amacca sāmaṁtāīṇa
tēsimaṇumaīē ahisittō niyayapaē kumuiṇītaṇaō kumuyacaṁdō nāma kumārī । dāūṇa mahādāṇaṁ mahāvibhūīē nikkhatō
pavaṇavēgamuṇisamīvē bhavabhīrūna rāhivō । gahiyaduvihasikkhō ahijjiyasuttatthō guruṇā saha mahīmaṁḍalaṁ vihariumāḍhatō । 
pavaṇagaī va kayakicca mattāṇayaṁ mannatō vaṁdiūṇa bhavabhīru muṇivaraṁ gaō sanagaraṁ । bhavabhīru muṇī vi nāṇāvihatavavisēsa -
parisōsiyasarīrō sadbhāisayasaṁvēgajōgaō ya guruyaṇamaṇunnaviya ṭhiō ēgarāiyaṁ mahāpaḍimaṁ mahāmasāṇē । diṭṭhō ya kōvāna-
lāvūrijjamāṇamāṇasēṇa iha bhavavairiṇā vaṇamālavaṁtarēṇa । sarōsaṁ bhaṇiyamaṇēṇa -- " rērē । ! durāyāra! acōramavi
cōraṁ bhaṇiya nayarārakkhiyasamappiyaṁ akathaviyārō bhavabhīruō vi bahubhavanibaṁdhaṇēṇa niravarāhamāraṇēṇa mamaṁ mārāviya
saṁpayaṁ kahi vaccasi ? natthi bhē jīviyaṁ", ti bhaṇamāṇō gahiūṇa muṇivaraṁ gaō masāṇapāyavahēṭṭaō । kīliō lōha-
kīlaēhi saha tēṇa muṇivarō । 'ahō mē paḍikayaṁ !' ti harisiyamaṇō saṭṭāṇaṁ gaō vaṁtarī । muṇī vivaṁtaraṁ pai
apa māṇasō tivvavēyaṇābhibhūō vivaitaṇūhi vi akamaviyārō aṇṇaṁ jīvāō sarīraṁ ti mantramāṇō samasattumittayāē
attāṇaṁ bhāvēumāḍhattō--

ya jahakkamaṁ caṁdāṇaṇa- caṁdamuhī nāmāō bhāriyāō । āharaṇapiyā caṁdāṇaṇā, tilayaca uddasamēṇa āharaṇēṇāhariyā । 
paidiṇaṁ pariyass caṁdamahī vi visayahaī । iṇamēva asārasaṁsārē sāraṁ ti mannēmāṇī nicca kāmē kāmēmāṇī kālaṁ gamēi । 
aṇṇayā samāgayā tattha caunāṇōvagayā sayalajaṇapiyaṁkarā ( piyaṁkara) nāma sūriṇō । samavasariyā kuṁḍiṇapurabāhiru-
jjāṇē । niggayā vaṁdaṇavaḍiyāē nagaralōyā । gīyarai-naṭṭaraiṇō vi sakalattāgayā sūrisamavē । pāraddhā bhagavayā bhavanivvēya-
jaṇī dhammadēsaṇā । ētyaṁtarē niyaparivāraparivuḍaṁ samāgayaṁ kiṇṇarajuyalaṁ । aṇuṣṇaviya bhagavaṁtaṁ piyaṁkarāyariyaṁ pāraddhaṁ gāiḍaṁ,
paṇacciyā naccaṇī, raṁgamāgayaṁ pēcchaṇayaṁ । taō gīyāsattaṁ gīyaraī । naṭṭiyā naṭṭavilōlalōyaṇaṁ naṭṭaraī kiṇṇarī piṇa" ddhāharaṇa-
pēcchiraṁ caṁdāṇaṇaṁ kinnararū vadaṁsaṇapayaḍiyamayaṇaviyāraṁ caṁdamuhīṁ muṇiya bhaṇiyaṁ piyaṁkarāya riēṇa ।

kuḍuṁbavāvārē saṁṭhaviya - niyaputtā, jiṇāyayaṇa vihiya aṭṭāhiyā - mahimā, mahādāṇa - pabhāviya- jiṇapavayaṇā, mahāvibhūīē,
samaṁ caṁdaṇaṇāē, piyaṁkarāyariyasamīvē nikkhatā gīyarai naṭṭa- raiṇō । samappiyā caṁdāṇaṇā pasamasirī pavattiṇīē । pari-
pāliya-niraiyāra-4 pavvajjā, vihi-vihiya-saṁlēhaṇā, cauvvihāhāra- kayāṇasaṇā samāhi-maraṇēṇa mariūṇa ēgāvayārā savvaṭṭhē

kina suyaṁ taē, ēgammi nagarē ēgō dāliddō bahuō । atthatthadēsaṁtarāṇi parithaḍiumāraddhō । na ya tēṇa kattha vikipi
samāsāiyaṁ । visāya-visa-vihuriya-sarīrō caliō niyadēsābhimuhaṁ । annayā aḍavi - majjhē diṭṭha tēṇa jakkha- dēulaṁ । paviṭṭhō
tayabbhaṁtarē diṭṭhō gujjhagō । kāūṇa sammajjaṇāiyaṁ vhaviō pūiō pavara- kusumēhi । kāūṇa kaṁdāiēhiṁ pāṇavitti taṁ rayaṇīṁ
tatthēva suttō । sutta-jāgarō bhaṇiō sumiṇāē jakkhēṇa - "rē rōra ! tuṭṭhōhaṁ tuha viṇaēṇa । ciṭṭhasu ētthēva kaivayadiṇāṇi 4
jāva māṇusaṁ karēmi । paōsa - samaē naṭṭa payaṭṭa-kaṇayamaya - mayūrāō ēkkēkkaṁ picchaṁ khuḍiya giṇhēyavvaṁ । " tahēva paḍivaṇṇaṁ rōrēṇa । 
paōsa-samaē samāgaō kumāra vāhaṇō । kaya- kala-kēyāraravō taḍḍuviyabarihabhārō naccitaṁ pavattō । khuḍiyamēgaṁ picchaṁ । adaṁsaṇō
saṁvr̥ttō barahī । saṁgōviyaṁ picchaṁ duggaēṇaṁ, ēvaṁ bīya taiyāi diṇēsu । aṇṇammi dinē abhavvayāē citiyamaṇēṇa -- "kēcciraṁ
kālaṁ sunnārannagaēṇaṁ khijjiyavvaṁ maē । tāō varamēgamuṭṭhīē gēṇhāmi savvapicchāṇi । taō kayakiccō sagharaṁ vaccāmi ” । 
ṭhiō ēgadēsē tamaṁdhayārapacchāiyasarīrō । samāgaō paōsasamaē bhuyaṁgamārī । pāraddhō nacciraṁ । pacchaō hōūṇa gahiyāṇi
ēgamuṭṭhīē duggaēṇa savvāṇi picchāṇi । sō vi parāvattiya niya-sarūvō karakara - sadda- kayatthiya kaṇṇa-juyalō vāyasō saṁjāō । 
khēyaṁ kutō māṇusavāyāē bhaṇiō jakkhēṇa duggaō - "arē maha dēvaulaṁ mōttūṇa bhōktavvaṁ । annahā natthi tē jīviyaṁ puvvasaṁgō-
gōviyāī pi naṭṭhāī picchāī । aisayavilakkhaṁ taḍiyaṁ daṭṭhūṇa paḍhiyaṁ kēṇāvi addissamāṇamuttiṇā ।

rāṇā bhaṇiyaṁ - 'bhadda ! sumarāmi piyāmaha vayaṇaṁ । ' taō laddhāvasarēṇa jaṁpiyaṁ sayaṁbuddhēṇa -- 'dēva ! 'jai ēvaṁ tā tumha vaṁsē
aīyakālē kurucaṁdō nāma rāyā ahēsi । kurumaī tassa dēvī, haricaṁdō, tāṇa kumārō । sō ya rāyā nāhiyavāī । aha-

haṁsatula-mauyā viphāsā tikkhakaṁṭaya vva dukkhaṁ tassa jaṇayaṁti । ēvaṁ paṁcasu vi iṁdiyatthēsu vivajjatthō suhayara visaya-saṁpāḍaṇa-

"ninnāmiē ! tuha saddā suhāsuhā । sui-pahamāgacchaṁti vāṇi vi suṁdara maṁgulāṇi pāsasi, gaṁdhē suhāsuhē agghāēsi,
rasē vi maṇuṣṇāmaṇuṇē āsāēsi, phāsē vi iṭṭāṇiṭṭhē paḍisaṁvēdēsi, chuhāiyā jaṁ vā taṁ vā bhuṁjasi, tanhāiyā icchāē
taḍāgāi - jalaṁ pibasi, tamasi jōi pagāsēṇa kajjāṇi karēsi, mahā vāhipīḍiyāē paḍiyāraṁ pi kōī tē karējjā, rayaṇīē
icchāē sayaṇaṁ pi tē sāhīṇaṁ, sīyāō unhaṁ uṇhāō vā sīyaṁ, para saṁcārō vi tē savasō, suha- dukkhamuṇitagō vi tē
vijjai । 
<lg n="578">
  <l>jaṁ puṇa pēcchasi annāṇa puṇṇavaṁtāṇa garuya - riddhīō</l>
  <l>mannēsi tēṇa guru- dukkha-dukkhiyaṁ appayaṁ bhaddē</l>
</lg>
<lg n="579">
  <l>jē puṇatumāō duhiyā nēraiyā tirithajōṇiyā maṇuyā</l>
  <l>tē' jai pāsasi tō tuha suha-buddhī kaha na hōjjāsi</l>
</lg>
jaō--
naraē nēraiyāṇaṁ niccamasuhā sada-rūva-rasa-gaṁdha-phāsā nippiḍiyārāṇi paramadāruṇāṇi sīuṇhāṇi chuhā pivāsāō ya na
khaṇamavi uvasati । nayaṇa- nimēsaṁtaramavi na suha lēsaṁ aṇuhavaṁti bhavapaccaiyaṁ paramāhammiya - nimmiyaṁ ca chēyaṇa-bhēyaṇāi-
jaṇiyama suha-vēyaṇaṁ vēēmāṇā kālaṁ garmēti । tiriyā vi sapakkha parapakkha jaṇiyāṇi sīuṇha - khuppivāsāiyāṇi jāṇi
dukkhāṇi aṇuhavaṁti tāṇi bahuṇā vi kālēṇa kō sakkō vannē । jaō--
tiriyā kasaṁkusārā nivāya vaha baṁdha māraṇa-sayāī । taṇhā - chuhā - kilaṁtā sahaṁti bahusō parāyattā
mayattaṇēvi jaccadha - paṁgulā sayaṇa- pariyaṇa - vihīṇā । dē dēhi dēhi dēhi tti jaṁpirā para ghara- muhēsu
vatthāharaṇa- vilēvaṇa - gharaghariṇi vivajjiyā mahāpāvā । chuha-taraha sīyavāyāyavēhiṁ parisōsiya' - sarīrā
sāhāraṇaṁ pi tēsi jala-jalaṇa-vaṇa- phalāiyaṁ kiṁ pi । para-diṇṇaṁ saṁpajjai na appaṇā tē aō duhiyā

ēyaṁ suṇiya saṁjāya saṁvēgāē bhaṇiyaṁ ninnāmiyāē - " bhayavaṁ ! ēvamēyaṁ natthēttha saṁdēhō । dhannāhaṁ jīē saṁsāra kaṁtāra-
samuttaraparamasatthāhakapā, duhiya jaṇajaṇaṇisannihā, nikkāraṇabaṁdhuṇō tubbhē pāviyā । tā dhamma - paha-payaṁsaṇēṇa puṇō vi

૩
vasaṁtapuraṁ nāma nayaraṁ । tattha ṇaṁ aparimiya-dhaṇō dhaṇō nāma satyavāhō vasaṁtapurāō nivvuipuraṁ pai patthiō । 
ghōsaṇaṁ' karāvēi - 'jō ṇaṁ maē saha nivvuipuraṁ para payaṭṭai tassa ṇaṁ khāṇēṇa vā pāṇēṇa vā vatthēṇa vā pattēṇa vā chattēṇa
vā uvāṇahaṇēṇa vā jō jēṇa atthī tassa taṁ saṁpāḍēmi । taṁ suṇiya samāgayā bahavē pāṇiṇō । taō sō tēsi piṁḍiyāṇaṁ
paṁthaguṇē sāhēi - "bhō bhō lōyā ! nivvui- puraṁ pai payaṭṭāṇaṁ dōnni pahā । ujjugō vaṁkō ya । tattha ṇaṁ jō sō kō
tattha ṇaṁ paē paē payāṇi, ṭhāṇē ṭhāṇē patta- puphpha-phalamaṇōharā mahīruhā, sulahāṇi bhōyaṇāṇi, suhaṁ suhēṇa gammai । 
paraṁparāē sō vi ujjaya-pahaṁ samōyarai । aō tēṇa cirakālēṇa nivvuipuraṁ pāvijjai । jō puṇa ujjugō tēṇa
lahuṁ gammai । kicchēṇa ya kahaṁ ? sō aīvavisamō sahō ya । tattha ōyārē cēva duvē mahāghōrā vaggha-sīhā parivasaṁti । 
tē tappa caiva maggaō laggaṁti amuyaṁtāṇa ya paṁthaṁ na pahavaṁti । avasāṇaṁ ca jāva aṇuvati rukkhā ya ēttha ēgē
manōharā । tēsi puṇa chāyāsu vi na vīsamiyavvaṁ । māraṇappiyā khu sā chāyā । parisaḍiya paṁḍu-pattāṇaṁ puṇa ahō muhuttagaṁ
vīsamiyavvaṁ ti । manōhara rūva-dhāriṇō mahura- vayaṇēṇaṁ' ēttha maggataraṭṭiyā bahavē purisā hakkārēti tēsi vayaṇaṁ na sōyavvaṁ । 
satthigā ya khaṇaṁ pina mōttavvā । ēgāgiṇō ya niyamā bhayaṁ duraṁtō ya ghōrō davaggī appamattēhi 'ulhavēyavvō । 
aṇōlhavijjatōya niyamēṇa dahai । puṇō ya duggucca pavvaō appamattēhi' caiva laṁghēyavvō । alaṁghaṇē niyamā marijjai । "
puṇō mahai ai-guvila-gavvarāvaṁsa" kuḍaṁgī sigghaṁ laṁghēyavvā । tammiṭhiyāṇaṁ bahū dōsā । taō lahugō khaḍḍō । tassa samīvē
maṇōrahō nāma baṁbhaṇō niccaṁ sannihiō acchai । sō bhaṇai - "maṇāgaṁ pūrēha "ēyaṁ ti tassa vayaṇaṁ na sōyavvaṁ sō ṇa purēyavvō"
sō khu pūrijjamāṇō mahallatarō havai । puriḍaṁ na sakkā, paṁthāō ya bhajjijjai । phalāṇi ya ēttha divvāṇi paṁcappayārāṇi
nētāharā । gāṇaṁ na pēkkhiyavvāṇi na vā bhōktavvāṇi । bāvīsaṁ ca ṇaṁ ēttha ghōrā mahākarālā pisāyā । khaṇaṁ
khaṇamabhiddavāṁta tē viṇaṁ na gaṇēyavvā । bhattapāṇaṁ ca ēttha vibhāgaō virasaṁ dullahaṁ catti, uppayāṇagaṁ caiva na kāyavvaṁ
aṇavarayaṁ ca gaṁtavvaṁ rattīē vi dō cēva jāmāsu viyavvaṁ sēsa dugē gaṁtavvamēva । ēvaṁ ca gacchaṁtēhi dēvāṇuppiyā ! khippāmēva
aḍavī laṁghijjai । laṁghittā ya tamēgaṁtadōgaccavajjayaṁ pasatthasivapuraṁ pāvijjai । jattha ṇaṁ na jarā na maccū na ya iṭṭhaviōgō.
nāṇisaṁpaōgō, na vā kēi kilēsa tti । taō tattha kēi tēṇa samaṁ payaṭṭā jē ujjugēṇa gaṁtu-maṇā । anē puṇa iyarēṇa
paha । viyā । taō sō patthē divasē uccaliō । puraō vaccaṁtō maggaṁ āhaṇai, silāisu ya paṁthassa dōsaguṇa-pisuṇagāṇi akkha-
rāṇi lihai । ēttiyaṁ gayaṁ ēttiyaṁ sēsaṁ ti vibhāsā । ēvaṁ jē tassa niddēsē vaṭṭiyā tē tēṇa samaṁ acirēṇa taṁ puraṁ pattā । jē vi
lihiyāṇusārēṇa sammaṁ gacchati tē vi pāviti । jē na vaṭṭiyā na vā varhiti sīyalachāyāisu paḍisēviṇō tē na pattā na
na yā vi pāviti ēyaṁ davvapahanāyaṁ । saṁpayaṁ bhāvapahanāē jōijjai । satthavāhatyāṇīyā arahaṁtā । ugghōsaṇā - thāṇīyā

vēhī ya । bīō puṇa sajjakkhō samaraviyakkhaṇō ya । aṇṇayā pāraddhō tāṇa piyā sattu naridēṇa vēḍhiyaṁ nayaraṁ । niruddhā niggama-
pavēsā । vinnattō surasēṇēṇa rāyā--" tāya ! visajjēsu maṁ jēṇa parāṇīyaṁ parājiṇāmi" । visajjiō rannā । sasahāō
pattō parāṇīyaṁ । jattha jattha saddaṁ suṇēi tattha tattha sāvaṇaghaṇō vva niraṁtaraṁ nārāya-dhārā-dhōraṇīhi varasiumāraddhō ' । iō taō
visaṁṭhalaṁ 'vayaṁtō samaraṁgaṇō viyāṇiō vi pakkha nariṁda jōhēhi । jahēsa aṁdhō sahavēhī ya । taō bharaṁ kāūṇa avayaṇā cēva tadu-
vari nivaḍiyā । ētyaṁtarē jaṇayāṇunnāō pavara- karivarārūḍhō samāgaō samarasasīsaṁ vīrasēṇa kumārō । tahā jujjhiuṁ pavattō
jahāpayaṁḍa pavaṇa-paṇōlliyaṁ va mēhavaṁdaṁ disōdisa paṇaṭṭha sattubalaṁ । mōyāviō jēṭṭa-bhāyā । pattā raṇaṁgaṇē jayapaḍāyā ।

tassa kā utpattī ? tattha thūlabhaddasāmiṇō dō sīsā dasa puvvadharā - ajjamahāgirī ajjasuhatthī ya । tēsiṁ
dōnhaṁ pi thūlabhaddasā miṇā pihaṁ siṁhaṁ gaṇā diṇṇā । tahā vi piīvasēṇa ēkkaō cēva viharaṁtī । aṇṇayā ya kayāi

sāhuṇō sapariyaṇō abbhuṭṭiō dhaṇō । vaṁdiūṇa sabahumāṇaṁ paḍilāhiyā maṇuṇṇāhārēṇa । sō vi sāvasēsō tēhi gahiō

kuṇālakahā
49
pucchiyā sāhuṇō- " kimēsa varāō ?" sāhūhi bhaṇiyaṁ - " bhayavaṁ ! piṁḍōlagō ēsa । " taō sūrīhi diṇṇasuyanāṇīva-
ōgēhi 'pavayaṇapabhāvagō bhavissaitti kaliūṇa bhaṇiō - " bhadda ! jai pabvayāhi tō dēmō tē jahicchiyamāhāraṁ । "
'ēvaṁ hōu 'ti tēṇa paḍivaṇṇē avvattasāmāiyaṁ dāūṇa dikkhiō bhuṁjāviō ya siṇiddhāhārēṇa । paōsasamaē jāyā
visūiyā । samupapannavēyaṇō sūrīhi sammaṁ paḍiyariō 'ahō dhammāṇubhāvō' tti saṁjāyasuhapariṇāmō mariūṇa samuppannō
aṁdhayakuṇālakumārassa puttō kō sō kuṇālō ? kahaṁ vā aṁdhaō jāō ?" tti ēyaṁ sāhijjai । 
kuṇālakahā-
atthi ihēva jaṁbuddīvē dīvē bhārahē vāsē gōllavisaē caṇayaggāmō nāma gāmō । tattha ya riuvēya-jajuvvēya-athavva-
ṇavēya- sāmavēyajāṇagō sikkhā vāgaraṇa- kappa chaṁda-nirutta-jōisaviyakkhaṇō mīmāṁsā nāya - vitthara - viū dhamma-sattha-viyāra-
caurī caṇī nāma māhaṇō । sō ya mahāsāvagō । tassa gharēsu ya sāgarābhihāṇā sūriṇō ṭhiyā । 
aṇṇayā ya tassa māhaṇassa ghariṇī sāvittī nāma samuggayadāḍhaṁ dārayaṁ pasūyā । uciyasamaē nāmaṁ kayaṁ
cāṇakkō ti । pāḍiō sūrīṇa pāēsu sāhiō dāḍhavuttaṁtō । sūriṇā bhaṇiyaṁ - "rāyā bhavissai । gharaṁ gaēṇa citiyaṁ
māhaṇēṇa" - kaha mahaṁ puttō bhaviyamaṇēgāṇatthanibaṁdhaṇaṁ mahāraṁbhāipāvadvāṇakāraṇaṁ rajjaṁ karissai ? tā tahā karēmi jahā na
karēi ēsa rajjaṁ" ti । ghaṭṭāō dāḍhāō । puṇō vi sāhiyaṁ gurūṇaṁ । tēhi bhaṇiyaṁ, duṭṭu kayaṁ : jaō----

</lg>

gamēs cāṇakkō । aṇṇayā kayāi gayā cāṇakka-ghariṇī bhāi vivāhē pēiya-dharaṁ । aṇṇāō vi mahiṛiḍhayamāhaṇapariṇīyāō

ravi vēḍhiyaṁ nayaraṁ । bhaggaṁ ca । ēvaṁ bhaṁjiūṇa taṁ nagaraṁ gayā pāḍaliputtaṁ । nissaṁcāraṁ ca rōhiuṁ ṭhiyā । karēi ya taṁ

ca tēhi jahā 'ēkkarahēṇa jaṁ sakkasi taṁ nīṇēhi । ' taō naṁdarāyā 'dhiddhi ti rāyalacchīē kharṇādiṭṭhaṭṭhāē jā khaṇamēttaṁ
ramaṇīyā hōūṇa viṇā vi kāraṇēṇa sahasā khalamahila vva vilōṭṭaī iya citayaṁtō dō bhajjāō ēgaṁ ca kannayaṁ pahā-
parayaraṇāṇi ya rahē samārōviūṇa niggaō । niggacchaṁtassa ya sā kaṇṇayā caṁdaguttaṁ palōiumāḍhattā । taō taṁ palōyaṁtīṁ
daṁdū ṇa bhaṇiyā naṁdarāiṇā - 'bhaddē ! jai rōyai tā baccāhi । ' taō naṁdarāiṇā ēvaṁ bhaṇiyā samāṇī uttinnā rahāō
caṁdaguttarahaṁ ca samāruhaṁtīē bhaggā nava aragā । 'avasauṇō'tti mama maṇṇamāṇēṇa nivāriyā caṁdaguttēṇa । cāṇakkēṇa
bhaṇiyaṁ -'mā nivārēsu navapurisajugāṇi tuha rajjaṁ hōhiitti mahāsauṇō ēsa । taō samārūḍhā kaṇṇayā rahammi paviṭṭhā
yaḥ tē tayarabbhaṁtarē । vibhattaṁ dōhiṁ vibhāgēhi savvaṁ rajjaṁ । taō paviṭṭhā rāya bhavaṇaṁ diṭṭhā pavarapallaṁkagayā tattha ēgā
kaṇṇagā । taō cāṇakkēṇa 'sattukaṇṇayā sōhaṇā na bhavissai' tti citiūṇa saṁlattō caṁdaguttō - ' jēṭṭhō bhāyā tuha ēsō,
pariṇīyā tara ēgā naṁdakaṇṇagā' 6 ēsā puṇa ēyassa havautti । bhaṇiūṇa nivāriō caṁdaguttō । taō mahayā vicchaḍḍēṇa
samāḍhattā rāya - kraṇṇayā pariṇēuṁ pavvayagēṇa । taō gahiō karō kaṇṇagāē nariṁdēṇa jāva ya payāhiṇī karēi huyāsaṇaṁ tāva kaṇṇagā
karāō vibhāvi tti kāuṁ saṁkataṁ ghōravisaṁ । takkhaṇaṁ sa tassa pavvayagarāiṇō । taō sō vi savēgavēvirasarīrō ēvaṁ bhaṇi-

'saṁbhāmi visaṁ' ti jāvāṇavēi purisē tāva cāṇakkēṇa aibhīsaṇā bhiuḍī kayā nīīvayaṇamiṇaṁ saraṁtēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ caṇēṇa-'

<lg n="625">
  <l>iya vāiūṇa tattō ciṁtara maṁtī subaṁdhunāmō sō</l>
  <l>dhisi dhisi maha buddhīē maēṇa jō māriō tēṇa</l>
</lg>
<lg n="626">
  <l>maimāhappaṁ sō cciya cāṇakkō dharau jīvalōgammi</l>
  <l>jēṇa maēṇa vi ahayaṁ jiyaṁtamayagō viṇimmaviō</l>
</lg>
<lg n="627">
  <l>iya citiūṇa tō sō viṇṇāsittā aṇāhapurisammi</l>
  <l>jīviyaluddhō dhaṇiyaṁ ciṭṭhai varasāhu kiriyāē</l>
</lg>
<lg n="628">
  <l>kiṁtu abhavvattaṇaō bhāvavihṇō bhavammi bhīmammi</l>
  <l>bhamihī anaṁtakālaṁ visahaṁtō tivvadukkhāī</l>
</lg>
tassa ya biṁdusārassa puhaitilayāē dēvīē aṇuratta - patta-niyarō chāyāsamanniō samāṇaṁdiyabahujaṇō asōgataru vvva
saṁjāō asōgasirī nāma puttō । sō ya jōvvaṇatthō 'sayala kalā kalāvakaliō' tti kāūṇa nivēsiō piuṇā juvarāya-paē । 
uvara" piyarammi caiva maṁti-sāmaṁtāiēhi ahisittō rajjē । rajjadhuramaṇupālayaṁtassa ya samuppannō kuṇālā bhihāṇō puttō । 
bālattaṇē cēva ṭhāviūṇa juvarāyapaē 'uvarayajaṇaṇīō' tti sāvakkaya-māyābhaēṇa pahāṇa - maṁti-pariyaṇasamēō dāūṇa ujjēṇīṁ
kumārabhuttī pēsiō । tattha aisiṇēhēṇa ya paidiṇaṁ sahattha lihilē hē pēsēi । 
aṇṇayā ya kalāgahaṇajōggaṁ nāūṇa kumāraṁ mahaṁtaē uddisiūṇa lihiyaṁ lēhammi rāiṇā 'adhīyatāṁ kumāraḥ' iti । 
paḍivāiūṇa lēhaṁ 'aṇuvvā ṇakkharaṁ' ti asaṁvattiūṇa tattha cēva ṭhāṇē mōttūṇa uṭṭiō sarīracitāē rāyā, rāyapāsōva-
viṭṭhāē' kuṁmāra-savakkī-jaṇaṇīē kassa rāyā savvāyarēṇa lēhaṁ lihai' tti citiūṇa vāiō । niyaputtarajjatthiṇīē yadiṣṇō
akārassōvara biṁdū, mukkō tammi cēva ṭhāṇē । samāgaēṇa rāiṇā ' hatthamukkalēhō paḍivāiō vi puṇōvi paḍiva । iyavō'
tti vayaṇamasumaraṇa saṁvattiō । muddiūṇa ya diṇṇō lēhavāhayahatthē । tēṇa vi gaṁtūṇa samappiō kuṇālassa । tēṇa vi
lēhayassa । sō vi vāittā ṭhiō tuhikkō caiva । kumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - kiṁ na vāēsi lēhaṁ ? " tahāvi na kiṁpi jaṁpa । 
taō sayamēva ghēttūṇa vāiō jā pēcchai 'aṁdhīyatāṁ kumāraḥ' iti taō bhai amha mōriyavaṁsē savvē vi appasihaya-
āṇā, jaha ahaṁ pi tāyassa āṇaṁ laṁghēmi tā kō aṇṇō pālissai ?' kiṁ ca jai ēvaṁ tāyassa diyaṁ tō ēvaṁ cēva
kīraitti tattasalāyaṁ gihiūṇa aṁjiyāō dōvi acchīō । jāō vicakkhū । purisēṇa vi gaṁtūṇa jahaṭṭhiyaṁ kahiyaṁ rāiṇā । 
imaṁ ca sōūṇa mahāsōgābhibhūēṇa citiyaṁ rāiṇā ।

tā 'kimaṁdhassa rajjēṇa ?' diṇṇō ēgō gāmō । savakkiputtassa ya diṇṇā kumārabhuttīē ujjēṇī । kuṇālō vi aīva-
gaṁdhabva-kalā-kusalō, gaṁdhavvadasattō cēva ciṭṭhas । 
ētthaṁtarasmi ya sō kōsaṁbī - damaga- jīvō ajjasuhatthi sayā sagahiya avvattasāmāiyapabhāvāō samuppanō tassa
kuṇālassa bhajjāē sarayasirīē gabbhammi puttattāē । saṁjāō yatisu māsēsu vaikkaṁtēsu jiṇa sāhu pūya । idōhalō । pūriō

jāīsaraṇaṁ । sumariya puvvabhavavaiyarō । gaō sūrisamī । vaṁdiyā sūriṇō । viyasiyavayaṇakamalēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ rāhaṇā- 'bhayavaṁ !

jugāijigida-pari-
tā ēyammi cēva guṇagaṇē paidiṇaṁ payattō kāyavvōtti bhaṇiūṇa mōṇamāsiyā sūriṇā । rāyā vi vaṁdiūṇa sūri-
payapaṁkayaṁ gaō saṭṭāṇaṁ, siṁhāsaṇanisatrēṇa sa bahumāṇaṁ saṁbhāsiūṇa bhaṇiyā sēvāgayā rāyāṇō--
<lg n="665">
  <l>bhō bhō ! jai maṁ mannaha sāmīsamaṇāṇaṁ paṇamaha suvihiyāṇaṁ</l>
  <l>kārēha ya jiṇabhavaṇē jirṇābiṁbē ṭhāvahā rammē</l>
</lg>
<lg n="666">
  <l>kārēha mahājattaṁ abhaya yāṇaṁ ca aṭṭhadivasāṇi</l>
  <l>diṭṭhāṇusāraō cciya rahanikkhamaṇaṁ payaṭṭēha'</l>
</lg>
<lg n="667">
  <l>samaṇāṇa suvihiyāṇaṁ vasaṇāsaṇa - sējja vasahimāīhi</l>
  <l>aṇutappaha paidiyahaṁ ēvaṁ khupiyaṁ kathaṁ 2 majjha</l>
</lg>
<lg n="668">
  <l>vitā paviṇā visajjiyā niya niē ṭhāṇēsu</l>
  <l>gaṁtūṇa jahāsatti kuṇaṁti jaṁ rāiṇā iṭṭha</l>
</lg>
<lg n="669">
  <l>ēvaṁ baccai kālō visuddhasammattapālaṇa rayassa</l>
  <l>samaṇajaṇa caraṇajuyaṁ bhattīē sayā namaṁtassa</l>
</lg>
annayā kamāi citiyaṁ rāiṇā -- 'jahā āriyā tāva paṇṇaviyā jai aṇāriēsu vi sāhuvihārō bhavai tā sōhaṇaṁ' ti
mannamāṇēṇa bhaṇiyā aṇāriyā ' 'jahā jahā mama purisā tubbhē karaṁ maggati tahā tahā dijjaha" । taō pēsiyā sāhu-rūva-
dhāriṇō purisā । bhaṇati ya tē jahā - ' amhaṁ bāyālīsa dōsavisuddhavasahi bhatta-pāṇa-vattha- pattāiyaṁ dijjai, imaṁ imaṁ ca aṇṇa
paḍhaṇāiyaṁ kijjai taō rāiṇāṁ piyaṁ bhavai । ' aṇāriyā vi rāiṇō tōsagatthaṁ tahēva savvaṁ karēṁti । ēvaṁ ca sāhusāmā-
yārīē bhāviēsu aṇāriyakhēttēsu vinnattā sūriṇō -- jahā 'bhayavaṁ ! kimaṇāriēsu na viharati sāhuṇō ?” gurūhi bhaṇiyaṁ-
'jaō tattha nāṇāī nōvasappati । ' raṇṇā bhaṇiyaṁ - 'kiṁ kāraṇaṁ ?' sūrīhiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ - 'na yāṇaṁti tē samaṇa- sāmāyāri । " raṇṇā

lōēhi bhaṇiyaṁ -- ' sirihara ! kō ēsa gaṁdhārō !" tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ — suṇēha । '

gaṁdhārakahā-
,
1
-
atthi marumaṁḍalē marutthalō nāma gāmō । tattha ṇaṁ gaṁdhārō nāma pasuvālō parivasai । sō puṇa payaīē cēva bhaddagō
dāruī ya । aṇṇā gimhayālē ayavaḍaṁ gahāya mahāḍavimaṇupaviṭṭhō । iō taō pariyaḍaṁtassa jāyā dōvāharī । 
gimhuṇhaparitāviō' paviralacchāyassa maggāsannakarīrataruṇō talē niviṭṭhō ēgēṇaṁ accatapivāsā parisusiya-kaṁṭhōṭṭhēna,'
mucchāvasa vilaṁba lēṇa, vigayajīviyāsēṇa, kaha kaha vi viṇissaraṁ tāvattavayaṇēṇa pahiēṇa jalabhariyadīyaḍaparigayaṁ gaṁdhāraṁ
daṭṭhūṇa vaddhō tēṇa aṁjalī । pasuvālēṇa citiyaṁ --- 'ahō ! saṁkaḍamāvaḍiyaṁ, jai ēyaṁ pāēmi tō maha maraṇaṁ, aha na pāēmi
tō abbhatthaṇā bhaṁgakaraṇaṁ, tā kiṁ pavajjāmi ahavā bhavē bhavē sulahā pāṇā - pāṇiṇaṁ dulahaṁ parōvayārakaraṇaṁ 'tti mantramāṇēṇa
pāīō pahiō niṭṭhiyaṁ jalaṁ । pahiēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- ' mahābhāga ! tuha saṁtiyā mē pāṇā tā jai kaha vibhaviyavvayāni-
yōgēṇa vissaurē gaṁtavvaṁ bhē bhavai vissaṁbharabhavaṇaṁ pucchiūṇa pavisiyavvaṁ । ” pasuvālēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ēvaṁ karissāmi tti । bhaddaṁ tē
bhavautti bhaṇiūga gaō pahiō, pattō marutthalagāmaṁ । pasuvālēṇa vi samāhūyaṁ avaḍaṁ, caliō sa gāmābhimuhaṁ jāvajjavi
thēvaṁtaraṁ na gaccha tāvallayā yava- pivāsāhi pīḍiō chōḍhaṇa samipāyavakōḍharē siraṁ, ṭhiō khaṇamēgaṁ,' pacchā mukkō pāhi । 
paōsē athavaḍaṁ nāgayaṁ' ti garvēsaṇatthaṁ niggayā sayaṇāiō । taō nirūvayaṁtēhi diṭṭhō vimukkajīviō । āūṇagāmaṁ
sakkāriō । vissaṁbharēṇa vi muṇiyavaiyarēṇa gaṁdhārasakkāraṭṭhāṇē kāriyaṁ niyadīṇārēhi dēulaṁ gaṁdhārapaḍimā ya, tayaggaō"
mahātalāyaṁ ca khāṇiyaṁ । tatō 'ahō mē jahaṇṇattaṇaṁ ! jēṇa parapāṇēhi niyapāṇā rakkhiyā, tā karēmi kiṁ pi vayavisēsaṁ
jēṇa tassa vi mahāṇubhāvassa uvayariyaṁ bhavai । ' ēvaṁ mahayā nivvēēṇa paḍivaṇṇō tāvasavayaṁ । paḍhamadiṇē caiva bhāsiyamaṇēṇa-
'jamahaṁ ki pi kusala karēmi tassaddhaṁ mē pāṇadāyagassa 'bhaṇiyamāraddhō dukkaraṁ tavaṁ taviuṁ । maraṇakālē jai phalamimassa
tavavisēssa vijjai tāhaṁ tassa nikkāraṇabaṁdhuṇō paramōvayārissa jammaṁtarē vi paccuvayārakāragō havijja' tti kaya niyāṇō
mariūṇa' vāṇamaṁtarō dēvō jāō । pasuvālō vi payappayāṇasamāvajjiyapuṇṇēṇa pagai dāṇa- rasiyattaṇēṇa ya mariūṇa samuppanō
kaṇayapurē kaṇayasēharō nāma rāyā । pasāhiyāsēsamahīmaṁḍalō rajjamaṇupālēi ।

gaṁdhāra - sāvayaudāharaṇaṁ

paḍhaṁtagā tammāsēhi paḍhati । ' tīē vi tahēva saṁpāḍiyaṁ । paccūsē cēva cakkhubhaēṇa gharamajjhē chōḍhūṇa pāēti । kaṇiṭṭhō
kummā daṭṭhūṇa saṁkai । 'mā ēyāō macchyiāō bāhiṁ viṇiggaō vamēi । tassa sakāē ēvaṁ vamaṁtassa vaggulī vāhī
saṁjāō । kālēṇa khijjiya maō । bīō puṇa ciṁtēi । māyāē sāhiyā ya paramōsahaṁ kiṁ pi dēi jēṇa vannō, balaṁ,
buddhī-mēhāiguṇagaṇō pavaḍḍhai । " ēvaṁ ṇissaṁkitō piyai tēṇācirēṇāhītaṁ sayalasuhāṇabhāgī gharasāmitō ya saṁvr̥tta । tā
thēvā va saṁkā avisaē mahāṇatthanibaṁdhaṇā kiṁ puṇa savvavisayā, atō duvihā vi saṁkā dhammatthiṇā na kāyabvā । saṁkē
tti gayaṁ । 
saṁpai kaṁkhā bhaṇṇai sā vi duvihā । dēsakakhā - savvakaṁkhā ya । dēsakaṁkhāē ēvaṁ sasarakkhāidaṁsaṇaṁ kakhai । savvakaṁkhāē
savvāṇi vi daṁsaṇāṇi ' sōhaṇāṇi । ēsā duvihā viṇa kāyavvā । tatthōdāharaṇaṁ । 
kaṁkhōvari udāharaṇaṁ--
ēgammi ṇagarēra rāyā amaccō ya vivarīya sikkhiyaturaṁgamēhi avahariya mahāvi pavēsiyā taō gacchaṁtēhi na
ēē sahāvatthā turaṁgama tti kaliūṇa' mukkā । iō taō pariyatā diṇayarakara-abbhāhayā-gadula- jalāṇi ya pīyā kaṁda-mūla-
phalāṇi u khāiumāraddhā । jahā ēgadiṇaṁ tahā tiṣṇi diṇāṇi pacchāmiliō khaṁdhārō ṇiyattā nagarābhimuhā । pattā niya
niya gharaṁ । rāyā citēi - 'ahō ! amhē tiṇidiṇāṇi tavhā - chuhāhi accataṁ pīḍiyāō ajjasavisēsaṁ savvaṁ pi bhōttavvaṁ'
ti, sūyārē saddāvēi bhai ya - " arē ! jaṁ kiṁci ēttha dhannajāyaṁ kalamōyaṇāikaṇakuṁḍaguṁḍērapēyapajjaṁtaṁ taṁ savvaṁ raṁdhēūṇa
bhōyaṇasālāē maha puraō uvaṭuvēha' । ' tēhi vi tahēva saṁpāḍiyaṁ । taō rāyā taṁ daṭṭhūṇa pēcchaṇagaditaṁ karēi jahā pēcchṇaē
pacchā gaēhiṁ vi valiēhi kappaḍiyā dhāḍijjati, avagāsaṁ ca lahaṁti, ēvamahaṁ pi uṁḍēragāīyaṁ paḍhamaṁ bhakkhēmi, taō kala-
mōyagāiyāṇa, pacchā vi avagāsō bhavissai " tti citiūṇa thōvaṁ thōvaṁ savvāṇa vi pakkhaiō । aṭṭavasaṭṭōvagaō
visūiyāē matō । bhōgāṇa cukkō amaccō puṇa vējjavayaṇēṇa vamaṇa - virēcaṇāīyaṁ kāūṇa hiyaṁ miyaṁ thōvaṁ thōvaṁ pattō । 
bhōgāṇa ābhāgī jāō, tā kaṁkhā ihalōgē vi ēvaṁ duhāvahā, na kāyavvā dhammatthiṇā kaṁkhē tti gayaṁ । 
I
saṁpai vicikicchā sā puṇa dāṇa - sīla-tava-bhāvaṇā - baṁbhacēramāiyāṇaṁ phalaṁ asthi ṇatthi tti । ēvaṁviharūvā ēttha -
dāharaṇaṁ--
gaṁdhāramāvayaudāharaṇaṁ --
vasaṁtapurē nagarē, gaṁdhārasāvagō, vijjābalēṇa naṁdīsaravaraṁ cēiyabaṁdaō jāī । tassa puṇa dēvasaṁghaṁsēṇa' auccō
sarīravatthāīṇa" parimalō samucchalai । mittō ya taṁ pucchai - "vayaṁsa! kattō tē ēsa parimalō ?" tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - "gaṁdī-
saravaraṁ vijjābalēṇa cēiyavaṁdīō gacchāmi । tattha dēvasaṁghasēṇa ēsa parimalō" । mittēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - "vayaṁsa ! majjha vi dēsu
vijjaṁ । " tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ --" maṁdasattāṇa ṇa sijjhaha" । mittēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - ' avassaṁ 1 1 dāyavvaṁ 2 । dinā, vihāṇaṁ ca kahiyaṁ । 
jahā ki caudasīē tamaṁdhayārāē tamāē masāṇujjāṇapāyavē cauppāyaṁ sikkagaṁ baṁdhittā hiṭṭhā khāyaraṁgārakuṁḍagaṁṭhaviya tassa
majhē sūlō taduvari sikkagaṁ samāruhiya aṭṭhasayaṁ vārē vijjaṁ javittā, ēgō pāō chijjai, taō bīō, taō taiō,
taō cathē chinnē āgāsēṇa gammai' । tēṇa vi tahēva kayaṁ kālacauddasi rayaṇīē masāṇē sāhiumāḍhattō । itō ṇagaramajjhē
cōrō khattaṁ khaṇiūṇa ārakkhiyapurisēhi pāraddhō palāiūṇa tamujjāṇamāgaō । ārakkhiyā vi 'pabhāē gahissāmō'
ti ujjāṇaṁ vēḍhiya ṭhiyā । cōrō vi ujjāṇaṁ bhamaṁtō vijjāsāhagaṁ sikkagē uttaracarḍa karēmāṇaṁ pāsati । bhaṇai ya
- ki karēsi ? " sō bhaṇai vijjaṁ sāhēmi । " । cōrēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ kiṁ caḍuttaraṁ karēsi ? " sāhagō bhai " - vijjā-
siddhīē saṁsaō । maraṇaṁ puṇa sūlēṇa vā aṁgārēṇa vā dhuyamatthi । " cōrēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ --" kēṇa vijjā dinnā ? " tēṇa sāhagēṇa
bhaṇiyaṁ -- sāvagēṇa, cōrēṇa citiyaṁ --" sāvagō kīḍiyāē vi na maṁgulaṁ citēi । paraṁ ēsa nīsattō' tti na sijjhai !"
1. ṇāṇa ēsā pā0 । 2. khiipaiṭṭiyanayarē rā0pā0 । 3. sikkhēhiṁ tu0pā0 । 4. siyā taō gacchaṁtēhiṁ ṇa ēē
jē0 । 5. kaliya mu0pā0 । 6. sēsaṁ savvaṁ pi bhōtta0pā0 । 7. uvadvāvaha pā0 1
8. sai ēvaṁ citi0 pā0 । 9. dēva saṁthasēṇa jē0 । 10. sarīrabannāīṇa jē0 । 11. avalmē pā0 । 12. dāyavvō jē0 ।

jugāijiṇida- riya
cōrēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - " kiṁ tuha vijjāē ? gēvha imaṁ dhaṇaṁ, payacchasu sasāṇōvāyaṁ maha vijjaṁ । " tēṇa vi taṁ
cēva kayaṁ । cōrō vi gahiyavijjō samārūḍhō sikkagē । aṭṭhasayaṁ javiūṇa vijjaṁ ēkkasi cēva chiṇṇā cattāṁri vi
sikkagapāyagā । gaō āgāsaṁ । iyarō vi pabhāē sahōḍhō । ṇiggahiō ārakkhiēhiṁ ṇayalagatēṇa "bhēsiyā tē tēṇa takkarēṇa
- "arē ! pāvā, ṇiddōsamēyaṁ kayatyaṁtāṇa ṇatthi tē mōkkhō । muṁha mā bhē savvē vimārēhāmi । ṇagarōvari silaṁ
viubviya bhāēi । taō rāyā ādaṣṇō khāmēi taṁ ca vaṇiyaṁ mōēḍa cōrō vi sāgō jāō । ēvaṁ phalaṁ pai jahā takkarō
tahā hōyavvaṁ ṇivvittigicchatti gayaṁ । 
parapāsaṁḍapasaṁsā tatthōdāraṇaṁ--
pāḍaliputtē nagarē caṁdaguttō rāyā cāṇakkō maṁtī । annayā kahi avarāhē caṁdaguttēṇa bhikkhugāṇaṁ vittī' avahariyā
tē tassa dhammaṁ kahiumāraddhā, rāyā tūsati । cāṇakkaṁ palōēi na pasaṁsaṁti । rāyā na dēi । tatō tēhi
cāṇakkamahilāō laggiyā । tīē bhaṇiyaṁ -- “ kiṁ kāraṇāsēvā ? " tēhi bhaṇiyaṁ - "tahā karēsu jahā cāṇakkō rāyā puratō
amhē pasaṁda । " paḍivaṇṇamimāē tāva bhaṇiō jāva paḍivannamamaccēṇa । 
ammi diṇē - bhikkhugēhi rannō dhammē kahiē । cāṇakkēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- "ahō ! subhāsitaṁ " taō raṇṇā taṁ ca aṇṇaṁ ca
dinaṁ । bīsēvi ēvaṁ cēva diṇṇaṁ । taō cāṇakkēṇa citiyaṁ -- “ ahō ! maē dō vi lōgā virāhiyā ihalōē
tāva micchattapasaṁsāē lōyāṇa thirīkaraṇaṁ daviṇavvaō ya paralōē duggaī ya । " ēvaṁ vicitiya bhaṇiō aṇṇammi dinē
rāyā- -"kīsa tumaṁ bhikkhugāṇa dēsi ? " tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- "tubbhēhi pasaṁsiyaṁ "ti । cāṇakkēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- “ ahō sayaṁ savvāraṁbha
pavittā vi kahaṁ paraṁpattiyā cititi । pasaṁsitāṇa uṇa pattabuddhīē pacchā ṭhiō rāyā na dēi kēttiyā । cāṇakkasarisā
hōhiti jē puṇa maggē ṭhāhiti tamhā āīē cēva parapāsaṁḍapasaṁsā na kāyavvā । parapāsaṁḍapasaṁsaṁ, tti gayaṁ । 
--
iyāṇi para- pāsaṁḍisaṁthavō bhaṇṇai । tatthudāharaṇaṁ-
parapāsaṁḍasaṁthavōvari udāharaṇaṁ--
sōraṭṭhāvisaē ēgō gāmō sō puṇa rāṇā bhikkhugāṇaṁ caiva dinna । tattha ṇaṁ agē bhikkhuṇō parivasaṁti । 
aṇṇayā tē rattapaḍā parivaddulē kālē ujjēṇi pai patthiyā । sāvagī ya ēgō tēhi saha patthiō । tassa aṁtarā cēva
patthayaṇaṁ khīṇaṁ । citāulō tēhi bhaṇiō -- "amha saṁbalaṁ vahāhi tā tujjha vi dijjihī । sōpavūḍhō, ēgastha pāṇa-
bhōyaṇāsaṇa-sayaṇēhiṁ jāō sāvagassa tēhi saha saṁthavō । 
annayā sāvagassa pōṭṭasaraṇī jāyā । 'adharō' tti tēhi aṇukaṁpāē rattacīvarēh vēḍhiūṇa mukkō । arahaṁtāṇa namōkkāraṁ
karēṁtō tō dēvō jāō । ōhiṇā taccaniyarūvaṁ pāsati । āuṭṭō jahiṁ jahi bhikkhugāṇa bhōyaṇaṁ tahiṁ tahi bhatti-
viṇaggaēṇaṁ saṁbhūsaṇēṇaṁ hatthēṇaṁ parivēsēi । pabhāvaṇā taccaniyāṇaṁ ōhāvaṇā amhaccayasaḍḍhāṇaṁ । ēvaṁ vaccatē kālē vijjā-
siddhā sūriṇō samāgayā । sāvagā tāṇa uvaṭṭiyā savvaṁ parikarhēti । āyariyā bhaṇati --" jahā jayā hatthō ṇīsarati
tayā agahatthē ghēttūṇa bhaṇijjaha । 'bujjha bujjha gujjhagā mā mujjhati tēhi vi gaṁtūṇa aggahatthē ghēttūṇa 'ṇamō arahaṁtāṇaṁ' ti
paṁca padāni paṛhiūṇa bhaṇiō - - " bujjha " bujjha gujjhagā mā mujjha dullahaṁ bōhi mā hārēhiṁ ēttha ṇaṁ saṁbuddhō sō lōgassa
parikahēi । jahā - 'na ityadhammō avi ya jiṇasāsaṇē । ' taō jiṇasāsaṇē bhakti kāumāraddhō । kēttiyā ērisā āyariyā
bhavissaṁti jē micchattapaṁkabahuṁ uddharēhiti । tamhā āīē cēva parapāsaṁḍasaṁthavō na kāyavvō । parapāsaṁḍasaṁthavō tti gayaṁ । 
bhaṇiyaṁ sappabhēyaṁ sammattaṁ । 
iyāṇi aṇuṭhavayāi । tā duvālasamēō sāvagadhammō bhaṇṇati--
1. pabhāē । sa. luddhō gahiō pā0 । 2. tāsiyā pā0 । 3. tī hariyā jē0 ।

uḍḍhaṁ, ahō, tiricchaṁ tibhēyabhinnaṁ disāsu parimāṇaṁ । paḍhamaṁ guṇavvayamiṇaṁ aiyārē tassimē paṁca
uḍḍhāhatiridivāṇaṁ gahiyapamāṇaṁ na cēva laṁghējjā । khittassa vuḍḍhakaraṇaṁ kujjā sati aṁtaraddhaṁ ca
afsasa hōi guṇō ṇiyamā takkhēttavattijīvāṇaṁ । abhayavayāṇā 3 iharā maṇavaikāēhi sō vahagō
uvabhōgaparībhōgāṇa niyamaṇaṁ bīyaguṇavvayamimaṁ ca । aṇiyattāṇa ya dōsā virayāṇa ṇa hōṁti guṇabhāvā
bhōyaṇaō kammayaō duvihaṁ ēyaṁ samāsaō ṇēyaṁ । dōṇha vi jahā kamēṇaṁ aiyārā huṁtimē vīsaṁ
saccittaṁ paḍibaddhaṁ appauliduppaōliyaṁ ca āhāraṁ । tucchōsahibhakkhaṇayaṁ paḍhamassa imē ya aiyārā

sō vi pasirūvagajīvō causu vi gaīsu saṁsāramapāraṁ hiṁḍiūṇa kēṇa vi kālēna sijjhissa । thērī jīvō

bhaṁḍi'tti gavēsaṇatthaṁ bhaṁḍī । sāmiō vi tatthēvāgatō । diṭṭhō surūvō pucchiō - - " kahiṁ ṇē bhaṁḍī - baliddā vā ?" surūvā
bhaṇati - " ṇa yāṇāmi । " iyarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- "sakkhaṁ caiva gahiūṇa kahaṁ na yāṇasi ?" payaḍatakkarō vi ya lakkhiyasi । "
ēvaṁ vivayaṁtā diṭṭhā ṇagarāramviēṇa । ṇīyā garidasamīvaṁ । sāhiō bhaṁḍīvaiṇā jahaṭṭhiō vaīyarō । gahiō surūvō । 
iyarō mukkō । rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ -- “ arē ! sārahī hōūṇa bhaṁḍī - vaiyaraṁ pi ṇa yāṇasi ? " lahaṁ ṇagaramajjhē viḍaṁbiūṇa
sūlārōviyaṁ karēha । ” tahēva viḍaṁbiō । ṇīō sūlā samīvaṁ । ētyaṁtarē pavayaṇadēvayā ṇagarōvari mahāsilaṁ viuṭhivaūṇa
bhaṇiyāiyā - - " arē rē ! apatthiya-patthiyā patthivā ! jai surūvaṁ ṇirāvarāhaṁ mārissaha tō bhē savvē vi mārissaṁ । "
tatō rāyā dhūva-kaḍacchraya- hatthō saṇāgarō ēvaṁ bhaṇiumāḍhattō -- “diṭṭhō kōvō, saṁpayaṁ pasāyaṁ karēha । jaṁ bhagaha taṁ
karissāmō । ” taō saṁhariyā silā dēvayāē । rāyā vi saṇāgarō hatthi - baṁdhamāruhiūṇa gaō sammāṇiūṇa pavēsiō
surūvō । pucchiō vr̥ttaṁtaṁ । tēṇa vi jahaṭṭhiyaṁ savvaṁ sāhiyaṁ । taō raṇṇā parituṭṭhēṇa kaō rayaṇa-bhaṁḍāriō । jahā
gahiya dēsa virai-paripālaṇāparāyaṇō kālaṁ gamēi । 
aṇṇayā jōgga-suya-samārōviya - kuḍuṁbabhārō aṇuṇṇaviya rāyāṇaṁ suyasāgarāyariya-samīvē ṇikkhatō surūvō । gahiya
duviha-sikkhēṇa ahijjiyāṇi caudasapuvvāṇi । uppāḍiyaṁ ōhināṇaṁ । 
annayā aṇuṇṇaviya guruyaṇaṁ paḍivaṇṇō aṇasaṇaṁ । samāhiṇā mariūṇa savvaṭṭhē suravarō jāō । taō mahāvi-
dēhē sijjhihī । tā bhaddē ! pāṇivahaviraī sammaṁ paripāliyā guṇāvahā । jahā surūvassa virāhiyā duhāvahā jahā
paruivassa
saṁpayaṁ thūlamusāvāya viramaṇārāhaṇāē virāhaṇāē ya ēvaṁ cēvōdāharaṇaṁ bhaṇṇai--
viṇḍu-baṁbhakahā--
atha iva jaṁbuddīvē dīvē avaravidēhē vāsē vijayapuraṁ nāma nayaraṁ । tammi ya sayala - māhaṇa - pahāṇāṁ purisōttimō
nāma māhaṇō parivasai । gōrī sē bhāriyā । viṇhu-baṁbhanāmāṇō dōnni tāṇa taṇayā । pariṇīyāō tammi cēva nayarē
sirihara - siridēvābhihāṇāṇa baṁbhaṇāṇa lacchi lacchimatiṇāmiyāō dhūyāō । aṇṇayā uvaraō purisōttimō । gōrī vi
tēṇēva saha mayā । kathalōga vavahārā ghara kajjāṇi citiumāraddhā । viṇḍu-baṁbhā caṁdassēva caṁdimā, viṇhuṇō viva lacchī
accaṁta vallahā, viṇṭhussa lacchī । tīē puṇa jiṇadatta sāvaya-suyā jiṇamatī ṇāma bāla-vayaṁsiyā । aṇṇammi dinē gayā
jiṇamatī bhavaṇē lacchī । kayasammāṇā tīē diṇṇāsaṇā nisaṇṇā ṭhiyāō parōpparaṁ saṁkahāē khaṇamēgaṁ । taō uṭṭiyā
jiṇamatī । pucchiyā lacchīē- "piyasahi ! ki nimittaṁ kahā- rasavicchēyaṁ kāūṇa lahuṁ cēva uṭṭiyā ?" tīē bhaṇiyaṁ--
"cāummāsayaṁ pavvadiṇamajja । gaṁtavvaṁ (maē) sāhuṇisagāsē । gahiyavvaṁ cavvihāhārassa ahōrata-paccakkhāṇaṁ kāyavvaṁ
pōsahāiyaṁ pavvadiṇṇāṇadvāṇaṁ । sōyavvō dayāsārō jiṇappaṇīō dhammō । " lacchīē bhaṇiyaṁ -- "ahaṁ pi taē saha samāgami-
ssāmi dhamma-savaṇaṭṭā । " jiṇamaīē bhaṇiyaṁ “ kō kallāṇē virōhō ? " gayāō dō vi kallāṇasiri- gaṇaṇisamīvaṁ । 
vaṁdiyā gaṇiṇī । saṁbhāsiyā visēsēṇa lacchī । payāsiyaṁ guru dēva - dhamma-tattaṁ । ubhayalōgaduhāvahaṁ daṁsiyaṁ nisibhattaṁ । pasaṁsiṁyā
vitrēṇa dhamma - tarubīya bhūyā narāmara-siva sōkkhasāhigā jīvadayā । lacchīē bhaṇiyaṁ bhayavai ! sōhaṇō dhammō sōhaṇaṁtara 3
sammattāi-dhammasāhaṇaṁ । dēsu mē sammattapurassaraṁ nisi bhōyaṇaniyamaṁ । annē vi mahu-majja- maṁsa- paṁcuṁbari- parihārapahāṇē niyama-
visēsē । gaṇiṇīē bhaṇiyaṁ - "dhannā tumaṁ jīsē suī-savaṇē vi ērisī saddhā । visēsakajjaṁ vivajjiūṇa dinnō sammattamūlō

vihu-babhakahā
79
nisibhōyaṇaniyamō । ōsahāikajjaṁ parivajjiūṇa dinā mahu-majjāiṇa niyamā gahiyā lacchīē bhāvasāraṁ । bhagavatīē

viṇaṭṭhā jāṇavattajaṇā । ṇaṁdaṇō vi jalahijalē ṇimajjiūṇa ummajjiō diṭṭhō vēyālēṇa-- "arē ! pāva, ajja

āḍhattā jujjhiuṁ । ṇaṁdaṇō vi sāvasēsayāē āukammuṇō saṁpattaphalaha-khaṁḍō sattarattēṇa tariūṇa sāyaraṁ siṁghaladīvē laggō । 
diṭṭhō niyaōyaṇāgaēṇa muddhasiṭṭiṇā । pucchiō -- "vaccha ! kattō tumaṁ ?" tēṇa vi sāhiyā sabvā vi paukttī । ṇīō siṭṭiṇā
sagharaṁ । makkhiō sugaṁdhatēllēṇa sēiō usiṇōdaēṇa niyaṁsāviō pavaravatthāṇi, bhōyāviō appaṇā saddhi bhaṇiō
ya—“vaccha naṁdaṇa ! sagharaṁ tuha ēyaṁ na saṁkhōhō kāyavvō । jai bhaṇasi tō saṁbalaṁ dāūṇa kēṇa vi jāṇavattēṇa vijaya-
vaddhaṇē parāṇēmi । ” ṇaṁdaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - "vihaliyasayaladhaṇassa kiṁ mē vijayavaddhaṇēṇa ?" sēṭṭiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ -- " jai ēvaṁ tā

viraiyā tēṇa titthayarassa mālaī - kusumamālāhi pūyā । uppāḍiō ghaṇasārasammissō kālāgarudhūvō । vaṁdiō bhāvasāraṁ-

" patthēmi kiṁ pi jiṇavara ! jai vi tumaṁ dēva vīyarāgō si । taha vi ṇiya daṁsaṇaṁ dējja sāmi ! maha aṇṇa jammē vi ॥  । 840॥

maraṇavihī pucchijjai ? " taō lajjāē ṭhiō ahōmuhō sō juvāṇō । muṇiya sayalavittaṁ tēṇa tassa caiva vayaṁsaēṇa bhaṇiō

84
jugāijiṇiṁda-cariyaṁ
thēvadiṇamajjhē cēva vihaḍiō gharasārō । taō nāḍhāyaṁti baṁdhuṇō, maṁdāyarō pariyaṇō । gayā vi gaṇaṇā rāuladēulēsu । 
jīvaṁta vi mayagasamō jāō । jaō--
<lg n="841">
  <l>kō ēttha yā suhiō, kassa va lacchī thirāī pēmmāī</l>
  <l>kassa va na hōi khaliyaṁ bhaṇa, kō vi na khaṁḍiō vihiṇā</l>
</lg>
taō vārijjatō vi suhisayaṇēhiṁ payaṭṭō pavahaṇēṇa, laṁghiō jalanihī, gaō suvaṇṇadīvē । samāsāiō hiya-
icchiyalābhō । āgacchaṁtāṇa duvvātā hataṁ, bhiṇṇaṁ pavahaṇaṁ । jīviya vva sāvasēsayāē samāsāiyaphalaō, ayasabhīēṇa
va jalaṇihiṇā pakkhittō ēsa paratīrē । sisirapavaṇāliddhataṇūladdhacēyaṇō, sumiṇamiva maṇṇamāṇō, uṭṭiō puppha-phala-
kayāhārō, kaha kaha viṇiyagharaṁ pattō । tatō vihalavavasāyiṇaṁ attāṇayaṁ mannatō ēvaṁ maraṇamajjhavasitō । ” sāhuṇā
bhaṇiyaṁ – “bhadda! jiṇasēhara, paṁḍitamaraṇēṇa maramāṇō saṁsārahāṇi karēi । taṁ puṇa sāhūṇaṁ cēva, na gihatthāṇaṁ, tā jai tumaṁ
paṁḍiyamaraṇaṭṭiō tā karēsu savvasāvajjajōgaviratirūvaṁ khaṁtāidasavihaguṇagaṇālaṁkiyaṁ titthayarāimahāpurisasēviyaṁ
-
ṇiravajjaṁ pavvajjaṁ 'ti । jiṇasēharēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ “ bhagavaṁ ! ēvaṁ karēmi । gatō ṇiyadharaṁ । nivvattiyā sēsagharakāyavvō । 
pūiūṇa jahā vihavaṁ jiṇacēiyāṇi, sammāṇiya cauvvihasaṁghō, hāō kayabalikammō ' kayakōuya-maṁgala- pāyacchittō, dhavalaṁ-
suyāharaṇa-vilēvaṇō, sibiyārūḍhō dhammiyalōēhiṁ parivāriō mahāvibhūīē pattō bhagavaō abhayasēṇamuṇiṇā samīvaṁ । 
avayariō sibiyāō । vaṁdiō bhuṇī । āgamavihiṇā pavvāviō muṇiṇā । ṇaṁdaṇō vi sōūṇa jiṇasēharacariyaṁ
citimāraddhō — “ ahō ! visamaṁ jalaṇihitaraṇaṁ attharahiyāṇa ṇisārattaṇaṁ purisāṇa tā muddhasēṭṭhimēva musiūṇa ṇiyadēsaṁ
vaccāmi । ēvaṁ kalusiyacittō kālaṁ ativāhē । aṇṇammi diṇē bhaṇiō muddhēṇa ṇaṁdaṇō-- "vaccha ! ṇaīpūrasacchahaṁ
jīvāṇa jīviyaṁ, tā jai kaha vi ajāṇiyaṁ maha maraṇaṁ bhavējjā tā ēyammi paēsē aṭṭhārasasariyā aṭṭhārasahārā paṁcasapuḍā
suvaṇṇamayaiṭṭagāṇaṁ gahēyavvā", ēvaṁ bhaṇiūṇa dhammajjhāṇaparāyaṇō diṇāṇi aivāi muddhasēṭṭhī । ṇaṁdaṇō vi kalusiyacittō
gahiūṇa nihāṇasuvaṇṇagaṁ muttāhalāiyaṁ alakkhiō cēva muddhasēṭṭiṇā tāmalitti para patthiēṇa dattaṇāittagajāṇavattēṇa samaṁ
rayaṇīē palāṇō । pahāē paḍhamapaharāikkamē vi ṇa diṭṭhō muddhasēṭṭiṇā । saṁkiyamāṇasēṇa ṇirūviyaṁ nihāṇadvāṇaṁ na diṭṭha
suvannāiyaṁ । ṇivēiyaṁ gaṁtūṇa rāulē । “mahārāya ! muṭṭhō haṁ dēsaṁtarāgaēṇa ṇiyaḍibahulēṇa ṇaṁdaṇābhihāṇaṁ vaṇiyadāragēṇa । "
rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ -- “ kiṁ gataṁ ?" sēṭṭhiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ -- “ paṁcasuvaṇṇamayaiṭṭagā saṁpuḍā mahaṇāmakiyā aṭṭhārasasariyāē hārē ya
maha nāmaṁkiē cēva gahāya dattaṇāittagajāṇavattēṇa saha palāṇō saṁbhāvijjai । " tatō rāiṇā takkhaṇā cēva ṇirūviyaṁ
nāvākaḍagaṁ maggāṇulaggaṁ tāva gayaṁ jāva kaivayadiṇēhiṁ jāō saṁbhēḍō । pakkhariyaṁ dattaṇāittagēṇa pavahaṇaṁ । iyarēhiṁ vi
vēḍhiyaṁ samaṁtaō cēḍiyāhiṁ । pēsiō pahāṇapurisō kuḍhiēhi । bhaṇiō tēṇa gaṁtūṇa dattaṇāittagō - - " tuha pavahaṇē
gaṁdaṇō ṇāma vaṇiya dāraō । amha purē cōriyaṁ kāūṇa tuha jāṇavattēṇa sahāgaō taṁ vā samappēhi jujjhasajjō vā
bhavāhi । " dattēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - "jhujjhāmi । " na uṇa taṁ saraṇāgayaṁ samappēmi । dattavayaṇēṇa sannaddhō vaṁṭhavaggō । laggō
jujjhi saha ṇāviēhiṁ । ētyaṁtarē muccaṁtēsu ṇārāsu ṇivaḍamāṇāsu bhallīsu, aṁgōvaṁgiabbhiṁṭṭhatēsu kuṁtayarēsu, samaṁtaō
pāsāṇēsu paḍatēsu tattatēlladhārāṇivāyaḍajjhamāṇasavvaṁgēsu suhaḍēsu, satthappahāravihuriyaṁgēsu ṇitthuṇaṁtēsu kāyarēsu,
tattavāluyā ṇivāyaḍajjhamāṇasarīrēsu vi siṁhanāyaṁ muyaṁtēsu sāhasa - dhaṇēsu, kōvāvēsa - phuruphuritāhara dasaṇadaṭṭhōṭṭha-kōppariya-

saṁcaliyā bahavē pāṇigaṇā । tatō kāūṇa savisēsaṁ jiṇāyayaṇēsu pūyāō, paḍilābhēūṇa sāhuṇō, sammāṇiūṇa sāvaē,

āpūriya jamalasaṁkhō, māgahajaṇa - jaṇiya jayajayā rāvabhariyabhuvaṇōyarō " ṇamō jiṇāṇaṁ" ti bhaṇamāṇō, samārūḍhō pahāṇavēsarīē

bhōyaṇēṇa, kayāi apēyapāṇēṇa, kayāi ruṭṭhāṇi, kayāi tuṭṭhāṇi, kayāi mattāṇi, kayāi ummattāṇi, kālaṁ gamēbhō ।

salilā gayā jōgacaṁḍa - samīvaṁ । tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- "kēṇēvaṁ kathaṁ ?" tīē bhaṇiyaṁ -- "visayā sēvaṇaṁ pai patthiyāhaṁ । aṇiccha-

"vaccha ! dīṇā ralakkhaṁ giṇhasu । suṁdarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - "ēsō cēva dīṇāralakkhō jaṁ kaṇayasuṁdarī jīviyā । tatō sēṭṭhiṇā
citiyaṁ - " ahō mahicchyā ! ahō mahāṇubhāvayā ! ahō ṇirīhattaṇaṁ ! tā mahākūlappasūēṇa kēṇāvi bhaviyavvaṁ' ti
citiūṇa ēgaṁtē pucchiō jiṇamuhō sēṭṭhiṇā - " bhadda! kiṁ kulamalaṁkariyaṁ imiṇā tuha vayaṁsaēṇaṁ ? kattō samāgaō,
kāṇi vā nāmakkharāṇi ?" jiṇamuhēṇa vi sacca savittharaṁ sāhiyaṁ । tatō tuṭṭhō ṇiya māṇasē sēṭṭhī bhaṇiō
suṁdarō-- "vaccha ! ajja taē itthēva bhōktavvaṁ । " suṁdarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - "tattha jaṁ bhujjai taṁ tujjha sayaṁ caiva jaō--
------
<lg n="878">
  <l>uvayārēhi parōcciya ghēṇai agghaṁti tē tahi cēva</l>
  <l>iyarammi kī ramāṇā nēhābhāvaṁ payāsēṁti</l>
</lg>
1
taō pēsiō sēṭṭiṇā suṁdarī । gaō niyasatthaṁ । paccasasamaē sayamēva sēṭṭiṇā gaṁtūṇa sōvayāraṁ bhaṇiō - "vaccha !
pariṇēsu kaṇayasuṁdarī । " suṁdarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- " gurujaṇāyattō ēsa vaiyarō । tatō kajja majjhamavagacchiya gaō sagharaṁ sēṭṭhī । 
lēhaṁ samappiūṇa pēsiyā pahāṇa purisā । jayaṁtīē samappiō tēhi lēhō dhaṇasirīē vāiumāradvā । taṁ jahā - " bhaddē !
kaṁcaṇaurē ṇayarē kaṇagasārō sēṭṭhī sōvayāraṁ bhaṇati -- “ jahā atthēttha tumha suō suṁdarō ṇāma । jai bhagaha tō tassa
ṇiyaduhiyaraṁ kaṇagasuṁdara dēmō । " dhaṇasirīē bhaṇiyaṁ -- “ kō kallāṇē virōhō mukuluggaēṇa dhaṇavaṁtapaṇa' bhuvaṇayalapasariya-
jasēṇa saralēṇa sajjaṇēṇaṁ na sammatō kassa saṁbaṁdhō ? supurisasuṁdarabuddhīē suṁdara suṁdarassa savvaṁ pijaṁ jaṁ uciyaṁ taṁ taṁ
karēsu ki bahuviyārēṇa ?" jayasuṁdarī sammaēṇa lihīūṇa ēvaṁvihō paḍilēhō samappiō tāṇa । gayā tē kaṁcaṇauraṁ । samappiō
lēhō sēṭṭissa । sō vi avagayatthō harisavasavisaṭṭaṁtalōyaṇajyalō lēhaṁ gahāya gaō suṁdarasamīvaṁ । lēhaṁ daṁsiūṇa bhaṇitō
suṁdarō- "vaccha ! saṁpayaṁ kimuttaraṁ ?” suṁdarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- "jaṁ bhaṇaha tattha sajjō imō jaṇō । " tatō samāhūtō saṁvaccha-
riō । kayasammāṇō pucchiō pariṇayaṇavāsaraṁ । tēṇa vi jēṭṭa-sukkilapakkhē sōmē navamīē sāhitō । tatō pāraddhā mahayā
vicchaḍḍēṇa vivāhasāmaggī sēṭṭhiṇā । paramānaṁdabharaṇibbharāṇa samāgaō sō divasō । pariṇīyā kaṇagasuṁdarī suṁdarēṇa ।

dappaṇā, ubhayapāsa nibaddha-caṁdaṇamālā, duvāradēsa-vimukka payapuṇṇa paumappihāṇakaṇaya-kalasā, maṇimaya-paīvapaṇāsiyaṁdhayārā,

  <l>ētthaṁtarammi kumarō nivvattiya sayalasaṁjhakariṇijjō</l>

dēva ! uḍḍhaṁ ahō tiricchaṁ pasariya-kara-niyara - pahaya- timirēṇaṁ । tuha jasadhavalā vidharā puṇō vidhavalīkayā sasiṇā ॥ 1011॥
aṇṇēṇa paḍhiyaṁ--
<lg n="1012">
  <l>sasisippiēṇa karakuccaēhiṁ dhavalīkaēsu bhavaṇēsu</l>
  <l>puṁḍarigiṇī virāiyaamayarasēṇaṁ va ōhaliyā</l>

</lg>
taṁ ca kērisa--
jalaṁ tadīvarāhayaṁ virāyamāṇapaṁkayaṁ । phuraṁta mōttiunbharḍa ghaḍaṁtacaṁdaṇukkaḍaṁ
vidinna dēvadusayaṁ visaṭṭamāṇagaṁdhayaṁ । visāla tuṁgatōraṇaṁ viyaḍḍhacittacōraṇaṁ
saṁsārasōkkhakāraṇaṁ nibaddhamattavāraṇaṁ ti॥1014॥

jugāijiṇiṁda-cariyaṁ
<lg n="1025">
  <l>daṭṭhūṇa sūrapurisaṁ udayattha kāyarō vva samarammi</l>
  <l>saṁkōḍiyakaraniyarōṁ naṭṭō caṁdō nirāṇaṁda</l>
</lg>
ēyaṁ sōūṇa viuddhō kumārō । kayagōsakariṇajjaṁ, paṇaō dēva- gurū-calaṇāṇa, taō paṇāmapurassaraṁ bhaṇiō vairasēṇō
kumārēṇa --- " tāya ! visajjasu maṁ । tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- " kumāra ! ciṭṭhasu ihēva kaivayadiṇāṇi । " tayaṇurōhēṇa ṭhiō kumārō । 
aṇṇayā puṇō vibhaṇiō -- " tāya ! visajjēsu maṁ । " taō nāūṇa kumaranicchyaṁ samaṁ sirimaīē pahāṇapariyaṇēṇa ya
visajjiō bāhullalōyaṇēṇaṁ । puṇō puṇō sirimaī niyaṁtēṇaṁ daiyā sahiēṇa imaṁ bhaṇitō kumārō garidēṇa- jammaṁtaranēhēṇaṁ
kumāra ! tuha sirimaīē saṁbaṁdhō ghaṛiō । taha vi bhaṇijjasi havijja bhaddāē bhahō ti । 
.
<lg n="1026">
  <l>kumarēṇa taō bhaṇiyaṁ, niyayaguṇēhi pi sirimaī garuyā</l>
  <l>taha vi hu jaṁ girigaruō vi tāya tajjēsi sō' kappō</l>
</lg>
<lg n="1027">
  <l>caṁdaṇa cacciyadēhā niyatsu pasattha- vattha - ruiraṁgī</l>
  <l>nara-nāri-nayaṇa kuvalaya- karaṁbiyā sē sagāyalayā</l>
</lg>
<lg n="1028">
  <l>niyajaṇaṇi-jaṇaya-pariyaṇa-sōyāsiṇi-baṁdhuvagga pariyariyā</l>
  <l>kumarēṇa samaṁ kumarī saṁcaliyā niyayagēhāō</l>
</lg>
<lg n="1029">
  <l>thēvaṁtaraṁ tu gaṁtuṁ daiyā sahiyassa vairasēṇassa</l>
  <l>vihiyapaṇāmō saha sirimaīē tēhi aṇuṇṇāō</l>
</lg>
<lg n="1030">
  <l>dhavalagaiṁdārūḍhō dhavala-jasō dhariyadhavalapuṁḍariō</l>
  <l>dhavalāhiṁ cāmarāhi caliyakumārō ḍhalaṁtīhi</l>
</lg>
dipitariē kumarē sapariyaṇō saṁbhavaṇamāgaō vairasēṇa narāhivō । kumārō vi suhr̥ppayāṇaēhiṁ kamēṇa vahaṁtō
pattō lōhaggalaṁ nayaraṁ । āvāsiō nayarabāhiriyāē niggayā paccōṇīē sanāgarā amacca sāmaṁtādaō kayakumārapaṇāmā
niṇṇā samuciyāsaṇē suṭṭhiyā khaṇanimittaṁ nāṇāvihasaṁkahāhiṁ, kārāviyā puravarē mahāriddhīē haṭṭasōhā । taō jōisiyasūiē
suhamuhuttē bhaṇiyaṁ kumārēṇa -- “ pauṇī karēha vāhaṇaṁ । taō paṇāmapurassaraṁ bhaṇiyaṁ hatthipālēṇa--
<lg n="1031">
  <l>“dēva ! ārōha-karaphālaṇa' galagajjiya-tāramaṁdra' gurusahō</l>
  <l>vāmavisāṇa- susaṁṭiya-dīhara- karathōra - sōhillō</l>
</lg>
aṇavaradāṇa-pariya-maggaṇabhamarōli vaḍḍhiyāṇaṁdō । kēlāsa - siharatuṁgō mahānariṁdō vva
jayapayaḍō॥1032॥
kuṁbhābhōga-viṇimmiya-kaṁcaṇamālā ē 4 saṁgaō rammō । kuṁdēṁdu saṁkhadhavalō savijjulō sarayamēha vva॥1033 ॥ 
<lg n="1034">
  <l>duruṇṇaya puvvasarīra-bhāga- viṇamaṁta kiṁ ci pacchaddhō</l>
  <l>airāvaṇasāricchō pauṇō cciya vāraṇō ēsa</l>
</lg>
taō samārūḍhō saha sirimaīē kumārō । cauraṁgabala - pariyariō maṁdaṁ maṁdaṁ gaṁtuṁ payaṭṭō । sōūṇa kumārāgamaṇaṁ
saṁkhuhiō ṇayaralōō । siṁvāḍaga titha - caukka - caummuha - mahāpaha- pahēsu saṁpiḍiō ciṭṭhai । visēsaō payaḍī - bhūyavammaha-
rasāgaṁ purasuṁdarīṇaṁ । ēvaṁvihāra samullāvā vaṭṭēti । avi ya - "aituriyasaṁpaṭṭiē ! ki na paḍivālēsi samaṁ ? kumāra
daṁsagummatē ! gēvhasu uttarīyaṁ । uvavāra - kusuma-khalaṁtacalaṇē ! kiṁ na gurūṇaṁ pi lajjēsi ? aidāruṇē ! saṁjamēsu taḍuviya
sihi kalā-vibbhamaṁ vihara- pabbhāraṁ ? aisōhagga-gavviē ! kiṁ ṇōllēsi surasari- puliṇa vitthaḍēṇaṁ niyaṁba-bivēṇaṁ ? kumāra-
daṁsaṇūssuē ! ukkhivasu kiṁkiṇīsaṇāhaṁ kaṁcī - kalāvaṁ viyalaṁtaniyaṁbāō ! saṁṭhavēsu pāvē ! kavōla -mūla- dōlāyaṁtaṁ rayaṇaka-
nēuraṁ । hayahiē ! nivaḍiyaṁ di ṇa yāṇasi daṁtapattayaṁ ? gayalajjē ! kiṁ na muṇasi ukkhuḍiyaṁ pi ēgāvali ?
mayamattē ! na yāṇasi viyaliyaṁ pi muttāhāraṁ ? jōvvaṇagavviē ! pulaijjataṁ viyaḍḍhalōēṇaṁ ṭhavēsu paōharucchaṁgē । catta-
majjāē ! siḍhilībhūyaṁ pi na lakkhēsi niyaṁsaṇaṁ ? aliyamuddhē ! turiyaṁ pahāvasu jai diṭṭhēṇaṁ kajjaṁ ? aikōuhulla-
naḍiē ! kittiyaṁ palōēsi ? taraliyahiyaē' ! pariyaṇassa vi na lajjēsi ? gahavinaḍiē ! viyalayasi cayā hasijjasi
lōēṇaṁ । rāgāvuriyanayaṇē ! na pēcchasi sahīyaṇaṁ ? aṇēgasaṁkappa - pūriyacittē ! kimakāraṇāyāsiya hiyayā dukkhamappāṇaṁ
dharēsi ? micchāviṇīē ! kimaṇṇavavaēsa pulaiēhi vīsatthamavalōēiēhi ? jōvvaṇasāliṇī ! ki pīḍēsi paōharabhārēṇa ?
aikōhaṇē ! dēsu avayāsaṁ । macchariṇi ! kimēgāgiṇī ruṁdhasi gavakkhaṁ ! mayaṇaparavvasē ! paṁgurēsu sicayaṁ । rāgāvasattē !
nivārēsu attāṇayaṁ । ujjhiyalajjē ! kiṁ dhāvasi guru-paccakkhaṁ ? ullasaṁtasahāvē ! kimēvamāulī hōsi ? aijōvvaṇa-
1. ya tajjēsi ō0 । 2. kara phalēṇa jē । 3. maṁdaguru pā0 । 4. mālāva saṁga jē0 । 5. ēyārisā samu0 pā0 ।

appaṇā vi sirimaīē saha adiṭṭhavippaōgaṁ siṇēhasāraṁ visayasuhamaṇuhavaṁtō kālaṁ gamēi । aṇṇayā syaṇivirāmē
sasajjhasā sirimaī samāgaṁtūṇa vairajaṁghassa sāhēi - jahā ! “ajja ! ajja sumiṇagammi mamōdarāō niggaṁtūṇa kaṇhāhiṇā
tumaṁ mahaṁ va dō vidaṭṭhāī । " taṁ suṇiya saṁkiyahiyaō 'bhīrū na bhāiyavvaṁ' ti bhaṇiūṇa mōṇamāsiō rāyā । visajjiyā
sirimaī gayā । saṭṭhāṇaṁ, saṁbhūō ganbhō, kamēṇa pasūyā, jāō dāraō, paiṭṭhāviyaṁ samaē nāmaṁ vairaguttō । aṭṭhavārisiō
samapiō kalāyariyamsa kāriō kalā gahaṇaṁ । pattō jōvvaṇaṁ gāhiō pāṇi pahāṇavasunbhavāṇaṁ rāyakaṇṇāṇaṁ visasuhamaṇuhavaṁtō
ciṭṭhai । 
vairasēṇōvi rāyā. lōyaṁtiyadēvapaḍibōhitō saṁvaccharamacchiṣṇaṁ kimicchyiṁ dāṇaṁ dāūṇa niyasuēhi bhattāṇurattā-
ṇēgaṇaravaīhiṁ ya parivāriō pōkkha lapālaputtassa rajjaṁ dāūṇa paḍaggalaggataṇaṁ va vihuṇiūṇa rajjaṁ mahāvicchaḍḍēṇa
nikkhatō tavaggidaḍḍhaghaṇaghāikammidhaṇō kēvalanāṇamuppāḍiūṇa dhammaṁ saṁtō viharai । 
aṇṇā kayāi pōkkhalapālassa kē vi rāyāṇō visaṁvaiyā । taō tēṇa vairajaṁghō samāhūō sirimaī ya । vaira -
jaṁghō vi puttaṁ rajjē ṭhaviūṇa sirimaīē saha mahayā khaṁdhāvārēṇa saṁcaliō । āgacchaṁtō ya saravaṇāsaṇṇē jaṇēṇa bhaṇiō-
"mahārāya ! ēsa maggō diṭṭhīvisasappēhi abhidda tō । taō taṁ pahaṁ parihariūṇa parimiyapayāṇaēhi pattō puṁḍarigiṇīṁ । 
suyaṁ ca vivakkha-naravaīhi vairajaṁghāgamaṇaṁ । taō tē saṁkiyā sayamēva pōkkhalapālassa sēvāmuvāgayā । kaivayadiṇāṇi
tatthēva gamēūṇa pōkkhalapālēṇa saṁpūīūṇa visajjiyāṇi patthiyāṇi sanayaraṁ । saravaṇāsannē puṇō vi jaṇēṇa bhaṇiyāṇi-
"sāmi ! saravaṇamajjhēṇaṁ cēva gaṁtavvaṁ jaō kēvalanāṇaṁ tattha ṭhiyassa sāhuṇī samuppaṇṇaṁ । dēvā ya tassa mahimaṭṭhā ōiṇṇā
dēvajjōēṇaya । pasihayaṁ diṭṭhīgayaṁ visaṁ । aō nivvisō jāō diṭṭhīvisō bhuyaṁgamō ' । taō saravaṇē gaṁtūṇa āvāsiō vara-
jaṁghō । diṭṭhāya tattha tava lacchi paḍihatthā, saraya-salila sacchahiyaya, paḍipuṇṇapuṇima caṁda sōmavayaṇā, samuppaṇṇa kēvalavaraṇā-
ṇadaṁsaṇā, sirimaīē sahōyarā, aṭṭhārasasīlaṁga-sahassadharā sāgarasēṇa munisaṁgābhihāṇā aṇagārā । vaṁdiyā tēhi sabahumāṇaṁ । 
nisuō sāvaya-dhammōvaēsō । paḍila bhiya । phāsuēṇaṁ ēsaṇijjēṇaṁ asaṇa-pāṇa -khāima - sāimēṇaṁ । vaṁdiyā bhāvasāraṁ । taō
'tāṇi paḍilābhissāmō' tti tuṭṭāṇi paḍilā bhēmā ṇāṇi vi tuṭṭhāṇi paḍilābhiēsu vi tuṭṭāṇi harisavasa - rōmaṁciyāṇi tēsiṁ cēva
mahāmaṇīṇaṁ guṇē aṇuguṇēṁtāṇi - 'ahō ! mahāṇubhāvā sāgarasēṇa - muṇiruṇā, sahalīkaya-niya jamma- jīviyaphalā amhē vi
vi mukkarajjadhura-vāvārāḍaṁ kayāī mannē 4 nissaṁgāī viharissāmō tti virāga-maggamōgāḍhāī kamēṇa vahaṁtāī pattāī lōhaggalaṁ । 
vayaraguttēṇa vi rajjatthiṇā tāṇa virahakālē sāmaṁtā amaccabhaḍabhōiyā dāṇa - sammāṇēhiṁ raṁjēūṇa vasē kayā visajjiyā
sēsapariyaṇāṇi ya । paōsasamaē vāsabhavaṇamuvagayāṇi puttēṇa vi muṇijaṇaguṇagahaṇa rayāṇi adiṭṭhāṇābhaṭṭasuhisayaṇāṇi
visadhūmapaōgēṇa māriyāṇi । jaō-
