jugāijiṇida-cariyaṁ
taṁ mūlāgamēva saṁjāyacaraṇapariṇāmā visamiva visayagaṇaṁ mannaṁtā, savvāṇatthanibaṁdhaṇaṁ dhaṇaṁ gaṇitā, pāsaṁ va gharavāsaṁ
pāsaṁtā, kārāgāraṁ va saṁsāraṁ saraṁtā, āpucchiūṇa jaṇaṇi jaṇaē saṁtū siūṇa suhisayaṇavaggaṁ, saṁṭhaviūṇa saṁbaṁdhijaṇaṁ,
kāūṇa jiṇāyayaṇēsu aṭṭhāhiyā mahima, saṁpūiūṇa sirisaṁmaṇasaṁgha, dāūṇa dīṇāīṇa mahādāṇaṁ, nivvattiyāsēsa kāyavvā,
aṇugammamāṇā pahāṇapariyaṇēṇa purisasahassavāhiṇīsu sibiyāsu samārūḍhāḥ thuvvaṁtā muhala-māgahajaṇēṇa, ānaṁdijjamāṇā
nagaralōēṇa, mahayā riddhīē gayā sahayārasuṁdaraṁ nāma ujjāṇaṁ । ninnāmiyā jīvēṇa abhayaghōsēṇa saha pavvaiyā । tahāvihāṇaṁ
thērāṇaṁ aṁtiē gahiyā duvihā sikkhā । jahārihamahijjiyasuttatthā, viṇṇāya sāhukiriyā - kalāvā, avagayabahukilēsāyāsa
saṁsāra-pavaṁcā, aidukkara- tava caraṇa- parisōsiyaṁgā, davva khitta-kāla- bhāvēsu appaḍibaddha māṇasā, paripāliyaniraiyāra-
sāmaṇṇā, vihivihiyapajjattāṇa maṇā, samāhi-maraṇēṇa mariūṇa accuyaṁ gayā । tattha bhōttūṇa surasōkkhaṁ ṭhiikhaēṇa cuyā
samāṇā ihēba jaṁbaddīvē ddīvē puvvavidēhē pukkhalāvada - vijaē puṁḍarigiṇīnayarīē vairasēṇaraṇṇō dhāriṇīē dēvīē kucchisi
paḍhamō vairanābhō nāma puttō jāō । jō sō vijjaputtō sō cakkavaṭṭī jāō । avasēsā kamēṇa bāhu subāhu - pīḍha-
mahāpīṭhati । vairasēṇō paḍhamaṁ pavvaiō titthayarō jāō । iyarē vi saṁvaḍḍhiyā paṁcalakkhaṇē bhōē bhuṁjaṁti । jō sō
ninnāmiyā jīvō abhayaghōsō sō vi tīē cēva nayarīē sujasō nāma rāyaputtō jāō । bālabhāvē cēva vairanāhaṁ
samallīṇō । jaddivasaṁ vairasēṇassa kēvalanāṇaṁ samuppaṇṇaṁ taddivasaṁ vairanāhassa vi āuha- sālāē cakkarayaṇaṁ samuppaṇṇaṁ । 
vairanāhō cakkavaṭṭī jāō । sujasō tassēva sārahī । tēṇa sāhu vēyāvaccēṇa cakkavaṭṭibhōgā uiṇṇā । avasēsā cattāri
vi maṁḍaliyā rāyāṇō । tattha vairanāha cakkavaṭṭissa caurāsīpuvvalakkhā savvājayaṁ । tattha kumārō tīsaṁ । maṁḍaliō
sōlasa । cauvīsaṁ mahārāyā । cōisasāmaṇṇapariyāō । ēvaṁ caurāsī savvāuyaṁ bhōē bhujaṁtā viharati । itō ya
titthayaravayarasēgassa samōsaraṇaṁ, sō piupāyamūlē cauhiṁ vi sahōyarēhiṁ sujalēga ya sārahiṇā samaṁ pavvatō । tattha
vairanābhēṇa cōddasapubvā ahijjiyā । sēsā ēkkārasaṁgadhāriṇō jāyā । tattha bāhū susāhūṇaṁ asaṇāiṇā vaiyāvacca karēi । 
jō subāhu sō sāhuṇō vīsāmēi । ēvaṁ tē karēṁtē vairanāhō bhagavaṁ ubavū hēi -- "ahō suladdhaṁ jammajīviyaphalaṁ jaṁ sāhūṇa
vēyāvaccaṁ kīrai । parissaṁtē tavā sāhuṇī' vīsāmijjati । jaō --.

kulagaravattavvayā
121
mariūṇa dīvakumārēsu bhavaṇavaīsu uvavaṇṇō । sirikaṁtā puṇa nāgakumārēsu pamāṇaṁ puṇa ēēsi - paḍhamassa navadhaṇusayāṇi । 
bīyassa puṇa aṭṭhadhaṇusayāṇi । taiyassa sattadhaṇusayāṇi । cautthassa addhasattama dhaṇusayāṇi । paṁcamassa chassayā । chaṭṭussa
addhachaṭṭusayā । sattamassa paṁca paṇuvīsā dhaṇusayā । tāō tēsi bhajjāō īsi tēhitō ūṇāu pamāṇēṇa । tē puṇa
saṁghayaṇēṇaṁ savvē vi vajjarisahasaṁghayaṇā । bhajjāō vi vajjarisabhasaṁghayaṇāō, saṁṭhāṇēṇaṁ puṇa savvē vi kulagarā samacauraṁsa-
saṁṭhāṇā । bhajjāṇa vi samacauraṁsa cēva saṁṭhāṇaṁ । vaṇṇēṇaṁ puṇa cakkhumaṁ jasamaṁ pasēṇaiya ēē piyaṁguvaṇṇābhā । abhicaṁdō
sasigōrō, vimalavāhaṇō marudēvō nābhī ya । ēē tinni vi nimmalakaṇayavaṇṇābhā । saṁpayaṁ āuyaṁ bhaṇṇai । tattha
savvēsi pi paliōvamassa aṭṭamabhāgō । tattha ' paliōvamaṁ cālīsēhi bhāgēhi kīrai । tattha cālīsāē aṭṭamabhāē paṁcabhāgā
bhavaṁti । tattha vicattāri bhāgā paḍhamakulagarāō pagayā । sēsāṇaṁ puṇa chaṇhaṁ pi kulagarāṇaṁ paṁcamabhāgē cēva āuyaṁ । 
tattha bīyassa asaṁkhējjāṇi cēva puvvāṇi aṇupuvvīē parihīyamāṇāṇi asaṁkhējjāṇi cēva puvvāṇi jāva marudēvō nābhi-
kulagarassa puṇa saṁkhijjāṇi cēva puvvāṇi । jaṁ kulagarāṇamāuyaṁ taṁ kulagaraghariṇīṇa vi, jaṁ jassa āuyaṁ taṁ sama dasabhāgā
kāūṇaṁ jō paḍhamō bhāgō sō kumārabhāvō jō pacchimō bhāgō sō vuḍḍhabhāvō । majjhimā aṭṭhabhāgā kulagarabhāvō । ēvaṁ
sattamē ṭhāṇē nāhikulagarō mihuṇāṇa mērā vaṭṭāvagō jāō । sō puṇa kērisō--

bhatticittaṁ ghaṁṭāvalicaliyamahuramaṇaharasaraṁ surūvaṁ suhaṁ kaṁtaṁ darisaṇijjaṁ niuṇōviya misimisitamaṇirayaṇakaṇayaghaṁṭiyā-

sastirīya sigdhamēva gamaṇapāuggaṁ vimāṇaṁ viuvvēha viuvvittā ēyamāṇattiyaṁ paccaṣpiṇēha । tē vi tahēva kariti । 
taṇaṁ tāō uttarapuratthimaṁ disībhāgaṁ avakkamaṁti avakkamittā vēuhivvayasamugdhāēṇaṁ samōhannati samōhanittā saṁkhijjāī
jōyaṇāī daṁḍa nisiraṁti nisiritā rayaṇāṇaṁ 1 vairāṇaṁ 2 vēruliyāṇaṁ 3 lōhiyakkhāṇaṁ 4 masāragallāṇaṁ 5 haṁsagabbhāṇaṁ

phalihāṇaṁ 15 riṭṭhā 16 ēēsi maṇīṇaṁ ahābārē pōggalē parisāḍiti parisāḍittā ahāsuhumēpōgggalē parigiṇhaṁti parigivhittā

jugāijiṇiṁda-cariyaṁ
ivaddhēṇaṁ nāḍaṇaṁ viulāī bhōgabhōgāī bhuṁjamāṇē viharai । taē ṇaṁ tassa sakkssa āsaṇaṁ calai । āsaṇaṁ caliyaṁ

sattaṭṭhapayāī titthayarābhimuhaṁ gacchai gacchittā bhattibharanibbharēṇaṁ paṇāmaṁ karēi karitā siṁhāsanasannisaṇē jīyakappaṁ sarai
kiccamēyaṁ tīyamaṇāgaya vaṭṭamāṇāṇaṁ sakkāṇaṁ titthayarassa jammaṇamahimaṁ karittaē, taṁ gacchāmi ṇaṁ ahaṁ pi bhagavāō titthaya rassa
jammaṇamahima karēttaē tti kaṭṭu ēvaṁ saṁpai saṁpēhittā hariṇēgamēsi pāyattāṇīyāhivaraṁ dēvaṁ saddāvēi sahāvēttā ēvaṁ vayāsī-
" khippāmēva bhō ! sabhāē suhammāē mēghōgharasiyagaṁbhīra-mahura- saddaṁ jōyaṇaparimaṁḍalaṁ sughōsaṁ sussaraṁ ghaṁṭaṁ tikkhuttō ullālēmāṇē,
ullālē māṇā mahayā mahayā saddēṇaṁ ugghōsēmāṇē ugghōsēmāṇā ēvaṁ vayāhi-- "āṇavēi', ṇaṁ bhō ! sakkē dēviṁdē dēvarāyā
gacchai ṇaṁ bhō ! sakkē dēviṁdē dēvarayā jaṁbuddīvaṁ dīvaṁ bhārahaṁ vāsaṁ bhagavaō titthayarassa jammaṇa mahimaṁ karitaē, taṁ tubhē
vi ya ṇaṁ dēvāṇuppiyā ! savviḍḍhīē savvajuīē savvabalēṇaṁ savvasamudaēṇaṁ savvāyarēṇaṁ savvavibhūīē savvavibhūsāē savva -
saṁbhamēṇaṁ savvanā ēhiṁ savvōvarōhēhiṁ savva- puppha-gaṁdha-mallālaṁkāra- vibhūsāē savva - divva- tuḍiya - sahasanniṇāēṇaṁ mahayā iḍḍhīē
niyaga niyaga parivārasaṁparivuḍā sayāī sayāī jāṇavimāṇa vāhaṇāraṁ durūḍhā samāṇā akālaparihīṇamēva sakkassa aṁtiyaṁ
pāubbhavaha । ”
·
"taēṇa sē pāyatāṇīyāhivaī dēvē taṁ sakkasāsaṇaṁ sammaṁ viṇaēṇaṁ paḍisuṇēi paḍiṇittā jēṇēva suhammā sabhā
jēṇēva sudhōsā ghaṁṭā tēṇēva uvāgacchai uvāgacchittā sughōsaṁ ghaṁṭaṁ tikkhuttō mahayā mahayā saddēṇaṁ ullālēī । taē ṇaṁ tīē
ullāliyāē samāṇīē sōhammē kappē aṇṇēhiṁ ēgūṇēhiṁ battīsāra vimāṇāvāsa -sayasahassēhiṁ aṇṇāī ēgūṇāī battīsaṁ
ghaṁṭā - saya sahassāiṁ jamagasamaṁgaṁ kaṇakaṇārāvaṁ kāuṁ pavattāī । 
taē ṇaṁ sōhammē kappē pāsāya vimāṇa-nikkhuḍāvaḍiya -saha- samuṭṭhiya- ghaṁṭāpaḍiya-saya- sahassasaṁkulē jāē yāvi
hōtthā । 
taē ṇaṁ tēsiṁ sōhammakavyavāsīṇaṁ bahūṇaṁ vēmāṇiyāṇaṁ dēvāṇa dēvīṇa ya ēgaṁta rai-pasattāṇaṁ niccappamattāṇaṁ
visaya-suhamucchiyāṇaṁ sūsara - ghaṁṭā rasiya- vipula - bōlapūriya-cavala paḍibōhaṇē kaē samāṇē ghōsaṇa - kō ūhala-diṇṇakaṇṇaēgaggamāṇa-
sāṇa sē pāyattāṇīyāhivaī dēvē taṁsi ghaṁṭāravaṁsi nisaṁtaṁ paḍinisaṁtaṁsi samāsi tattha tattha tahiṁ tahi dēsē dēsē mahayā
mahayā saddēṇaṁ ugghōsēmāṇē ugghōsamāṇē ēvaṁ vayāsī -- "haṁta ! suṇaṁtu ṇaṁ bhavaṁtō sōhammakappavāsī bahavē vaimāṇiyā dēvā ya
dēvīō ya sōhammavaiṇō vayaṇaṁ hiyaṁ suhr̥tthaṁ āṇāvēi ṇaṁ bhō ! sakkē dēvidē dēvarāyā jahā sabbē vi bhavaṁtō niya niya
parivārasaṁparivuḍā vivihajāṇavimāṇavāhaṇēhiṁ durūḍhā samāṇā khippāmēva sakkssa dēviṁdassa dēvaraṇṇō aṁtiyaṁ pāubbhavaha । "
gacchai ṇaṁ sakva dēviṁdē dēvarāyā ihēva jaṁbuddīvē dīvē bhārahē vāsē viṇīyāē bhūmīē nāhikulagaragharē paḍhamatitthaya rassa

bhattibahumāṇēṇaṁ, appēgaiyā daṁsaṇakō uhallēṇaṁ, appēgaiyā sakkavayaṇa maṇuvattēmāṇā, apēgaiyā aṇṇamaṇṇamaguyattamāṇā,
appēigayā jīyamēyaṁ ti kaṭṭu sakkssa aṁtiyaṁ pāunbhavaṁti । 
,
taē ṇaṁ sē sakkapālayaṁ nāma ābhiōgiyaṁ dēvaṁ āṇavēi -- “ khippāmēva bhō ! aṇēga-khaṁbha-sayasaṇṇiviṭṭha līla-

saṁparikhitē । tē ṇaṁ dāmā tavaṇijja-laṁbūsagā suvaraṇa-patharaga-maṁḍiyā nāṇā- maṇi rayaṇa- viviha hāraddhahārauvasōhiyā isi
aṇṇamaṇṇama saṁpattā pugvāiēhi vāēhi maṁdaṁ madaṁ ēijjamāṇā suisuhayarēṇaṁ cittanivvuikarēṇaṁ saddēṇaṁ tē paēsē āūrēmāṇā āūrē-
māṇā aī aīva uvasōhēmāṇā - uvasōhēmāṇā ciṭṭhati । tassa ṇaṁ sīhāsaṇassa avaruttarēṇaṁ uttarēṇaṁ uttaraputthimēṇaṁ ēttha ṇaṁ

saparivārāhi naṭṭāṇīēṇaṁ gaṁdhavvāṇīēṇa ya saddhi taṁ vimāṇaṁ aṇuppayāhiṇī karēmāṇē puvvillēṇa tisōvāṇēṇaṁ paḍirūva-
gēṇaṁ duruha duruhittā sīhāsaṇaṁsi puratthābhimuhē nisaṇṇē । taē ṇaṁ sāmāṇiyāṇa vi caurāsī sahassā uttarēṇaṁ tisōvāṇēṇa
duruhitā pattēyaṁ puṇvannatthēsu bhaddāsaṇēsu nisīyaṁti । avasēsā dēvā ya dēvīō ya dāhiṇillēṇaṁ tisōvāṇēṇaṁ duruhittā pubva-
natthēsu bhaddāsasu pattēyaṁ pattēyaṁ nisīyaṁti । 
'
taē ṇaṁ sakkssa taṁsi durūḍhassa dappaṇāiyā aṭṭamaṁgalagā puraō ahāṇupuvvīē saṁpatthiyā । tayaṇaṁtaraṁ bhiṁgārachatta-
puṇṇa kalāiyā । tayaṇaṁtaraṁ jōyaṇasahassūsīē gagaṇatalamaṇulihaṁtē aṇēgakuḍabhiyāsaya sahassa parikkhittē divvē mahiṁdajjhaē । 
tayaṇaṁtaraṁ" surūvanēvatthaparihatthiyavēsā savvālaṁkāravibhūsiyā paṁcaaṇiyā paṁcaaṇiyā hivaiṇōṁ । tayaṇaṁtaraṁ bahavē ābhiōgiyā

ahāṇupuvīē saṁpaṭṭiyā । taē ṇaṁ sē sakkē tēṇaṁ paṁcāṇiyaparikkhittēṇaṁ puraō pakaḍḍhijja māṇēṇaṁ mahiṁdajjhaēṇaṁ aṭṭhahi aggamahisīhiṁ

tāyattisagāē dēvāṇaṁ aṇṇāhi ya sōhammakappavāsidēvāṇaṁ ya dēvīṇa ya bahūhiṁ kōḍīhiṁ saddhi saṁparivuṛē savvāē iḍḍhīē
savvēṇaṁ balēṇaṁ savvēṇaṁ parakkamēṇaṁ divvuttaranināēṇaṁ phōḍatē aṁbaratalaṁ sōhammakappassa majjhaṁ majjhēṇaṁ taṁ divvaṁ dēviḍḍhi
uvadaṁsēmāṇē uvadaṁsēmāṇē jēṇēva sōhammassa uttarillē nijjāṇamaggē tēṇēva uvāgacchai uvagacchittā jōyaṇasayasāhassiēhi

dēvē āṇavēi āṇavēittā ēvaṁ vayāsī- "khippāmēva bhō dēvāṇuppiyā ! mahatthaṁ mahagghaṁ mahārihaṁ bhagavaō jammābhisaṁyaṁ
uvaṭṭhavēha । " tē vi tahēva uvaṭṭhavēṁti । taē ṇaṁ sē sakkē titthayarassa cauddisaṁ cattāri dhavalavasabhē viubvēi sēē saṁkha-
dalasaṁnikālē pāsāīē darisa ṇijjē abhirūvē paḍirūvē । taē ṇaṁ tēsi caunhaṁ vasahāṇaṁ aṭṭhahiṁ siṁgaggēhitō' aṭṭatōyadhārāō
nigacchaṁti taē ṇaṁ tāō aṭṭatōyadhārāō uḍḍhaṁ vēhāyasaṁ uppayaṁti uppaittā ēgaō milāyaṁti milāittā sāmissa
muddhāsi nivati ।

siririsahasāmi vaṇṇaṇaṁ
137
taō tēṇa bhagavayā lōgahiyāē cauvvihō rāyasaṁgahō kaō । taṁ jahā uggā bhōgā- rāinā khattiyā । jēsi uggā
daṁḍanīī tē uggā ārakkhiyapurisā । bhōgā nāma jē piitthāṇīyā accatamāṇaṇijjā sāmissa॥rāinā jē sāmiṇō
samāvayā । avasēsā savvē khattiyā । tēsi lōyāṇa vōcchinnēsu kappapāyavēsu paḍhamaṁ kaṁdāī āhārō āsi, pacchā tammi ajīraṁtē
tē usahaṁ uvaṭṭhāyaṁti bhāṁti ya - " jahā amha na jīraī । " tāhē sāmī bhaṇai - " hatthēhi malittā bāhiriyaṁ challi
avaṇittā āhārēha । tē vi tahēva kāumāraddhā । kaḍhiṇattaṇaō ōsahīṇaṁ ēvaṁ pi ajīraṁgā । puṇō vi sāmī uvaṭṭiyā । 
bhagavayā bhaṇiyaṁ - " hatthēhi ghaṁsittā pavālapuḍaēsu pāṇiēṇa tīmittā khaṇamittaṁ dharittā pacchā khāyaha । " jāhē taha vina jīrati
tāhē puṇō vi bhagavaṁtaṁ pucchaṁti । bhagavayā bhaṇiyaṁ -- "puthuttaṁ savvaṁ karitā muṭṭhīē kāūṇa āyavaṁ kakkhaṁtarēsu giṇhā-
vittā pacchā āhārēha । ” kēṇa kāraṇēṇa bhayavaṁ aggī na upāēi ? sāmī jāṇai - jayā ēgaṁtaniddhō kālō havai tathā
aggī na uṭṭhēi, ēgaṁta rukkhēṇaṁ' vina, uṭṭhēi jayā vēmāyāē niddhalukkhō bhavai tathā aggī uṭhēi । tēṇa sāmī ariṁga na
uṭṭhāvēi । iō ya kālasahāvēṇa rukkha saṁghaṁsēṇa aggī uṭṭhāiō, tāhē sō aggī bhūmi pattō, jāṇi tattha sukka-taṇa-patta-
kaṭu-kathavarāṇi tāṇi dahiumāraddhō, tāhē tē maṇuyā taṁ accabhūyaṁ daṭṭhūṇa taō huttā pahāviyā । tāhē imaṇi rayaṇāṇi
tti tē tāṇi gihiumāraddhā jāhē dajjñaṁti tāhē pacchāhuttā saraṁti bhayabhīyā samāṇā āgaṁtūṇa usabhasāmissa sārhēti । 
usō bhai-pāsēsu vilaggiūṇa imassa paripēratēsu taṇa-kaṭṭhāiyaṁ savvaṁ phēḍēha । tēhiṁ vi tahēva kayaṁ । uvasaṁtō aggī । sō
aggī bhagavaō uvaēsēṇa tēhi gahiō । bhagavayā bhaṇiyaṁ -- "pāgaṁ karēha । tē na jāṇaṁti kiha pāgō kī rai ? taō ōsahīō
aggimmi chuti, aggī vi ḍahai । taō tē puṇō vi usahaṁ uvaṭṭiyā । bhaṇati -- "sō savvaṁ apaṇā khāi' na amhaṁ kiṁpi dēha । 
bhagavaṁ bhaṇai maṭṭiyā piṁḍaṁ āṇēha । tē gayā । bhagavaṁdhi gayavarāruḍhō nagarāō nīi । ētyaṁtarē tēhi maṭṭiyā piṁḍō uvaṇīō । tāhē
bhagavayā kuṁbhi-kuṁbhatthalē kāūṇa darisiyaṁ pattayaṁ । bhaṇiyā ya ēyārisāṇi kāūṇa ēēsa ōsahīō chōḍhūṇa payaha । tēhi vi
tahēva kathaṁ । pacchākusalā kālēṇa suṁdarataragāṇi kāūṇa aggimmi paiūṇa tēsu pāgaṁ kāumāraddhā । ēvaṁ tāva paḍhamaṁ
kuṁbhakārā uppannā ।

 ।

paṇaṭṭhēsu tāhē vaḍḍhai uppāiyā । pacchā rōma-nahēsu vaḍḍhatēsu kāsavā upapāiyā । cittagārēsu kappamahīruhēsu pautthēsu
cittagarā utpāiyā । kuṁbhakāra - kuviṁdaṁ vaḍḍhai - kāsava cittagaralakkhaṇāṇi paṁcamūlasippāṇi । ēkkēkkassa ya vīsaṁ vīsa bhēyā ।

vihi । bharahas ya cittakammaṁ uvaiṭṭha । bāhubaliṇō ya itthi purisāilakkhaṇaṁ māṇaṁ, ummāṇaṁ, ōmāṇaṁ paḍimāṇaṁ tappabhiī lōē

uppāīyaṁ īsarasēvā vi taō cēva lōgō kāumāraddhō । tigicchā vi tayā payaṭṭā paḍhamaṁ rōgā nāsī, atthasatthaṁ kōḍillaya-
māīyaṁ tathā uppannaṁ । baṁdhō ghāō, māraṇā ya avarāhīṇaṁ avarāhāṇusārēṇa । ta paḍhamaṁ payaṭṭāṇi nāgāīṇaṁ mahūsavā tayā
payaṭṭā । samavāyaṁ kāūṇa gōṭṭhīkaraṇaṁ pitayā cēva payaṭṭaṁ । puvvaṁ bhaṭṭāragassa vivāhasamaē sakkēṇa kōugāṇi bhūikammāṇi
rakkhāō ya kathāō । taō lōgō vitāē cēva aṇugiiē kāumāraddhō । sāvagā niyayāvaccāṇi akayavīvāhāṇi

tappabhiī lōgō vipayaṭṭōṁ । marudēvī paḍhamasiddhō tti kāūṇa dēvēhiṁ maḍayaṁ pūiūṇa duddhōdahimmi chūḍhaṁ tappabhiī lōgē vi

siririsahasāmivaṇṇaṇaṁ
139
vaṇē ujjāṇē jēṇēva asōgavarapāyavē tēṇēva uvāgacchai uvāgacchittā sudaṁsaṇāō sīyāō paccōruhai paccōruhittā.
asōgavarapāyavassa hēduō visujjamāṇapariṇāmō 'jaṁ ēsa kāhī amhē vi taṁ tahā kāhāmō' tti citiūṇa sāmisālā-
ṇurāgēṇa kaccha - mahākacchapamuhāṇaṁ uggāṇaṁ bhōgāṇaṁ rāiṇṇāṇaṁ ca khattiyāṇaṁ ca cauhi sahassēhi sahiō sakkavidinnaṁ
ēvaṁ dēvadusamādāya chaṭṭaṇaṁ bhattēṇaṁ apāṇaēṇaṁ āsāḍhāhiṁ nakkhattēṇaṁ jōgamuvāgaēṇaṁ sayamēva caumuṭṭhiyaṁ lōyaṁ karēi । kēsā
sakkēṇa niyavāsaddhaṁ tēṇa paḍicchiyā khīrōdahimmi, chūḍhā । paṁcamamuṭṭhiyaṁ puṇa givhaṁtō susaṇiddha-kasiṇamasiṇa- kuṁtala -jaḍāō
kaṇayati kamaṇīya-aṁsatthala-lulaṁtarēhirāō daṭṭhūṇa sakkēṇa vāriō । tēṇa bhagavaō caumuṭṭhiō lōō । sēsāṇa puṇa
titthayarāṇa paṁcamuṭṭhiyō । tāhē bhagavaṁ siddhāṇa namōkkāraṁ kāūṇa sakkaviṇivāriyahalavōlāē dēvāsuranarāṇēgasayasahassa-
saṁvāhāē mahai mahāliyāē parisāē majjha gaō savvaṁ mē pāvaṁ akaraṇijjaṁ ti mahāpainnaṁ paḍivajjai
yugādisaddharmma dhuraṁdharāya saṁsāriṇāṁ nirvr̥tikāraṇāya । carācaratrātajagattrayāya namōstu tubhyaṁ jagadādiyōginē॥
ēvaṁ kayajiṇasaṁthavā surāsurā naṁdīsaraṁ gayā । tattha ya sāsayajiṇidapaḍimāṇa aṭṭhāhiyaṁ mahāmahimaṁ kāūṇa
jahāgayaṁ paḍigayā । 
iya vaddhamāṇasūrīhiṁ viraiyarisahanāhacariyammi । sacarācarajīvahiō dikkhāhigārō parisamattō॥

mahāsattō nirasaṇō cēva nāṇāvihadēsēsu vihariumāraddhō । taō tē caurō samaṇasahassā mōṇavvayasaṁṭhiyāō bhagavayāō
uvaēsamalabhaṁtā paḍhamaparīsahapīḍiyā kacchamahākacchē pucchiumā radvā--" saṁpayamaṇāhāṇamamhāṇa tumbhē nāhā kēvaiyaṁ kāla-
mamhēsi chuhārīsahaparigaēhiṁ acchiyavvaṁ ?" ti । tēhi bhaṇiyaṁ -- " amhē vi na yāṇāmō jai paḍhamamēva bhagavaṁ pucchiu hōṁtō
amhēhi kiṁ kāyavvaṁ' ti tā laṭṭhayaṁ hōtaṁ " saṁpayaṁ puṇa ēvaṁ cēva saṁgahaṁ bharahalajjāē puṇō ya nagaraṁ gaṁtuṁ na tīrai । āhāra-
maṁtarēṇa ya acchiuṁ na sakkā aō vaṇavāsō ṇa saṁgaō' tti maṁtiūṇa gaṁgaṁ mahānaī para patthiyā ।

mahāsāmariṁga pai tōraviyaniyaparivārō suhasaṁka ppanisāyara karaniyara saṁgasaṁkhōhiyamaṇamayaraharō pattō vāsabhavaṇapavarapallaṁkē

samāhūya ēvaṁ vayāsī - " khippāmēva bhō dēvāṇuppiyā ! haya-gaya-raha-paurapāyattāṇīya saṁruddhamahīmaṁḍalaṁ cāuraṁgiṇīsēṇṇaṁ
pauṇī karēha । ' sō vi tahēva karēttā tamāṇattiyaṁ paccappiṇaḥ । taō nayarārakkhiyapurisē samāisai - "khippāmēva bhō !
takkhasilaṁ nayara siṁghāḍaga-tiya- caukka caccara- caummha mahāpaha-pahēsu āsiyasaṁmajjivalittaṁ kālāgaru - pavara-kuṁdurukka-
turukkaḍajjhatagaṁdhuddhayābhirāmaṁ paṛabhavaṇanibaddha-tōraṇaṁ ubhayapāsa vimukkacaṁdaṇa - cacciya-kalarsa, vihiya vivihahaṭṭasōhaṁ,
maṁcāimaṁcakaliyaṁ samaṁtaō karēha kārāvēha ya karēttā ya ēyamāṇattiyaṁ paccaṣpiṇaha । " tē vi tahēva kāūṇa paccappiti । 
taō saddāvēttā mahallaē bhagai -- " khippāmēva bhō ! vasaṁtasiripamuhamaṁtēuraṁ hāyaṁ kayabalikammaṁ, vihiyapavaraṁgarāgaṁ, paṁcavanna-
vivihakusubhōvasōhiyaṁ hāradvahārāiṇā tilayacōhasamēṇaṁ āharaṇēṇa virāiyaṁ niyatthavaravatthaṁ bhagavaō vaṁdanimittaṁ pauṇaṁ
karēha । tē vi tahēva kāūṇa nivēyaṁti । taō appaṇā vhāyavilittō appamahagghābharaṇālaṁkiyasarīrō gahiyavaranēvacchō
niuttapurisaḍhōiyaṁ jayapuṁjagaṁdhavāraṇaṁ samārūḍhō । taō samakālasamāhayāṇa vajjāujjasa ddabahiriyabaṁbhaṁḍa bhaṁḍōdarō māgaha-
jaṇajaṇiyajayajayārāvabharibhūmaṁḍalō savvēṇaṁ balēṇaṁ savvēṇaṁ aṁtēurēṇaṁ savvāē riddhīē savvāē sāmaggīē sabvēṇaṁ purajaṇa-
samudaēṇaṁ takkhasilaṁ nayariṁ majjhaṁ majjhēṇaṁ bhagavaō vaṁdaṇavaḍiyāē niggaō sunaṁdānaṁdaṇō ।

samāgayā kālacaudasī । vigaliē paḍhamajāmē jāmiṇīē gahiyabalivihāṇō khaggasahāō caliō pavaṇapōō । gaō
dhagadhagatacīyānalaṁ, kilakilitavēyālaṁ' karakayakarālakaravālavivasaṇanaccatajōgiṇī-jaṇaṁ, savasaya saha rasaniraṁtaraṁ maṁdiraṁ
piva kayaṁtassa । avasāṇaṁ piva jīvalōyassa kayaṁta kaṁkālanāma ujjāṇaṁ । ālihiyaṁ rattacaṁdaṇēṇa maṁḍalaṁ । mukkō
raktakaṇavīrapupphōvayārō, dinnāō disābalīō । taō nivvattiyā sēsa kāyavvō kāūṇa cittā lihiyāē tārakuladēvayāē
pūyaṁ vaṁdiūṇa vijjāyariyaṁ paviṭṭhō maṁḍalaṁ । kayāyarakkhēṇa sumariō tāradēvayāē maṁtō । ētyaṁtarē phuriyaṁ dāhiṇalōyaṇēṇa
suhasauṇasamucchāhiō samāsaṁsiyakajjasiddhī savisēsaṁ vijjaṁ javiumāraddhō । khaṇaṁtarēṇa sattaparikkhaṇatthaṁ kayā kuladēvayāē
vigdhasaṁghāyā । pati nahaṁgaṇāō saṁchāiyadisāmuhāō, aṁtariyatarumaṁḍalāō, ghūghuyaṁtaghūyaḍaravā puṇṇakaṇṇavivarāō
paṁsubuddhīō, bhīrujaṇajīviyaṁtakāriṇīō, phēkkāraṁti mahāsivāō, nivaḍaṁti ruhiravuṭṭhīō, vikinnakēsā dāhiṇakarakaṁ
pāviyakarālakattiyā kilikilāravabhariyabhūmaṁḍalā, ' vāmakarakayarattabhariyana rakavālanihiyalōla lōyaṇā, nacciraṁ pavattā
bhūyapisāyavēyālā, nivaḍati mahāsaṇīō guluguliti gaiṁdā, taha vi na calai sattāō pavaṇapōō । 'ahō mahāsattō !
ēsa purisō, na tīrai cālēuṁ tō payaḍēmi attāṇayati । citiya payaḍībhūyā kuladēvayā । bhaṇiyamaṇāē - - " mahābhāga !
kiṁ kāraṇaṁ sumariyā ahaṁ ?" pavaṇapōēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - " puttatthiṇā । " dēvayāē bhaṇiyaṁ - "jaha ēvaṁ tō pēcchasi puraō jalaṁta-
jālāsayasaṁkulaṁ jalaṇaṁ । " tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - "pēcchāmi । " dēvayāē bhaṇiyaṁ -- "ēttha paḍiēhiṁ puttō pāvijjai । " "jaṁ bhagavaī
bhaṇai "tti bhaṇiūṇa uṭṭhiō pavaṇapōō । acaliyasattēṇa gaṁtūṇa pakkhittō tattha appā । thēva vēlāē ya pēcchai appayaṁ
kusumasattharōvagayaṁ gahiyahāraṁ puraō kuladēvayaṁ ca vimhiyā māṇasō haṁta ! kahi' sō jalaṇō gahiyahārā kāvā ēsā itthiya"
tti citāulō bhaṇiō dēvayāē - "mahābhāga ! tuṭṭhāhaṁ tē imiṇā mahāsāhasēṇa । givha imaṁ hāraṁ khivasu niyapiyā kaṁdharāē
pacchā tē hārō vva bahuguṇē nimmalajasō suvittō ya puttō bhavissai । " kayapaṇāmēṇa paḍicchiō pavaṇapōēṇa pupphāīhi
sakkārēūṇa visajjiyā dēvayā । appaṇā vi siddhakajjō gharaṁ gaō । sāhiō savvō vi dēvayā pariōsaha ralābha-
pajjavasāṇō dhaṇasirīē rayaṇivaiyarō । sā vi pariōsa - viyasiyamuhī nivaḍiyā calaṇēsu । tēṇa vi sahatthēṇa piṇaddhō
tīē kaṁdharāē hārō । āṇaṁdabharanibbharāṇaṁ vōlīṇō vāsarō । kayadēva - gurusumaraṇō nuvannō vāsabhavaṇanbha tarasaṁṭhiē pavara-
pallaṁkē pavaṇapōō । surayasaṁgaraikilaṁtāṇa samāgayā niddā । pariṇayapāyāē śyaṇīē saṁsaṁbhamā uṭṭiyā dhaṇasirī । viṇaya-
puvvaṁ bhaṇiyamaṇāē - " nāha ! sumiṇē maha muhē caṁdō paviṭṭhō । " tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- "piē ! caṁdō vva samāṇaṁdiyajiyalōō
puttō tē bhavissa । " sā vi taha'tti paḍivajjiyatavvayaṇaṁ dēvagurusaṁbaddhāhi kahāhi rayaṇisēsaṁ jāgaramāṇī ṭhiyā । ētyaṁtarē
vāsiyaṁ taṁbūcūḍēṇa payaḍībhūō ravirahasārahī । viyasiyāṇi kamaliṇī kamalamuhāṇi । taō muttāhalaniyarō viva dhavalō
palhattha gayaṇāhitō tārāniyarō bhayabhīō viva palāyai disāmuhēsu tamaniyarō । varakāmiṇi vayaṇalōyaṇāiṁ piva vitthari-
yāī disāmuhāī । puṇṇarahiya' purisō viva jhīṇō mayalaṁchaṇō ciraviōgavirahānalataviyakā miyaṇamihuṇāī piva milaṁti
cakkavāyamihuṇayā, ' surayaṇariddhisaṁdaṁsaṇakhalavayaṇāī piva mauliyāī kumuyasaṁḍāī, kāraṭṭayabhōjjavāvaḍa diyavarasamūhō
viva karayarāvadūmiyasavaṇaṁtarō viyaṁbhiō riṭṭhasaṁghāō, mayaṇāurā viva ravipaṛamaṇurattā puvvadisā, mahāpurisō viva
niṭṭhaviyā sēsa dōsō, paryāḍayadisā cakkavālō । samuggaō kamaliṇī daiō । taō kāūṇa gōsakiccaṁ samāhūō pavaṇa-
pōēṇa sumaī nāma sumiṇasatyapāḍhagō । kayasakkārō nisannō daṁsiyāsaṇē । pupphaphalāīhiṁ sammāṇiūṇa kahiō dhaṇasirīē
diṭṭhī sumiṇagō । tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - - - " mahābhāga ! arahaṁtamāyarō cakkimāyarō vā gayāiē cōdasamahāsumiṇē pāsittā

ēyaṁ suṇiya saddāviō maṁtiṇā dōvāriō bhaṇiō ya - "arē ! lahuṁ gaṁtūṇa bhaṇasu pavaṇakēuṁ jahā - akayakāla-
kkhēvaṁ samāgaṁtūṇa mahārāyapayapaṁkayaṁ pēcchsu । ” tēṇa vi tahēva gaṁtūṇa sāhiyaṁ । taō pavaṇakēū vi gahiyapāhuḍō jhatti
samāgaō rāyaṁtiyaṁ । paṇāmiyapāhuḍō vihiyapaṇāmō nisannō darisiyāṇē । ālāvāīhiṁ gayagavvaṁ saccavayaṇammi ya mahura-
bhāsiraṁ daṭṭhūṇa raṁjiō rāyā । 'jōgō' tti kāūṇa bhaṇiō rāiṇā - - " mahābhāga ! dhammapurisō tumaṁ dhammāṇugayaṁ kiṁpi
bhaṇijjasi । " pavaṇakēuṇā bhaṇiyaṁ - "jaṁ sāmī samāisai tattha pauṇō ēsa jaṇō । " rannā bhaṇiyaṁ --" jai ēvaṁ tō maē
piupayaṭṭāṇē' dhammacakkaṁ kāriyaṁ gāmārāmāiyaṁ ca pūjānimittaṁ viyariyaṁ । tattha taē jahābhiruyai purisatigasahiēṇa
ciṁtā kāyavvā । " pavaṇakēuṇā paḍivannaṁ rāyasāsaṇaṁ । hārappaha- suppaha - mahappahābhihāṇā daṁsiyā rāiṇō tinni sahāyā । 
rāiṇā vi 'jaṁ pavaṇakēū bhaṇai taṁ tubbhēhiṁ kāyavvaṁ' ti bhaṇiūṇa visajjiyā tē । pavaṇakēū vi niyaṁgalaggavatthāharaṇāīhiṁ
sammāṇiūṇa bhaṇiō rāiṇā -- “ tumamētthakāraṇaṁ pahāṇapurisō ussuṁkō ukkarō kayāvarāhō vi nirāvarāhō maha rajjē
jēṇa kēṇa vi paōyaṇaṁ taṁ maha kahēyavvaṁ । ” ēvaṁ bhaṇiūṇa visajjiō gaō sabhavaṇaṁ । jahāiṭṭha vihiṇā dhammacakkaṁ
citaṁ kuṇatō kālaṁ gamēi । bhagavaṁ pi takkhasilāō nayarīō aḍavaillāisu dēsēsu vōsaṭṭacattadēhō daṁsaṇamēttēṇa vi aṇāri-
yāṇa bhaddagabhāvaṁ jaṇaṁtō vāsasahassamaṇūṇaṁ mōṇēṇa niruvasaggaṁ vihariūṇa puṇō vi viṇīyāē nayarīē ujjāṇatthāṇaṁ purima-
tālaṁ nāma nagaraṁ saṁpattō । tattha' uttarapuratthimē disībhāē sagaḍamuhaṁ nāma ujjāṇaṁ । tammi naggōhapāyavassa hēṭṭhā aṭṭamēṇaṁ
bhattēṇaṁ puvvaṇhadēsakālē udayaṁtē sūriē phagguṇabahulēkkārasīē uttarāsāḍhānakkhattē pavvajjadivasāō ārambha vāsasahassammi
gaē bhagavaō tihukkabaṁdhavassa divvamaṇataṁ kēvalavaranāṇadaṁsaṇaṁ samuppannaṁ । sirivaddhamāṇasūrīhi viraīē risahnāhacariyammi
jiṇa kēvalakallāṇō turiyāhigārō parisamattō॥

siriri sahasāmivaṇṇaṇaṁ
aṁba ma na kari citti tuhuṁ khēu--
sō dēu dēvāhivaī, pujja pāu tihuyaṇa-namaṁsiu । naru natthi iha bhuvaṇayali, jō samatthu tasu riddhi daṁsiu॥
<lg n="1409">
  <l>niya-saṁkappa-viyappa-kiya-duha- daṁdōli nivāri</l>
  <l>tuha puttaha sama tulla - siri, kō pāvai saṁsārī</l>
</lg>
jāsu suravara- kōḍi na kayāi--
jōḍiyakara ratti diṇu, muyai pāsu supasanna - māṇasa । jasu riddhi-vittharu niyavi, hōṁti parama jōgiya vi lālasara॥
sō paramappā paramaguru, garuya-payāvu kayatthu । tihuyaṇa - siri- sira sēharau, jaṁgama - titthu pasatthu ॥ 1410 । 
chatta cāmara pavara kaṁkilli' --
siṁhāsaṇu dhammajhau, dhamma cakku sura - vihiya duṁduhi । sura-pēriya nahayalaha, kusuma - vuṭṭhi maṁḍē daha dihi॥
kaṇaya-kamala'-richōli-ṭhiu, jasu paya-kamalu vihāi । tasu tuha puttaha ēkki muhi, riddhi ki vannaṇa jāi॥1411 ॥ 
jō suvayaṇiṇa sayali jiya- lōi --
suya - saṁpaya vittharai, suhiya hōṁti jaṇa jasu pasāiṇa । sō appaṇi dukkhiyau, kēma hōi kiṁ tuha visāiṇa॥
<lg n="1412">
  <l>jasu paya-chāyahaṁ vīsamai, bhagavai bhuvaṇu asēsu</l>
  <l>suhu viyarai duhu niddalai, nihaṇai kamma - kilēsu</l>
</lg>
bhikkha bhamaḍai sayala- riddhilla-
payapaṇamiha pai diyahu, nilau natthi sō nilau savvahaṁ । ninnēhau niddha- chavi, catta- sōkkhu suhu dēi annahaṁ॥
<lg n="1413">
  <l>lōuttaru tuhu naṁdaṇaha, cariu na ciṁtaṇa jāi</l>
  <l>jai jāṇēsai sō ji para, annaha citti na ṭhāi</l>
</lg>
sakku saṁbhama bhariu vēgēṇa --
uttaravi rāvaṇaha, bhūmi bhamiru tuha puttu paṇamai । varavasaṇu tasu nivasaṇaha, surasamūhu paya-kamalu sēvai॥
<lg n="1414">
  <l>aṁba na jāyai' ciṁtaṇā, tuha puttaha māhappu</l>
  <l>sō tihuyaṇa-kāraṇa- purisu, citti ma karahi vippu</l>
</lg>

jugāijidicariya
ēvaṁ citiūṇa bhaṇiyā marudēvī -- “ ēhi ammō ! jēṇa tē puttassa riddhi dāmi । " tti bhaṇiūṇa marudēvīē
saha gaṁdhavāraṇamārūḍhō sayalariddhīē cauraṁgabalaparivāriō caliō bhagavaō vaṁdaṇavaḍiyāē bharahāhivō । samavasaraṇadēsē
ya gagaṇatalaṁ surasamūhēṇa uvayaṁtēṇa nivayaṁtēṇa niraṁtaraṁ virāyamāṇaṁ dhayavaḍaṁ pahayadēvaduṁduhinināyā pūriyadisāmaṁḍalaṁ pāsiūṇa
bharahō bhaṇiyāiō - - " pēccha ammō ! jai ērisī riddhī maha lakkhasē vi ṇa atthi । " taō tīē bhagavaō chattā-
ichatta pāsiūṇa āṇaṁda- vasavihaḍiyatimirapaḍalāē khavaga - sēḍhimārūḍhāē kēvalavaranāṇadaṁsaṇaṁ samuppannaṁ । tuṭṭaṁ ca jhaḍa tti
āuyaṁ । siddhivaravasahimuvagayā paḍhamasiddhō' tti kāūṇa dēvēhiṁ sakkārēūṇa khīrōē chūḍhaṁ kaḍēvaraṁ । bharahō vipattō
samōsaraṇaṁ paṁcavihābhigamēṇaṁ pavēsiyatipayāhiṇaṁ kāuṁ jiṇaṁ kayakarayalaṁjalīō ēvaṁ thōuṁ samāḍhattō--
<lg n="1417">
  <l>vayaṇāmaya- nivvāviya-sayala - dharavalau</l>

</lg>

</lg>
-
ubbhaḍamayaṇa-mahābhaḍa-bhaṁjaṇu, mōha-maha-lla-malla-bala- gaṁjaṇu । tihuyaṇa-paṇaya-pāu paramēsaru, jayai jugāi dēu risahēsaru॥1419 । 
sayala-surāsura-siva-sukha-kāraṇu, duttara- bhīma-bhavannava tāraṇu । hatthālaṁbaṇu narai paḍaṁtaha, risahu saraṇu saṁsāri bhamaṁtahaṁ॥ । 1420॥
<lg n="1421">
  <l>caudēhō cauvayaṇō cauhā dhammaṁ jiyāṇa dēsiṁtō</l>
  <l>usahō jēhiṁ na diṭṭhō tēhiṁ hā hāriō jammō</l>
</lg>
ēvaṁ jiṇaṁ thuṇiya nisannō īsāṇakōṇē bharahāhiyō । ētyaṁtarē addhamāgahāē jōyaṇanīhariṇīē nīsēsanarāmara-
tiriya - satthaniya - niya bhāsā pariṇāmapariṇāmiṇīē girāē samāḍhattā tēlōkkaguruṇā dhammadēsaṇā । taṁ jahā --
<lg n="1422">

</lg>
<lg n="1423">

  <l>tā ēyammi payattō kāyavō buddhimaṁtēhiṁ</l>
</lg>
sō paḍhamaṁ sōyabvō bhāvēyabvō puṇō payattēṇa । aha bhāviūṇa dhaṇiyaṁ kāyavvō suddhībhāvēṇa॥ । 1424॥
jaō--
"imō cēva māyāē, sō cēva jaṇaō ēsa cēva paramabaṁdhavō, imō cēva paramagurupasacciyanivvāṇagamaṇasaṁpaṭṭiya
bhaviyasatthakaṁdujjaō maggō ēya sahiyā savvaṭṭhāṇēsu suhiyā jaṁtuṇō ēya vihuṇā jattha vā tattha vā gayā duhadaṁdōli-
bhāyaṇaṁ savvahā imō cēva aṇēgakilēsāyāsaduhapaurāō saṁsārasāgarāō samuttārēi" tti । avi ya---

siririsahasāmivaṇṇaṇaṁ
1.63
gaṇaharanāmakammōdaēṇaṁ māuyāpayāṇi nisāmiūṇa takkhaṇā cēva ēgārasa aṁgāṇi cōhasapuvvāṇi ya virayati । ētyaṁtarē
rayaṇamayathālē divvacunnē kāūṇa caubvihadēvanikāyasaṁparivuḍō sakkō samuvaṭṭiō । taō aṇuparivāḍīē parisaṁ ṭhiyāṇaṁ
usahasēṇapāmōkkhāṇaṁ caurāsīgaṇaharāṇaṁ' cunnakkhēvapurassaraṁ suttēṇaṁ atthēṇaṁ tadubhaēṇaṁ savva-davvaṁ guṇa-naya-pajjavēhiṁ bhagavaṁ
aṇuōgāṇunnaṁ gaṇāṇunnaṁ ca karēi । dēvaduṁduhinināyapurassaraṁ sakkāiyā suragaṇā bharahavaipamuhanaranārigaṇā ya vāsanikkhēvaṁ
kubvaṁti । tē vi bhagavaṁtō viṇaōṇayāvihiyakarayalaṁjaliṇō bhagavaō vayaṇāṇi sammasaṁpaḍipucchaṁti । taō bhagavaṁ tēsi
gaṇāṇunnaṁ ca aṇuōgaṁ ca aṇujāṇiūṇa puṇō vi puvvābhihō siṁhāsaṇē nisannō pāraddhō aṇusaṭṭiganbhaṁ dhammadēsaṇaṁ
kāuṁ । ētyaṁtarē avasaraṁ lahiūṇa pucchiō sirippaha-sēṭriṇō- "bhayavaṁ ! maha suyā sirisēṇa vīrasēṇā tulladāṇāi-
dhammāṇuṭṭhāṇē annamannamaṇuratā ēgammi pallaṁkē rayaṇīē dōvi nuvaṇṇā ahiṇā ḍakkā kālagayā kahi uvavannā ?” bhagavayā
bhaṇiyaṁ --" ēgō sōhammasakkasāmāṇiō suravarō । bīō puṇa kālamuhāē mahāḍavīē mahābhuyaṁgamō । taṁ suṇiya jaṇa-
bōṇatthaṁ jāṇatēṇa vi puṭṭhō titthayarō usabhasēṇagaṇaharēṇa -- "bhayavaṁ ! kiṁ kāraṇaṁ tulladhammāṭṭhāṇēṇa vi tāṇa ērisō
phalavisēsō ?" bhagavayā bhaṇiyaṁ -- “ tullakiriyāṇa vi jīvāṇa pariṇāmavisēsēṇa phalavisēsō diṭṭhō । taṁ jahā-

varēhi gaṁdhēhiṁ ya mallēhiṁ ya cunnēhi ya vāsēhiṁ ya accēi accittā pupphāruhaṇaṁ mallāruhaṇaṁ ābharaṇārahaṇaṁ karēī karittā,
acchēhiṁ sahēhiṁ sēēhiṁ rayayāmaēhiṁ accharasātaṁdulēhiṁ cakkarayaṇassa puraō aṭṭhaṭṭhamaṁgalaē ālihai, ālihittā karayala-
vippamukkēṇaṁ dasaddhavannēṇaṁ kusumabharēṇa pupphōvayārakaliyaṁ karēi, karitā varadhūvaṁ dahai । varadhūvaṁ dahittā tikkhuttō āyāhiṇa-
payāhiṇaṁ karēi, karitā sattaṭṭhapayāiṁ paccōsakkai, paccōsakkittā vāmaṁ jāṇuṁ aṁcēi, aṁcittā dāhiṇaṁ jāṇuṁ dharaṇitalaṁsi
nihaṭṭu tikkhuttō muddhāṇaṁ dharaṇitalaṁsi nivāḍē, nivāḍittā īsi paccōnnamai, paccōnnamittā karayalapariggahiyaṁ sirasā-

ussukkaṁ ukkaraṁ adējjaṁ amējjaṁ abhaḍappavēsaṁ adaṁḍakudaṁḍimaṁ gaṇiyā varanāḍaijjakaliyaṁ aṇēgatālāyarāṇucariyaṁ pahaya-
muiṁgaṁ amilāyamalladāmaṁ pamuiyapakkīliyaṁ sapurajaṇujjāṇajaṇavayaṁ cakkarayaṇassa aṭṭhāhiyāmahāmahimaṁ karēha, karēhittā
mama ēyamāṇattiyaṁ khippāmēva paccappiṇaha" tē vi taha tti kāūṇa paccappiṇaṁti ।

dōṇīsaṇāhaṁ phalimayasīhāsaṇōvaraṁjiyaṁ saṁpattō ṇhavaṇabhūmiyaṁ । nisannō puratthābhimuhō mhavaṇasī hāsaṇē । taō chēēhiṁ
mēhāvīhiṁ purisēhiṁ abbhaṁgiō sayapāga - sahassapāgatēllēhi । saṁvāhiō aṭṭhasuhāē maṁsasuhāē cammasuhāē rōmasuhāē cau-
vihāē saṁvāhaṇāē । uvvaṭṭiō sugaṁdhagaṁdhavaṭṭaēṇaṁ । taō kāō vi maragayamahākuṁbhapabhāsāmalijjatadēhāō paumiṇīō
vva sapattāō, kāō vi vāmahatthaṭṭhiyakaṇaya-kalasapāsaviṇihittadāhiṇakarapallavavisaṭṭaṁtanahamaūhajālāō, paṁcaguli -
viṇiggayajalapūrapabbhārāō salilajaṁtadēvayāō iva kāō viya kalahōya - kalasavāvaḍakarāō, rayaṇīō vva punnimāiṁda
maṁḍalaviṇiggayajōhāpavāhāō, kāō vi gurukalasuvvahaṇāyāsiyasaṁjāyasēyaṇhāyasarīrāō, jaladēvayāō vva phaliha-
kalasa-saṇāhāō, varataruṇikāmiṇīō parivāḍīē naranāhamabhisicaṁti । ēvaṁ varavihīē pavaravibhūīē hāē varavattha-
niyatthē appamahagghābharaṇālaṁkiyasarīrē varamauḍaditta - siraē āviddhavīravalaē sōlasajakkhasahassakayapāḍihērē haya-gaya-
rahapavara - jōhasaṁkulāē cāuraṁgiṇīē sēṇāē samaṁtaō parivēḍhiē jēṇēva ābhisēkkē hatthirayaṇē tēṇēva uvāgacchai, uvā-
gacchittā aṁjaṇagiri kūḍasaṁnihaṁ gayavaraṁ naravaī durūḍhē abbhahiya rāyatēyalacchīē dippamāṇē maṁgalamuhalamāgahasaēhi saṁdhuvva-
māṇē jayasaddakyālōē sakōrēṁṭamalladāmēṇaṁ chattēṇaṁ dharijjamāṇēṇaṁ sēyacāmarāhi uddhavvamāṇīhiṁ uddhavvamānīhiṁ mahayā
kalayalaravēṇaṁ pakkhubhiyasamuddaravabhūyaṁ piva mēiṇī karēmāṇē narasīhē naravaī nariṁdē naravasa tihuyaṇapahiyakittī amara-
assanihāē vibhūīē gaṁgāē nahānaīē dakkhiṇillēṇaṁ kūlēṇaṁ gāmāgaranagara- khēḍa - kavbaḍamaḍaṁba - dōṇamuha-paṭṭaṇāsama-saṁvāha-
sayasahassamaṁḍiyaṁ thimiyamēiṇīyaṁ vasuhaṁ abhijiṇamāṇē, abhijiṇamāṇē, aggāī varāī rayaṇāī paḍicchamāṇē paḍiccha-
māṇē taṁ divvaṁ cakkarayaṇaṁ aṇugacchamāṇē aṇugacchamāṇē jōyaṇaṁtariyāhi vasahīhiṁ vasamāṇē, vasamāṇē jēṇēva māgaha-
titthē tēṇēva ugāvagacchai । taṁ ca cakkarayaṇaṁ jōyaṇaṁ gaṁtūṇa ṭhāi । tattha kila jōyaṇāṇa saṁkhā jāyā । taēṇa sē māgaha-
titthassa adūrasāmaṁtē duvālasajōyaṇāyāmaṁ navajōyaṇavitthiṣṇaṁ varanagarasaricchaṁ vijayakhaṁdhāvāranivēsa karēi, karitā
vaḍhai rayaṇaṁ saddāvēi, saddāvēttā ēvaṁ vayāsī -- " khippāmēva bhō dēvāṇuppiyā ! jahārihaṁ cauraṁga - balasahiyassa mama āvāsa
karēha । ēgaṁ ca pōsahasālaṁ nivvattēhi, nivvattēhittā ēyamāṇattiyaṁ paccaṣpiṇāhi" । sē vi savvaṁ karētā tahēva paccappi-
paṁti । taē ṇaṁ sē bharahē rāyā abhisēkkāō hatthirayaṇāō paccōruhara, paccōruhittā jēṇēva pōsahasālā tēṇēva uvā-
gacchai, uvāgacchittā pōsahasālaṁ pamajjai, pamajjittā dabbhasaṁthārayaṁ saṁtharēi, saṁtharittā māgahatitthakumāraṁ dēvaṁ maṇasī
karēmāṇē aṭṭamabhattaṁ pagiṇhara, parihittā pōsahasālāē pōsahiē ummukkamaṇi- suvaṇṇē vavagayamālāvatagavilēvaṇē nikkhitta-
satthamusalē baṁbhayārī ēgē abīē dabbhasaṁthārōvagaē pōsahaṁ paḍijāgaramāṇē, paḍijāgaramāṇē viharai । taē ṇaṁ bharahērāyā
aṭṭamabhattaṁsi pariṇamamāṇaṁsi pōsahasālāō paḍinikkhamai, paḍinikkhamittā hāē kayabalikammē kayakōuyamaṁgalapāyacchittē
sachattaṁ sajjhayaṁ vihihāuhapaharaṇapaḍipunnaṁ cāughaṁṭaṁ āsa rahaṁ durūḍhē । taē ṇaṁ sē sirōvaribirāyaṁtachattarayaṇē ubhayapāsanivaḍaṁta
cārucāmarāē cāuraṁgiṇīē sēṇāē samaṁtaō saṁparikkhittē cakkarayaṇadēsiyamaggē aṇēgarāyasahassāṇuyāyamaggē mahayā
ukkiṭṭhē - siṁhanāyabōlakalayalaravēṇaṁ phōḍayaṁtō cēva aṁbaratalaṁ puratthābhimuhē māgahatitthēṇaṁ lavaṇasamuddaṁ ōgāhēti jāva
rahassanāhī ullātaō ṭaṁkārarakhā pūriyamahimaṁḍalaṁ paṁcavannamaṇirayaṇacicaiyaviggahaṁ airuggayavālayaṁda iṁdadhaṇusannigāsaṁ
dappiyavaramahisadaḍhakaḍhiṇasiṁgaggasarisasāraṁ parahuyabhamarakulakasiṇōragēṁdanīlaniddhacchavi niuṇōviyamisimisitamaṇi-
rayaṇaghaṁṭiyājālaparikkhittaṁ taḍitaruṇataraṇikiraṇatavaṇijjabaddhacidhapaṭṭa kālahariyaratta - pīya- sukkila - bahuṇhāruṇisaṁpiṇaddhaṁ
riujaṇajīviyaṁtakaraṁ dhaṇuṁ giṇhai । varavairasāratikkhatuṁḍaṁ ravikarasaṁgasaṁvaḍḍhiyatēyaduddaṁsaṇaṁ kaṁcaṇamaṇirayaṇaraiyasukaya-
puṁkhaṁ aṇēgamaṇirayaṇaramaṇīyasa ra lihiyanāmakkharaṁ tihuyaṇasaṁkhōhakaraṁ āyayakaṇṇāyayaṁ saraṁ ca kāūṇa imāī udārāī

taē ṇaṁ sē bharahē rāyā rahaṁ parāvattēi parāvattēittā lavaṇasamuddāō māgahatitthē ṇaṁ paccuttarai, paccuttaritā

suhāsaṇavaragaē aṇēgabhaḍabhōiēhiṁ saddhiṁ aṭṭhamabhattāō pārēi, pāritā jēṇēva bāhiriyā uvaṭṭaṇisālā tēṇēva uvāgacchaḍ
uvāgacchittā pavarasiṁhāsaṇē nisīyai, nisīittā aṭṭhārasasēṇippasēṇīō sahāvē, sahāvēttā ēvaṁ vayāsī – “ khippāmēva bhō
dēvāṇuppiyā ! māgahatitthāhivassa mahayā mahayā vicchaḍḍēṇaṁ aṭṭhāhiyā mahimaṁ karēha, karitā ēyamāṇattiyaṁ khippāmēva
paccappiṇaha" tē vi tahēva kāūṇa paccappiṇaṁti ।

taē ṇaṁ sē divvē cakkarayaṇē vairāmayatuṁbē lōhiyakkhamayā raē jaṁbūṇayanēmīē maṇimuttājālavibhūsiē sanaṁdighōsē

taē ṇaṁ sē naravaī dāhiṇābhimuhē varadāmatitthēṇaṁ cakkadhurā pamāṇaṁ lavaṇajalahijalamōgāḍhē dhaṇuṁ giṇhai saraṁ
muyai sē vi ya ṇaṁ sarē varadāmatitthāhivassē bhavaṇaṁgaṇē nivaḍai sē vi ya ṇaṁ varadāmatitthāhivaī sakōvē saraṁ ginhai । 
uppannē bharahē paḍhamabharahā hivai tti akkharāṇi vāēi । pasamasalilavijjhaviyakōvānalē rayaṇamālaṁ mauḍaṁ muttājālaṁ
hēmajālaṁ kaḍagāṇi tuḍiyāṇi ya gahāya āgaē । bharahaṁ ēvaṁ vayāsī -- " aha ṇṇaṁ dēvāṇuppiyāṇaṁ āṇāniddēsakarē
varadāmatitthāhi dāhiṇillē aṁtēvāsī । taṁ giṇhaṁtu ṇaṁ dēvāṇuppiyā ! imaṁ pīidāṇaṁ ti bhaṇiūṇa mālāmauḍāiyaṁ
paṇāmēi । bharahē vi sammaṁ paḍicchai varadāmatitthāhivaṁ sakkārēi sammāṇēi paḍivisajjēi । appaṇā vi jēṇēva
vijayakhaṁdhāvārē tēṇēva uvāgacchai uvāgacchittā vhāē ya kayabalikammēṁ bhuttē samāṇē varadāma- titthāhivassa aṭṭhāhiyaṁ
mahimaṁ karēi । taō cakkarayaṇaṁ dēsiyamaggē paccatthimadisābhimuhē payāē yāvi hōtthā । tahēva khaṁdhāvāranivēsaṁ
pabhāsatitthāsanē karēi tahēva aṭṭamaṁ giṇhai rahamārūhai pabhāsatitthēṇaṁ rahanābhimēttajalaṁ lavaṇasamudaṁ ōgāhai saraṁ
muyai sē viyaṇaṁ sarē pabhāsatitthā hivassa gharaṁgaṇē nivaḍai । sē vi ya ṇaṁ pabhāsatitthāhivē sara - nāmakkhara - vinnāyavr̥ttaṁtē
cūḍāmaṇīdivvaṁ uratthaṁgē vējjaṁsōṇīsuttaṁ kaḍagāṇi ya tuḍiyāṇi ya gahāya samāgaē । aṁtalikkhapaḍivannē jaē gaṁ
vijaēṇaṁ bharahāhivaṁ vaddhāvēi vaddhāvaittā ēvaṁ vayāsī - - " aha ṇṇaṁ tubbhāṇaṁ visayavāsī pabhāsatitthāhivē dēvāṇu -
ppiyāṇaṁ kiṁkarē vasē vaṭṭāmi taṁ giṇhaṁtu ṇaṁ dēvāṇuppiyā imaṁ ēyārūvaṁ mama pāhuḍaṁ "ti bhaṇiūṇa maṇimāiyaṁ uvāyaṇī
karēi । sē vi sammaṁ saṁpacchii pabhāsatitthāhivaṁ sakkāriūṇa visajjēi । appaṇā vi vijayakhaṁdhāvāramāgaṁtūṇa aṭṭamāō
pārēi pabhāsatitthahivassa aṭṭhāhiyaṁ mahāmahimaṁ karēi । pabhāsatitthāhivassa aṭṭhā hiyāē mahāmahimāē nivvattāē cakkarayaṇa-
dēsiyamaggē siṁdhūē mahānaīē dāhiṇillēṇaṁ kūlēṇaṁ puratthābhimuhē siṁdhudēvī bhavaṇābhimuhē payāē yā vi hōtthā । 
taō siṁdhudēvī bhuvaṇassa adūrasāmaṁtē vijayakhaṁdhāvāranivēsa karēi, karitā siṁdhudēvi maṇē kāūṇa aṭṭamabhattaṁ giṇhai,
aṭṭhamabhattaṁsi pariṇamamāṇaṁsi siṁdhudēvīē āsaṇaṁ calai । ōhi pauṁjai, jīyakappaṁ sarai “kicca mēyaṁ tīyapaḍuppannamaṇāgayāṇaṁ
bharahasāmiyāṇaṁ pūyāsakkāraṁ karēttaē" tti kaṭṭu kuṁbhaṭṭasahassaṁ rayaṇavicittaṁ nāṇāmaṇikaṇagarayaṇabhatticittāṇi duvē kaṇaga-
bhaddāsaṇāṇi kaḍagāṇi ya tuḍiyāṇī ya vatthāṇi ya ābharaṇāṇi ya gahāya āgacchai, āgacchittā aṁtalikkhapaḍivannāī
sakhikhiṇīyāiṁ pavaravatthāī parihiyā bharahaṁ rāyāṇaṁ jaēṇaṁ vijayaēṇaṁ vaddhāvēi, vadbhāvaittā ēvaṁ vayāsī - - aha naṁ
dēvāṇuppiyāṇaṁ visayanivāsiṇī kikari tti bhaṇiūṇa vicittarayaṇa kuṁbhaṭṭasahassāiyaṁ pāhuḍaṁ payacchai bharahē vi sāyaraṁ paḍicchai,
pacchittā siṁdhudēvi sakkārēi sammāṇēi saṁbhāsēi paḍivisajjēi । appaṇā vi khaṁdhavāramāgacchai āgacchittā aṭṭhamāō pārēi,
pārittā siṁdhudēvīē aṭṭhāhiyā mahimaṁ karēi nivvattiyāē aṭṭhāhiyā mahimāē sē cakkarayaṇē āuhagharasālāō paḍinikkhamai,
paḍinikkhamittā uttaraputthimēṇaṁ disībhāēṇaṁ vēyaḍḍhapavvayābhimuhē payāē yāvi hōtthā । 
tāhē jōyaṇamāṇēhiṁ suhr̥ppayāṇaēhiṁ gaṁtūṇa vēyaḍḍhapavvayassa dāhiṇē niyaṁbē khaṁdhāvāraṁ nivēsai nivēsittā aṭṭamaṁ pariṇhai
aṭṭamabhattaṁsi pariṇamamāṇaṁsi bēyaḍḍhagirikumārassa vi āsaṇē calai ōhi pauṁjai pāsai bharahē vāsē paḍhamacakkaharaṁ
samuppannaṁ । taō paṭṭamāṇasō nāṇāviharayaṇāṇi mahagghaṁ mōllāṇi dēvadūsāṇi ābhisēkkō alaṁkārō annaṁpi bhaddāsaṇa-
vīrāsaṇāīyaṁ ghēttūṇa samāgaō । aṁtalikkhapaḍivannō bharahāhivaṁ jaēṇaṁ vijayaṇaṁ vaddhāvēi uvāyaṇaṁ paṇāmēi sēvaṁ saṁpaḍivajjai
sē vi bharahāhivē sakkāriūṇa visajjēi । appaṇā vi khaṁdhāvāraṁ gaṁtūṇa aṭṭhamāō pārē । vēyaḍḍhagirikumārassa aṭṭhāhiyā
mahimaṁ karēi । taē ṇaṁ sē cakkarayaṇē timisaguhābhimuhē payāē yāvi hōtthā । tayaṇucakkāhivē vi suhaṁ suhēṇa gaṁtūṇa
timisagūhāē adūrasāmaṁtē khaṁdhāvāranivēsa karēi kayamālayaṁ dēvaṁ maṇasī kāūṇa aṭṭamabhattaṁ pagiṇhai । aṭṭamabhattē pariṇamamāṇē

daṁḍarayaṇaṁ parāmusa । taē ṇaṁ taṁ daṁḍarayaṇaṁ vairasāramayaṁ sattusēnnaviṇāsaṇaṁ khaṁdhāvārē naravaissa gaḍḍa-dari pabbhāra - girivara-
visamaṭṭhāṇasamīkaraṇaṁ hiyakaraṁ saṁtikaraṁ suhakaraṁ rannō hiyaicchiyamaṇōraha-pūragaṁ divyamappasihayaṁ daṁḍarayaṇaṁ gahāya sattaṭṭhapaē
paccōsakkai । paccōsakkittā tē kavāḍē tēṇa daṁḍarayaṇēṇa mahayā mahayā saddēṇaṁ tikkhuttō āuḍēi । taē ṇaṁ tē dāraka-
vāḍā daṁḍarayaṇēṇa samāyā samāṇā mahayā mahayā saddēṇaṁ kuṁcāravaṁ karēmāṇā karēmāṇā sarasarassa sagāī sagāī ṭhāṇāī
paccōsavikatthā । 
taē ṇaṁ sē susēṇē sēṇāvaī jēṇēva bharahē rāyā tēṇēva uvāgacchai uvāgacchattā kayapaṇāmē kavāḍugghāḍaṇaṁ sāhēi । 
bharahāhivō vi cauraṁgabalaparivāriō gaṁdhavāraṇārūḍhō jēṇēva timisaguhaṁ tēṇēva uvāgacchai । taē ṇaṁ sē bharahē cauraṁgula-
māṇaṁ mēttaṁ aṇagdhēyaṁ sapāḍihēraṁ aṇōvamajuī maṇirayaṇaṁ paīvasamaṁ paṇāsiyā sēsatamaṁdhayāraṁ jēṇēva muddhāgaēṇaṁ dukkhaṁ na
kiṁ ci jāyai । havai ārōggēya savvakālaṁ tēricchiyā divvā māṇusā ya uvasaggā savvē na karēṁti kiṁ ci dukkhaṁ
saṁgamē vi ya asatthabajjhō havai narō taṁ maṇirayaṇaṁ bharahāhivō gahāya hatthirayaṇassa dāhiṇillāē kuṁbhīē nikkhivai । 
taē ṇaṁ ( bharahāhivē ṇariṁdē ) haya-gaya-raha- jōha - saṁkulāē cāuriṁgiṇīē sēṇāē saddhi saṁparivuḍē taṁ timisaguhaṁ dāhiṇillēṇaṁ
duvārēṇaṁ sasi vva mēhaṁdharayāranivahaṁ aīī । tēēṇaṁ sē bharahē chattalaṁ duvālasaṁsiyaṁ aṭṭhakanniyaṁ ahigaraṇisaṁṭhāṇasaṁṭhiya
aṭṭhasōvanniyaṁ jakkhasahassakayapāḍihēraṁ cauraṁgulapamāṇamēttaṁ samatalaṁ māṇummāṇapamāṇajōgaṁ ( yara juttaṁ duvālasajōyaṇāṇi
timiranigarapaḍisēhagaṁ sasisūrajaliyajalaṇajagaḍiya tēyaṁ ) jassa pabhāvēṇa cakkavaṭṭī cauraṁgabalasahiō tamisaguhaṁ
laṁghiūṇa vīyamaḍḍhabharahaṁ uyavēi । taṁ kāgiṇirayaṇaṁ gahāya rāyavarē puratthimapaccatthimillēsu kaḍaēsu jōyaṇaṁtariyāī
paṁcadhaṇusayāyāmavikkhaṁbhāī jōyaṇujjōyakarāī ( cakkaṇēmīsaṁṭhiyāī caṁdamaṁḍalapaḍiṇigāsāī ēgūṇapaṇṇaṁ maṁḍalāī) ālihamāṇē
ālihamāṇē timisaguhamaṇupavisai । jāva kila dharai cakkavaṭṭī tāva tāṇi maṁḍalāṇi dharaṁti guhā vi tahā ugghāḍiyā cēva
ciṭṭha tēhi maṁḍalēhi ālōyabhūyā ujjōyabhūyā sūrarassīhiṁ ca paṇāsiyaṁdhayārā caṁdakiraṇēhiṁ ca kavaliyatamaṁdhayārā

ō pannattāō । jāō ṇaṁ timisaguhāē puratthimillāō bhittikaḍagāō pavūḍhāō samāṇīō paccatthimēṇaṁ siṁdhu mahānaī

pakkhippara taṇṇaṁ sā tikkhuttō āhuṇiya āhuṇiya ēgaṁtē thalaṁsi ēḍēi । jaṇṇaṁ nimmaggajalāē pakkhippara taṇṇaṁ sā aṁtō jalaṁsi

mahayā kuṁcāravaṁ karēmāṇā karēmāṇā sarasarassa sagāī sagāī ṭhāṇāī usakkaṁti paccōsakkitthā ।

aparibhūyā sūrā vīrā. vikkatā vitthinnaviulabalavāhaṇā bahusu samarasaṁparāēsu laddhalakkhā yāvi hōtthā ।

saddāvēṁti saddāvēttā ēvaṁ vayāsī -- "ēsa ṇaṁ dēvāṇuppiyā ! kēi apatthiyapatthiē siri-hiri-dhī- kitti vajjiē duraṁtapaṁtalakkhaṇē

duni vi payaḍapayāvā dunni vi vararūvajōyaṇum puṇṇā । niyasēḍhīṇaṁ tahiyaṁ uppāiṁttā paramapīī
samacauraṁsa-sarīrā sasi - sama-jasabhariya-sayala - bhuvaṇayalā । risahēsara - payapaṇayā lakkhaṇapaḍipuṇṇasavvaṁgā
ghaṇaniviya - niddhakēsā caṁdaddhaniḍālavaṭṭa samasōhā । ghaṇamasiṇaniddhabhamuhā dhavalāyayakasiṇa taṁ vacchā
asaṁtapatta -savaṇā garuyā ya tuṁganāsiyā vaṁsā । 'varavidda masamaaharā daraviyasiyakuṁdasamadasaṇā
kaṁbuvarasarisagīvā visālavacchatthalā palaṁbabhuyā । varavairamajjha majjhā kēsarikaḍikaḍiyaḍābhōga
gayavarakarasarisōrū ēṇī kurūvidavattajaṁghillā । kummunnayacalaṇajuyā dappuddharakaṁdharā dhīrā'
risahēsarapayapaṁkaya sēvāsaṁjaṇiyabhōgadullaliyā । āviddhavīravalayā vijjāharapaṇayapayakamalā
payaḍapayāvā vaḍavānala vva mahimaṁḍalammi supagāsā । riubalajalahijalēṇa vi jalaṁti jē unha - vijjaṁtā
nisiyaggakhaggadhārā khaviyavivakkhā jamō vva paccakkhā । sumiṇē vi sumariyā jē dēti bhayaṁ sattusuhaḍāṇa
viṇamikhayaridabhajjā rūvasirī paramarūvasaṁpaṇē । purisatthē viva pavarē cattāri suē pasūyā sā
raṇasurasūravikkamatrivikkamabālasūranāmāṇō । pannattipamuhavijjāhiṁ parigayā garuyamāhappā
tāṇuvarisasikalāviva ānaṁdiyasayalatihuyaṇābhōgā । niruvamaguṇēhiṁ kaliyā jāyā duhiyā sayā suhiyā
vaddhāviō saharisaṁ harisavisappaṁtalōyaṇajuyāē । dāsīē harisiyāē duhiyā jammēṇa khayariṁdō

<lg n="1792">
  <l>dōsā vi gāravijjati guṇamahagghēhi savva vijjaṁtā</l>
  <l>lajjijjai nigguṇasalahiēhi garuēhiṁ vi guṇēhiṁ</l>

179
taō bharahō vatthābharaṇāīhi sammāṇiūṇa khayarāhivē visajjēi । appaṇā vi cakka - rayaṇadēsiyamaggē uttara-
puratthimēṇaṁ disībhāgēṇaṁ gaṁgādēvibhavaṇābhimuhē payāē yāvi hōtthā । taē ṇaṁ sē bharahē gaṁgābhavaṇassa naccāsapaṇē nāidūrē
vijayakhaṁdhāvāraṁ nivēsaṁ karēi । jā siṁdhudēvī tahā gaṁgaṁ pi ōyavēi । sō puṇa gaṁgādēvī kuṁbhaṭṭasahassaṁ rayaṇacittaṁ nāṇāma-
ṇi kaṇaga - rayaṇa bhatticittāṇi ya duvē siṁhāsaṇāṇi uvaṇēi । bharahō vi gaṁgāē aṭṭhāhiyā mahāmahimaṁ kāūṇa cakkarayaṇa-
dēsiyamaggē dāhiṇadisāēṁ khaṁḍappavāyābhimuhē payāē yāvi hōtthā । taē ṇaṁ sē bharahē khaṁḍappavāyaguhāsaṇṇē khaṁdhāvāranivēsaṁ
karēi । naṭṭamālayaṁ maṇasī kāūṇa aṭṭamabhattaṁ pariṇhai aṭṭamabhattaṁsi pariṇamamāṇaṁsi tassa naṭṭamālayadēvassa āsaṇaṁ calai । 
āsaṇaṁ caliyē pāsittā ōhiṁ pauṁjai kēvalakappaṁ jaṁbuddīvaṁ ōhiṇā ābhōēmāṇē ābhōēmāṇē bharahāhivaṁ pāsai, pāsittā
bharahaṁtiyamāgacchai । nāṇāvihāṇi āharaṇāṇi bharahassa uvāyaṇī karēi । sēvaṁ ca paḍivajjai । bharahō vi taṁ sakkāriūṇa
visajjēi । aṭṭhāhiyā mahimaṁ ca karēi । taē ṇaṁ sē bharahē naṭṭamālayassa aṭṭhāhiyāē nivvattāē samāṇīē sēṇāvaī āṇavē --
" gacchaha ṇaṁ bhō ! gaṁgāpuvvillaṁ nikkhuḍaṁ samavisamāṇi ya ōyavēhi । sō vi siṁdhu nikkhuḍavattanvayāē savvaṁ ōyavēi
ōyavittā gahiyanāṇāvihōvayārē jēṇēva bharahē tēṇēva uvāgacchai savvōvayārē bharahassa uvaṇēi । bharahavisajjiē viulāī
māṇussagāī bhōgabhōgāī bhuṁjamāṇē viharai । bharahō vi vāsasahassamaṇūṇaṁ gaṁgā dēvīē saha bhōgē bhuṁjai । taē ṇaṁ sē bharahē
aṇṇayā kayāi sēṇāvaī āṇavittā ēvaṁ vayāsī -- " gaccha ṇaṁ bhō khaṁḍappavāyaguhāē uttarillassa duvārassa kavāḍē
vihāḍēhi, vihāḍittā ēyamāṇattiyaṁ pañcappiṇāhi" । taē ṇaṁ sē sēṇāvaī naṭṭamālayaṁ dēvaṁ maṇasī kāūṇa aṭṭhamabhattaṁ giṇhai । 
tammi ya pariṇamamāṇaṁsi pōsahasālāō paḍinikkhamēi paḍinikkhamittā hāē kayabalikammē kayakōuya-maṁgala- pāyacchittē
appamahagghābharaṇālaṁkiyasarīrē dhūvakaḍucchrayahatthagaē jēṇēva khaṁḍappavāyaguhāē uttarillē duvārē jēṇēva tāṇi kavāḍāṇi
tēṇēva uvāgacchai ālōē paṇāmaṁ karēi karitā kavāḍē sakkārēi sammāṇēi aṭṭhaṭṭhamaṁgalē ālihai ālihittā taṁ divvaṁ
daṁḍarayaṇaṁ gahāya sattaṭṭhapaē paccōsakkai paccōsikkittā tē kavāḍē tēṇa daṁḍarayaṇēṇa mahayā mahayā saddēṇa tikkhuttō
āuḍēi । taē ṇaṁ tē kavāḍā daṁḍarayaṇāhayā mahayā mahayā saddēṇaṁ kuṁcārakhaṁ karēmāṇā sarasarassa vihaḍiyā । taē ṇaṁ sē
sēṇāvaī bharahassa ēyamāṇattiyaṁ pañcappiṇai । bharahē vi ya ṇaṁ gayavaī durūḍē maṇirayaṇaṁ parāmusai tō taṁ cauraṁgulappamāṇaṁ
maṇirayaṇaṁ gahāya hatthirayaṇassa dāhiṇillāē kuṁbhīē nikkhivai tēṇa maṇirayaṇēṇa viṇihayatamaṁdhayārē sa balavāhaṇa-
khaṁḍappāyaguhaṁ pavisai । kāgiṇīrayaṇēṇa ya ēgūṇapaṁcāsamaṁḍalāṇi ālihai । saṁkamakaraṇēṇa ummagganimmaggāō uttarai । 
tāō puṇa naīō paccatthimēllāō kaḍagāō pavūḍhāō puratthimillēṇaṁ gaṁgānaī samappiti । taē ṇaṁ sē bharahē suhaṁ suhēṇaṁ
bahamāṇē tāva gaē jāva khaṁḍappavāyaguhāē dāhiṇillassa dubārassa kavāḍā tē puṇa sayaṁ cēva vihiḍiyā । taē ṇaṁ sē
bhārahāhivē savalavāṇē tīē guhāē dāhiṇillēṇaṁ duvārēṇaṁ nīi । taē ṇaṁ sē rāyā gaṁgāē naīē paccatthimaṁsi kūlaṁsi
khaṁdhāvāranivēsaṁ kāūṇa nihirayaṇē maṇasī kāūṇa aṭṭhamabhattaṁ pariṇhai । taē ṇaṁ aṭṭhamabhattaṁsi pariṇamamāṇaṁsi aparimiya-
rattarayaṇā dhuvā akkhayā avvayā lōyavissuyajasā lōgōvacayakarā dēvakayapāḍihērāō uvāgayā navanihaō taṁ jahā ----

taē ṇaṁ bharahē rāyā nihirayaṇāṇaṁ aṭṭhāhiyaṁ mahimaṁ karēi । nivvattāē aṭṭhāhiyā mahimāē susēṇaṁ sēṇāvaī saddāvēi
sahāvaittā ēvaṁ vayāsī - " gaccha ṇaṁ tumaṁ dēvāṇuppiyā ! gaṁgāē puratthimillē dōcvaṁ nikkhuḍaṁ ōyavēhi । sē vi ōyavēttā paḍiniyattē
samāṇē tamāṇattiyaṁ pañcappii bharahēṇa sakkā riyasammāṇiyapaḍivisajjiē māṇussagāī bhōgabhōgāī bhuṁjamāṇē viharai । 
taē ṇaṁ sē cakkarayaṇē aṇṇayā kayāī aṁtalikkha paḍivaṇṇē sāhiyachakkhaṁḍamēiṇītalē viṇīyābhimuhē payāē yāvi hōtthā । 
taē ṇaṁ sē bharahē rāyā hatthikhaṁdhavaragaē ajjiyarajjē nijjiyasattū uppaṇṇa-sayala rayaṇappahāṇē navanihisamiddhakōsē battīsā
rāyavarasahassāṇugayamaggē saṭṭhīē vāsasahassēhiṁ kēvalakappaṁ bhārahavāsaṁ ōyavittā pahāē kayabalikammē kayakōuya-maṁgala-
pāyacchittē appamahagghābharaṇālaṁkiyasarīrē amaravaisannihāē riddhīē tihuyaṇapahiyakittīcakka - rayaṇadēsiyamaggē haya-gaya-
raha jōi - cauvvihasēṇṇasannināēṇa pakkhubhiyasamuddaravabhūyaṁ piva mēiṇa karēmāṇē gāmāgara-nagara-khēḍa- kabbaḍa - maḍaṁba paṭṭāṇāsama
sannivēsāī laṁghēmāṇē jōyaṇaṁtariyāhi vasahi vasamāṇē vasamāṇē viṇīyaṁ rāyahāṇi uvāgaē, adūrasāmaṁtē kayakhaṁdhāvāranivēsō
pōsahasālamaṇupavisai ṇiruvasaggapaccayaṁ viṇīyaṁ rāyahāṇi maṇasī karēmāṇē aṭṭamabhattaṁ pariṇhai aṭṭamabhattaṁsi pari-
ṇamamāṇaṁsi pōsahasālāō paḍinikkhamai paḍitikkhamittā aṇēgabhaḍa - bhōiyāisahiē pavaravihīē bhuttē samāṇē siṁhāsaṇavaragaē
saṁvacchariya nivēiē suhamuhuttē āsiya sammajjivalittaṁ usiyadhayapaḍāgaṁ parabhavaṇanibaddhavaṁdaṇamālaṁ maṁcāimaṁcakaliyaṁ siṁghāḍaga-
gatiya- caukka- caccara-caumuha - mahāpaha-pahēsu kaṇayaghaḍiyāsu ujjhamāṇakālā garu-kuṁdurukka turukka kappūrapūraviṇissa raṁtadhūmaṁ -
dhayāriyanahayalaṁ viṇīyaṁ nayariṁ pavisiumāraddhō । 
taē ṇaṁ bharahassa pavisamāṇassa bahavē atthatthiyā kāmatthiyā bhōgatthiyā pūsamāṇayā ēvaṁ vayāsī-
-jaya jaya naṁdā !
jaya jaya naravasabhā ! bhaddaṁ tē ajiyaṁ jiṇāhi, sattuvakkhaṁ vijiyaṁ pālēhi bhārahaṁ vāsaṁ । iṁdō iva dēvāṇaṁ, caṁdō iva
tārayāṇaṁ, dharaṇō viva nāgāṇaṁ, bahuīō puvvakōḍākōḍīō viṇīyāē nayarīē cullahimavaṁta - giri-sāgara- mērāgayassa ya
sagāmāgara-nagara-khēḍakabbaḍa - maṁḍaba- dōṇamuha-paṭṭaṇā sama- sannivēsasahiyassa bhārahavāsassa samaṁ payāpālaṇōvajjiya-laddhajasē
mahayāīsariyaṁ karēmāṇē pālēmāṇē suhaṁ suhēṇaṁ viharāhi" tti kaṭṭa abhinaṁdaṁti abhithuṇaṁti ya । 
taē ṇaṁ sē bharahē rāyā sayala naranārimaṇōrahamālāhiṁ vicchippamāṇē nayaṇasahassēhiṁ pēcchijja māṇē
aṁguli sahassēhiṁ daṁsi - jjamāṇē sagabhavaṇavaravaḍēṁsagapaḍiduvārē uvāgacchittā hatthirayaṇaṁ ṭhavēi

181
paḍivisajjēi । ēvaṁ battīsaṁ rāyavarasahassē sēṇāvai
aṭṭhārasa sēṇippasēṇīō annē ya bahavē rāīsara - talavara
- māḍaṁbiya - kōḍuṁbiya sēṭṭi - satyavāha - pabhiiō sakkāritā sammāṇittā paḍivisajjēi । itthīrayaṇēṇaṁ battīsāē pavara-
- sēṭṭhi-satthavāha-pabhiiō
rāyakannayā । sahassēhiṁ battīsāē ya jaṇavayappahāṇa kannayā' sahassēhi battīsāē ya battīsaibaddhēhiṁ nāḍayasahassēhi saddhi
saṁparivuḍē kubērarāyā va kēlāsasiharisiṁgabhūyaṁ bhavaṇavaravaḍisayaṁ aṇupaviṭṭhē । 
.
taē ṇaṁ sē bharahē rāyā puvvābhimuhē siṁhāsaṇavaranisapaṇē kayanāṇāvihakōūya-maṁgalōvayārē vivihasaṁka hāhi
khaṇamēttamacchiūṇa majjaṇagharamaṇupavisa pavaramajjaṇavihīē majjiē mitta-nāi niyaga-sayaṇa-saṁbaṁdhipariyaṇēṇa annēhi ya
bhaḍa bhōīēhi saddhi aṭṭamabhattāō pārē uppi pāsāyavaragaē phuṭṭatēhi muiṁgamatthaēhi battīsaibaddhēhiṁ nāḍaēhi uvalāli-
jjamāṇē 2 uvagijjamāṇē mahayā haya-naṭṭa- gīya-vāiya-taṁtī- tala-tāla- muiṁgapaḍu-pavāiyaravēṇaṁ māṇussagāī bhōgabhōgāī bhuṁjamāṇē
viharaṛa । 
taē ṇaṁ tassa bharahassaraṇṇō aṇṇayā kayāi tē dēvāiyā mahārāyābhisēyaṁ kāukāmā bharaharāyāṇaṁ vinnavaṁti --
"jiē ṇaṁ dēvāṇuppiēhi bhārahē vāsē, vasamuvāgayā vijjāharāiyā rāyāṇō tamaṇujāṇaha mahārāyābhisēyaṁ karēmō । " bharahō
vitaṁ dēvāiyāṇa cavaṇamaṇumaṇṇai tē vi haṭṭatuṭṭā kayaṁjalikō ābhiōgiyā dēvā viṇīyāē nayarīē uttarapuratthimē disībhāē
ēvaṁ mahaṁ abhisēyamaṁḍavaṁ vivvisu viubvittā samuddōdagāṇi ya titthōdagāṇi ya mahādahōdagāṇi ya gaṁgōdagāṇi ya ṇāṇāvihāō
ōsīō ya uṭṭavēṁti । taē ṇaṁ sē bharahē rāyā itthīrayaṇēṇaṁ sēsaṁtēurēṇa ya nāḍagasahassēhi ya saṁparivuḍē abhisēgamaṁḍavaṁ
aṇupavisa sasiṁhāsanaṁ pahāṇapēḍhamaṇupayāhiṇī karēmāṇē puratthimillēṇaṁ ti sōmāṇēṇaṁ duruhai, tā sīhāsaṇē paratthābhimuhē
nisaraṇē । taē ṇaṁ tē battīsaṁ rāyavarasahassā uttarillēṇaṁ tisōmāṇēṇaṁ duruhati duruhittā bharahassa raṇṇō naccāsaṇṇē nāidūrē
niya-niya bhaddāsaṇagayā sussūsamāṇā namasamāṇā paṁjaliuḍā pajjuvāsiti । taē ṇaṁ sēṇāvairayaṇē gāhāvairayaṇē baḍḍhairayaṇē
purōhiyarayaṇē aṇṇē vi bahavē sēṭṭhi-satthavāhamāiyā dāhiṇillēṇaṁ ti sōmāṇēṇaṁ, duruhittā samuciyāsaṇē sannisaṇṇā kayaṁjaliṇō
ciṭhṭhati । taē ṇaṁ tē ābhiōgiyā dēvā mahatthaṁ mahagdhaṁ mahārihaṁ mahārāyābhisēyaṁ ubvaṭṭavēṁti । tāhē tē battīsaṁ rāyavara-
sahassā ābhiōgiyāya dēvā aṇṇēya sēṭṭhi-satthavāhapabhiīō sōhaṇaṁsi tihi karaṇa nakkhatta- muhuttaṁsi tēhi tēhi sābhāviēhi
'uttaravēubviēhi ya rayaṇakala sēhiṁ kaṇayakalasēhi rayayakala sēhiṁ varakamalapaṭṭaṇēhi mahayā mahayā abhisēēṇaṁ abhisicati 2 tā
pattēyaṁ pattēyaṁ karayalapariggahiyaṁ sirasāvattaṁ aṁjali matthaē kaṭṭa jaēṇaṁ vijaēṇaṁ vaddhāviti vaddhāvittā pamhalasūmālāē gaṁdhakā-
sāīyāē gāyā lūhiti । mauḍaṁ siriusabhasaṁtiyaṁ sakka vi diṇṇaṁ piṇidhaṁti । tayaṇaṁtaraṁ daddaramalayasugaṁdhigaṁdhiēhiṁ gāyāī
surakuṁḍaṁ ti divvaṁ ca sumaṇadāmaṁ piṇaddhati । divvaṁ dēvaṁsuyajuyalaṁ niyaṁsāviti । kiṁ bahuṇā kapparukkhaṁ piva alaṁkiyavibhūsiyaṁ
karēṁsu dēvā । taē ṇaṁ sē bharahē rāyā kōḍuṁbiyapurisē sahāvēi sahāvēttā ēvaṁ vayāsī - - " khippāmēva bhō ! hatthikhaṁdhavaragayā
viṇīyanagara samataō hiḍiūṇa ussuṁkaṁ ukkaraṁ adaṁḍimaṁ kudaṁḍimaṁ abhaḍappavēsaṁ duvālasasaṁvacchrāṇi mahāpamōyakaliyaṁ karēha
kāravēha ya karēttā kāravēttā ya ēyamāṇattiyaṁ paccappiṇaha । tē vi tahēva karēttā paccappinaṁti । taē ṇaṁ sē bharahē rāyā
siṁhāsaṇāō abbhuṭṭhēi, anbhuṭṭittā puratthimēṇaṁ tisōmāṇēṇaṁ paccōruhittā gayavaī durūḍhē rāyamāī vi jēṇaṁ durūḍhā tēṇaṁ ti
sōmāṇēṇaṁ paccōruhaṁti paccōruhittā samaṁtaō cakkaharaṁ parivārēṁti । taē ṇaṁ sē bharahē rāyā bahujaṇaparivāraparivariē
niyapāsāyavaḍēṁsayamāgaē । taē ṇaṁ cakkāhivē duvāla saṁvacchariyaṁsi pamōyaṁsi nivvattaṁsi samāṇaṁsi vhāē kayabalikammē
kayakōūyamaṁgalapāyacchittē appamahagghābharaṇālaṁkiyasarīrē sakōrēṁṭadāmēṇa chattēṇaṁ dharijjamāṇēṇaṁ sēyavaracāmarāhi uddhavvamāṇīhi 2
sasi vva piyadaṁsaṇēhi naravaī jēṇēva bāhiriyā ubaṭṭāṇasālā tēṇēva uvāgacchai uvāgacchittā siṁhāsaṇavaragatē sōlasadēva sahassē
sakkārēi sammāṇēi sammāṇittā paḍivisajjēi uppi pāsāyavarapaē visayasuhamaṇuhavamāṇē viharai । bharahassa ṇaṁ raṇṇō cakka-

aha aṇṇayā kayāī suṁdari dāsīē suṁdarī ghaḍiō । suṁdari saṁgamahēuṁ uvayāraṁ kuṇaṛa dāsīē

paḍivaṇaṁ. naravaiṇā tā gammau suyaṇu saṁpaya tattha । sō vihu mahilā vēsaṁ kāūṇa gaō tamissāē
ēvaṁ diyahē diyahē pacchaṇṇaṁ suṁdara ramaṁtassa । vaccaṁti vāsarāī suṁdaravaṇiyassa tuṭṭhassa
aṇammi dinē bhaṇiō suṁdari dēvīē suṁdarōṁ ēvaṁ । maha dēhē kō ṇu guṇē abbhahiō tuha maṇē caḍiō
īsi hasiūṇa saṇiyaṁ bhaṇiyā sā suṁdarēṇa pasayaccha" । gaṇamaṁtarēṇa suṁdari ! maccumuhaṁ kō ṇuṁ pavisēi
vayaṇassa na tē mullaṁ acchīṇi' mayacchi tihuyaṇaṁ cullaṁ । nāsā puṇa tuha saralā tulaṭṭhiyaṁ tihuyaṇaṁ tulai

dujjaṇajaṇasaṁchaṇṇaṁ gharaṁ gharaṁ rāula visēsēṇa । taḥ jai muṇijja rāyā tā tuha sārīriō daṁḍō
pariṇāmasuhaṁ kajjaṁ kijjataṁ suyaṇa ! suṁdaraṁ hōi । kittiyakālaṁ kusalaṁ vilē karaṁ pakkhivaṁtāṇa
sōūṇa suṁdarīē vayaṇamiṇaṁ suṁdarō bhaṇai ēvaṁ mārijja na vā rāyā tuhaṁ virahē maha dhuvaṁ maraṇaṁ

ēvaṁ savvaṁ suṇiyaṁ " pacchannaṭhiēṇa naravariṁdēṇa । tō kōharuyaṁ ruṁbhiyaniyāsaṇē sanniviṭṭhō sō

<lg n="2180">

  <l>jaṁ mōhamōhiyamaṇā dhammammi maī na kuvvaṁti</l>
</lg>
<lg n="2181">
  <l>aha kavi hōi cittaṁ kammōvasamēṇa kassa vi jiyassa</l>
  <l>jigavayaṇāmiyabhariyaṁ dhammāyariyaṁ na pāvēi</l>
</lg>
aha kaha visō vipattō dhammaṁ pi jahaṭṭhiyaṁ payāsēṛa । nāṇāvaraṇudaēṇaṁ na caḍai cittammi jīvassa
aha cass kaha vicittē kusamayamōhēṇa mōhiyamaṇassa । saddhā caiva na jāyada suvisuddhā tassa cittē
aha kaha vi havai saddhā jāṇatō cēva acchaē jīvō । na kuṇai saṁjamakiriyaṁ vīriya-bala-laddhijuttō vi
iya kurukumāra ! dulahā sāmaggī puvvavaṇṇiyā sayalā । tēlōkkapāyaḍajasō jiṇadhammō dullahō tēṇa
ghara-gharaṇi-puttavāmōhamōhiyāṇaṁ ca jaṁ suhaṁ lōē । tamaṇiccaṁ tucchaṁ ciya sāsayasōkkhaṁ puṇō taṁ
<lg n="2187">
  <l>kuru kumāra ! suṇasu saṁpai paṁcaṇhajaṇāṇa ēttha diṭṭhataṁ</l>
  <l>kammavisēsēṇa kathaṁ saṁvēyakaraṁ vivēīṇa</l>
</lg>
atthi ihēva bhārahēvāsē samuddōvamaṁ gaṁṭhasaṁṭhiyaṁ saṁsārapuraṁ nāma nagaraṁ । tammi ya uvarayajaṇaṇi-jaṇayā abhavva
dūrabhavva-bhavva-āsannabhava-tabbhavasiddhiyābhihāṇā paṁcakulaputtayā parivasaṁti । iō ya narayapura- tiriyapura-maṇuyapura-dēvapura-
siddhipuranivāsiṇō, mahāmōha - aimōha - saṁmōha mōha - khīṇamōhanāmāṇō paṁca satthavāhā । narayagai - tiriyagai-maṇuyagai - dēvagaḍa-
siddhigaināmiyāō niya-niya - duhiyarō gahāya samuciyavarē gavēsayaṁtā sahiyā cēva saṁsārapuramāgayā । iō taō
varagavēsaṇaṁ kuṇaṁtā tēhi diṭṭhā dhammaviyā raṁ kuṇaṁtā abhavvāiyā paṁca vi kulaputtayā । ahō kimēē payaṁpaṁti mahāmōhāiyā
savihē hōūṇa sōumāraddhā । abhavvēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - "na dhammō na dhammiyā na paralōō ēvamēva dhuttavaṁciō paramatthamayāṇaṁtō
dhammagahillō lōgō parikilissai । " mahāmōhēṇa citiyaṁ --- "uciō mah dāriyāē ēsa varō । " dūrabhavvēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ--
"khāyaṁta-piyaṁtāṇa jō dhammō sō dhammō, sō puṇa atimōhassa cittē caḍiō । " bhavvēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- “ addhamadvēṇa dhammāhammā
kīramāṇā sōhaṇā na ēgarasiēhi hōyavvaṁ । " sō puṇa saṁmōhassa maṇamaṇupaviṭṭhō । āsannabhavvēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- " dhammō cēva
sayala - suhakāraṇa pahāṇō purisatthō tā tammi cēva āyarō kāyavvō । paharō vā dō vā vittinimittaṁ saṁsārayakajjujjamō
vi juttō । tēṇa puṇa mōhassa māṇasaṁ raṁjiyaṁ । tabbhavasiddhiēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- "sayā vi supurisēṇa sayalasāvajjavirairūvō
ēgaṁtahiō titthayarāiparamapurisasēviō dhammō cēva kāyavvō । ” sō puṇa khīṇamōhēṇa niyadhūyāē barō kappiō । miliyā
cēva bhaṇiyā abhavvāiṇō mahāmōhāīhi -- "amhē dēvāṇupiyā ! tumhāṇa niya-niyaduhiyaraṁ dēmō na tumbhēhiṁtāṇā khaṁḍaṇaṁ
kāyavvaṁ । paḍivaṇṇamaṇēhiṁ । pariṇīyā abhavvēṇa mahāmōhadhūyā । narayagaī dūrabhavvēṇa vi aimōhataṇayā । tiriyagaī
bhavvēṇa vi sammōhasuyā । maṇuyagaī āsannabhavvēṇa vi mōhaduhiyā । dēvagaī tabbhavasiddhiēṇa puṇa khīṇamōhadāriyā । 
siddhigaī aṇuruvavahū -varasaṁgamēṇa pamuiyamāṇasā sanagarēsu gayā । mahāmōhāiṇō abhavvāiṇō vi niya-niya sahayarī
sahiyā visayasuhamaṇuhavaṁtā kālaṁ garmēti । 
1
aṇṇayā atthōvajjaṇānimittaṁ savvasammaēṇa kāūṇa bhaṁḍa-saṁgahaṁ niya-niya - kalattasahiyā paṁcahi pōēhiṁ paṁca vi
caliyā rayaṇadīvaṁ । kayasaṁbalajaladalasaṁgahā, pauṇīkayakaṇṇadhārā, aṇēganijjāmayapurisāhiṭṭiyā, samaṁtaō saṁcaraṁtā-
uttiyā, vivihāuhapaharaṇapaḍipuṇṇā, cārucaṁdaṇacaccikkiyā, dahi-duddhaṁkuragō rōyaṇa siddhatthaya-vihiyamaṁgalōvayārā,
sarasasugaṁdhakusumara iya sirasēharā, vihivihiyabali vihāṇā, sirōvaridhariya uddaṁḍāyavattā, ubhayapāsaḍhalaṁtacārucāmarā,
samārūḍhēsu pōyavaṇiēsa jahādvāṇaṁ niviṭṭhēsu sēsalōēsu vajjaṁtēsu maṁgalatūrēsu, āvr̥rijjatēsu jamalasaṁkhēsu paḍhatēsu

uttaradisāē kasiṇamēhakhaṁḍaṁ । taṁ ca daṭṭhaṇa bhaṇiyamaṇēhi - - " bhō bhō jāṇavattajaṇā ! uttarēṇa mēhakhaṁḍa va lakkhīyai
kaṇhā hipōyaṁ va pavaṭṭamāṇaṁ na suṁdaramēyaṁ । tā laṁbēha laṁbaṇē, maulēha siyavaḍē, vāēha bhaṁḍāṇi, thirī karēha pōē, aṇṇahā
viṭṭhā tumbhē । " tēhi vi tahēva kayaṁ । taṁ puṇa mēhakhaṁḍaṁ jalaniviḍiyatēlla biṁdumiva suyaṇakayamētti' vva vitthariumāraddhaṁ । 
khalamētti vva khaṇēṇa kālīkayaṁ nahayalamuhaṁ vijjujjōyadīsaṁtajāṇavattajaṇaṁ, saṁghaṇa saddapūriyaṁbaraṁtaraṁ, musalappamāṇadhārāhiṁ
varisiumāraddhaṁ । visaṇṇā pōya-pahuṇō, āulīhuyā āḍayatiyā, mukkahatthā nijjāmayā, ki kāyavyavimūḍhā paṁjara-
purisā, niya-niya dēva guru-saraṇā jāyā jāṇavattajaṇā । akayapuṇṇajaṇamaṇōraha vva asāhiyasamīhiyā, bhaṁḍabharabhajjaṁta-
saṁdhibaṁdhaṇā, uvarinivaḍaṁtajalappavāhapuriyamajjhā sumaraṇasēsā jāyā paṁca vi pōyā । jāṇavattajaṇō sabhaṁḍō vi cēva

saṁsumārēhi, bhijjaṁtā jalakaridaṁtamusalēhi, gasijjatā salilasappēhi, khaṁḍijjaṁtā mayarēhiṁ, vimukkajīviyāsā savvē vi
divvajōēṇa kaṁthārikuḍaṁgaṁ nāma dīvaṁ pāviyā । iō taō pariyaḍatā kaivayadiṇēhi paṁca vi miliyā bhaṇiyamaṇēhiṁ-

sahayarī sahiō abhavvō । kaṁthārikuḍaṁgīē samaṁ tiriyagaīē । dūrabhavvō vairakuḍaṁgīē । maṇuyagaisahiō bhavvō kāuṁbari-

māṇasēhi puṇō vi hiṁḍatēhi diṭṭhā paviraladarapakkaphalā billa- kaviṭṭāiṇō mahīruhā kayā taṣphalēhi pāṇavittī । puṇō

bhagavayā bhaṇiyaṁ --
-----
11
aō cēva kasāyā na kāyavvā suṇēha kasāyakuḍuṁbiyadiṭṭhataṁ । 
atthi ihēva bhārahē vāsē majjhimakhaṁḍamaṁḍaṇaṁ vijayavaddhaṇaṁ nāma nayaraṁ । tattha ruddadēvō nāma vāṇiyagō parivasai । 
aggisihā bhāriyā sahāvaō cētra dōvi rōsaṇāṇi । ḍuṁgarakuḍaṁgasāyarābhihāṇā tāṇa taṇayā । silā niyaḍisaṁcayā-
bhihāṇāō vahaō । ruhr̥dēvō aggisihā ya sakāraṇamakāraṇaṁ vā rōsaṁdhayāriyamahāṇi sayā ciṭṭhati । ḍuṁgarō ḍuṁgarō vva
namaṇijjāṇavi anamaṁtō savvajaṇāsammaō kālaṁ gamēi । silā vi niyathaḍhimāē na kassa vi gōrakhaṁ ṭhāṇaṁ । jaō--

203
bhōgapurē nayarē suivōha - siridēvābhihāṇā dōnni vaṇiyadārayā parivasaṁti । asthi dōha vi piō saṁtiyā sirī । 
sō ya pisāiyā gahiyaggahō karakaya sajalataṁbabhāyaṇō bhamai suivōddō । annayā piusaṁtiē dīṇārē gahāya samāgayā
māyaṁgā । bhaṇiyā tēhi lacchimaī tassa ghariṇī -- "kahiṁ suivōddō ?" tīē bhaṇiyaṁ -- gharamajjhē ciṭṭai । imē dīṇārā saṁgōvē -
yavvaṁti payaṁpiya gayā māyaṁgā । sāhiyaṁ lacchimaīē suivōddassa sō vi samāgaō dīṇārasamīvē 'jalajōgō kaō navati
pucchiyā lacchimaī । tīē bhaṇiyaṁ na kaō । " 'khaō nivaḍau dīṇārāṇaṁ natthi sōyaṁ tuha gharē' bhaṇatēṇa vāmapāēṇa
pēlliyā dīṇārā । lacchīē citiyaṁ - " ajōgō ēsa pāvō jō mamaṁ gharamāgacchaṁti vāmapāēṇaṁ pēllēi tā tahā
maē ēsa kāyavvō jahā pāṇapāṇahā uvahai । mukkaṁ suivōddagharaṁ lacchīē । jāō suhisayaṇāṇaṁ sēsajaṇāṇa ya aṇāyaraṭṭhāṇaṁ । 
paraparābhavānaladajjhamāṇamāṇasō anivvahaṁtō ya atthatthī mahimaṁḍalaṁ bhamiumāḍhattō । vihalavavasāō caliō niyadēsā-
bhimuhaṁ । nirasaṇō diṇaṁ vahēūṇa paviṭṭhō naga rasamāsannāḍaṁbarajakkhadēvaulē chuhāulō dīhadvāṇa parikhēiyasarīrō nisaṇṇō
jāva ciṭṭha tāvāgaō ēgō māyaṁgō । pūiō tēṇa āḍaṁbarō । paṇāmaṁ kāūṇa uvaviṭṭhō maṁḍavē lihiyā maṁḍalē jakkhaṇī । 
kaō ōvā sumariō maṁtō, khaṇaṁtarēṇa samāgayā javikhaṇī । bhaṇiyā māyaṁgēṇa - - " bhayavai ! saṁpajjaṁtasayalasamīhiyaṁ
maha kaē vilāsabhavaṇaṁ nivvattēhi । " tahēva nivvattiyaṁ । taō bhuṁjiūṇa varāhāraṁ vihiyavaravilēvaṇō varavatyābharaṇa
visiō saṇṇihiyapuppha taṁbōlō suhi-sayaṇasahiō vilasiumāraddhō । kayakajjēṇa savvaṁ visajjiyaṁ । taō citiyaṁ
suivōddēṇa -- “ ahō ! mahāisaō ēsa māyaṁgō, tā ēyarasa sēvaṁ karēmi । tahēvakāumāraddhō, nivēsiṅakāmassa dēi āsaṇaṁ
maggāṇulaggō । vahai vāṇahāō । ēvaṁ cirakālaṁ kuṇatēṇa tēṇa āvajjiyaṁ māyaṁgamāṇasaṁ । annamma dinē bhaṇiō māyaṁgēṇa
“bhō ! ki kāraṇaṁ aṇuciōvayāraṁ karēsi ?" tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ- dāriddōvadda ō' atthatthī sayalaṁ mahimaṁḍalaṁ bhamēūṇa
asaṁpattavitō viddāṇacittō niyadēsaṁ paṛa patthiō । saṁpayaṁ puṇa bhaviyavvayā niyōgēṇa tuhāṇubhāvaṁ daṭṭhaṇa ēvaṁ sēvi-
umāraddhō, tā pasāyaṁ kāūṇa nitthārēsu maṁ dāriddasamuddāō । " māyaṁgēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- "giṇha imaṁ vijjaṁ । " mahāpasāō tti
bhaṇiyagahīyā suvōddēṇa sāhiō sāhaṇavihī । kayatthamattāṇayaṁ mannatō gaō suivōddō niyagharaṁ । kayā sāhaṇasāmaggī । 
lihiyaṁ maṁḍalaṁ ālihiyā tattha jakkhiṇī vihiyapūyōvayārō jāva maṁtaṁ sarai tāva pamhuṭṭha maṁtapayaṁ । palaṁbapabbhaṭṭa - makkaḍō vva
vilakkhavayaṇō puṇō vi gaō māya gasamīvaṁ । pucchiō māyaṁgēṇa -- " kimāgamaṇakāraṇaṁ ? tēṇa vi kahiyaṁ jahāvadviyaṁ । 
māyaṁgēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- puṇō vi "vijjaṁ giṇha imaṁ vā vijjābhimaṁtiyaṁ paḍaṁ । ēsō vi pūyā purassaraṁ jahicchiyadāyagō bhē bhavissai । 
gahiō paṇāmapurassaraṁ suhavōddēṇa paḍō । caliō niyadēsābhimuhaṁ । vaccatassa aṁtarā caiva gahiō takkarēhi paḍō । 
vivaṇṇavayaṇō puṇō vi caliō suivōhō । samāgaō māyaṁgapāyamūlē kahiō paḍa-baiyarō । dinnō tēṇa vijjābhimaṁtiō
ghaḍō kahiō vihī sō vi taṁ gahāya niyagharaṁ gaō । pūiūṇa patthiō ghaḍō । dinaṁ ghaḍēṇa jaṁ maggiyaṁ । taō suhisayaṇajaṇaṁ
bhuṁjāviya tammagaō । ahō mē ghaḍāṇubhāvēṇa paṇaṭṭha dāriddaṁ ti jaṁpatō harisavasavisappamāṇamāṇasō ghaḍaṁ baṁdhē nacciu-

"ēttiyā cēva maha vijja । na puṇō maha samīvē samāgaṁtavvaṁ ti । bhaṇiya visajjiō gatō sagihaṁ viddāṇavayaṇō diṇamai-

saṁcayasīlasatyavāha kahā --
aṇṇayā samāgaō kēvalī । niggayā vadaṇavaḍiyāē lōya ॥ bhōgadēvō vi gaō samaṁ bhōgavaīē kayā bhagavayā
saṁsāranivvēyajaṇaṇī dhammadēsaṇā । avasaraṁ lahiūṇa pucchiō bhōgadēvēṇa kēvalī -- " bhayavaṁ ! dāṇassa kiṁ phalaṁ ? " kēvali-
liṇā bhaṇiyaṁ -- “ visālasālē nayarē duggayapaḍāgō nāma saṁcayasīlasatthavāhakammakarō pucchiyavvō । ” uvarayā dhammadēsaṇā । 
jahāgayaṁ paḍigayā lōyā । kaitrayadiṇāvasāṇē aṇṇatthavihariō kēvalī । bhōgadēvō vi samaṁ bhōgavaīē gaō visālasālē
nayarē । bhaviyavvayāniōgēṇa pavisaṁtēṇēvaṁ bhōgadēvēṇa diṭṭhā duggayapaḍāgaghariṇī duggilā । pucchiyā ya-- " bhaddē ! kahi
saṁcayasīlasatthavāhassa gharaṁ ?" tīē bhaṇiyaṁ -- "ēha daṁsēmi । " gayā ṇiddiṭṭhā । pucchyi । saṁcayasīlaghariṇī dhaṇasuṁdarī -- "atthēttha
tumha gharē duggayapaḍāgō nāma kammayarō ! tīē bhaṇiyaṁ -- “āsi, saṁpayaṁ puṇa navamō māsō mayassa । " dhaṇasuṁdarīē bhaṇiyaṁ-
“kiṁ tēṇa paōyaṇaṁ ? bhōgadēvēṇa vi kahiō kēvalakaṇavr̥ttaṁtō । ētyaṁtarē samāgaō saṁcayasīlō । daṁsiyaṁ ghara mēgaṁ bhōgadēvassa । 
liō tahi । aṇṇammi dinē pasūyā dhaṇasuṁdarī । jāō dāō । vaddhādiō gharadāsīē satthavāhō । sō puṇa atthavvaya-
bhīruō mōṇamāsiō । vilakkhavayaṇā paḍiniyattā dāsī । satthavāhō vi gharāō nīhariya bāhi gaō । aṇṇammi dinē
bhaṇiō dhaṇasuṁdarīē satthavāhō -- "piyayama ! aputtāē mē puttagō jāō । tumaṁ puṇa dāṇabhōgabhīō । kiṁ karēsi imāē
bhūbhārakarāē lacchīē ?" ahō ! vibhiṇṇacittā ayāṇuyā mē ghariṇī । na yāṇai atthōvajjāṇā kilēsa" ti citayaṁtō
mahayā aṭṭajjhāṇēṇa diṇaṁ gamēūṇa rayaṇīē visūiyā dōsēṇa mariūṇa samuppaṇṇō tammi cēva nayarē nāgiladāriddiya-
dāraō । ājammāō aṇiṭṭō jaṇaṇi-jaṇayāṇa । mahayā kilēsēṇa kālaṁ gamēi । puttassa vi samuciyasamaē paṭṭhāviyaṁ
nāma dhaṇadattō । sō puṇa taṁ gharaṁ gharapariyaṇaṁ ca daṭṭhūṇa saṁjāyajāīsaraṇō' ēgāgī cēva ēvaṁ bhaṇēi--

ubbhiyabhyaē ēvaṁ diṇē-diṇē papēi । aṇṇammi diṇē ēyaṁ suṇiya pucchiō bhōgadēvēṇa -- "vaccha ! kō ēyassa jaṁpiyassa
bhāvatthō ?" tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- "suṇa, ētthēva nayarē duggayapaḍa. gō nāma tāyassa gharē kammayarō ahamahēsi maharimidāṇaphalēṇa' ēyassa
cēva gharassa sāmiō jāō । aō ēvaṁ payaṁpēmi । " ēvaṁ suṇiya jāō kēvalivayaṇē bhōgadēvassa paccaō dāṇabahumāṇō ya । 
aṇṇāmma dinē bhikkhaṭṭā paviṭṭēṇa diṭṭhō aisayanāṇiṇā guṇaṁdha rasāhuṇā । bhaṇiyā ya - “bhō bālaya ! na ēgaṁtēṇa
harisōṁ kāyavvō । jaō--
jō tē piyā saṁcayasīlō adinnadāṇa abhuttadhaṇō hōṁta dāliddiō sō mariūṇa nāgilarōra-dāraō jāō । acvaṁtavēsō
jaṇaṇi- jaṇayāṇa । asaṁpajjatapāṇa- bhōyaṇō nirayapaḍiruviyaṁ vēyaṇaṁ vēēmāṇō kālaṁ gamēi ।

tumbhēhi kammaṁ kāyavvaṁ । ēsa puṇa puttagō na vi māṇēyavvō mahallagō saṁtō ēsō vi maha gharē kammayarō bhavises । 
paḍivaṇṇamaṇēhiṁ tahēva kuṇaṁtāṇa vaccati vāsarā । aṇṇammi dinē bhōgadēvō rayaṇīē suhapasuttō mahilā juyalassa saṁlāvaṁ
suṇēi । ēgā bhai bhaiṇi ! kā tumaṁ ?" bīyāē bhaṇiyaṁ - " bhōgadēvagharalacchī” iyarīē bhaṇiyaṁ - " kusalaṁ tē । ” tīē
bhaṇiyaṁ - " avarāvaradāṇa-bhōgakajjāsattēṇa bhōgadēvēṇa vā varijjamāṇīē āṇāsārasāmi kammayarīē viva kattō mē kusalaṁ ?
bīyāē bhaṇiyaṁ -- "tumaṁ kā ? tīē bhaṇiyaṁ - " ahaṁ puṇa saṁcayasīlasatthavāhagharasirī । " paḍhamāē bhaṇiyaṁ - " suhasaṁvāsō
tē ?" tīē bhaṇiyaṁ-" narayaṁdhayāramahallagaḍḍā ēgō viyāē adiṭṭasasi - sūrakaraniyarāē vaṁdiṇīē viva tamabahula kārāgāra-
pakkhittāē kattō mē suhavāsō ? niraṁtaraṁ nirōha - dukkhadukkhiyā dukkhaṁ vasāmi । ” bhōgadēvēṇa citiyaṁ" dō vi dukkhiyāō । 
ahō lacchīē natthi thirīkaraṇōvāō । ēsā hi lacchī na sōha sajjhā' na nāsā ya sajjhā na bhattigijjhā na rakkhaṇatō
sirī । dāṇabhōgarōsirī uvayārakāriṇō vi dōsapōsirī visamasīlā na najjai kahamaṇuṇēvvā । jāvajjavi na muyai
tāba imīē cāō cēva sāhuṇō' tti, citiūṇa gaō niyanayarē । kāūṇa jiṇasāhupūyaṁ dāūṇa dīṇāṇāhāṇa dāṇaṁ
saṁbhāsiūṇa suhisayaṇavaggaṁ kuṭuṁbabhārē ṭhavēūṇa bhōgadattaputtaṁ pavaḍḍhamāṇasuhajjhavasāṇō kallaṁ pavvaissāmi tti citayaṁtō
rayaṇīē suttō । mahilā rūvadhāriṇīē bhaṇiō lacchīē - bhōgadēva ! jahicchaṁ dinnā bhuttā ya amuyaṁtī cēva mukkā tō
chaliyā' haṁ taē bhaṇa, kiṁ karēmi ?" tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- " na mē kāyavvamatthi । suēṇa sahasammaṁ vaṭṭēyavvaṁ" ēvaṁ ti paḍivajjiya
gayā sirī । bīyadivasē bhōgadēvō samaṁ bhōgavaīē nikkhatō pasaṁtāyariyasamīvē paripāliūṇa niraiyāraṁ sāmaṇṇaṁ vihivi -
hiyā rāhaṇō mariūṇa savvachaṁ gaō । bhōgavaī vi tatthēva samuppaṇṇā tattō cuyāsijjhissaṁti । iō ya sō siridēvōṁ sirīē
parihariō paragharēsu kukammāṇi kuṇatō bhō siridēva ! tikkālaṁ pūyaṁtassa vi tē kahi gayā lacchī ēvaṁ sayalajaṇēṇa
hasijjatō kālamaivāhēi । ēyāvasarē uvaraō siridēvassa vilakkhaṇasuō puṇō vi lacchī siridēvamaṁdiramāgayā । jāō ®
sayalajaṇasammaō । 
ēgayā raṇaṇīē varapallaṁkagaō ruyamāṇī mahilaṁ pāsai । pucchiyā ya - - " bhaddē ! kā tumaṁ ? kiṁ kāraṇa vā sadukkhaṁ
rōvijjai ?" tīē bhaṇiyaṁ - "tuha gharasirī, rōyavvē puṇa imaṁ kāraṇaṁ -- 'taē saha viōgō viya lakkhiyai । jaō-jā taē
bīyā ghariṇī pariṇīyā sā alacchī, tīē saha natthi maha ēgattha vāsō puṇō daṁsaṇaṁ" ti bhaṇiya adaṁsaṇaṁ gayā sirī । 
bhujjō vi taṁ cēva dāliddaṁ sō cēva jaṇaparābhavō' siridēvassa ।

aō na juttaṁ maha gharē gaṁtuṁ na yā vi saṁsārāhilāsī kammabharapaṇōliō suragirisamabhārē sāhuguṇē muhuttamavi vōḍhuṁ
samatthō । 'tā ki karēmi tti citiyaṁtassa tassa sābhāviyāmaī samuppaṇṇā । ēsa ēttha uvāō - - samaṇēhi asuhamaṇa-
vaya - kāyadaṁḍātini fa jiyā । ahaṁ puṇa ēēhi cēva jiō aō sēsajaṇajāṇāvaṇatthaṁ appaṇō sumaraṇatthaṁ ca tidaṁḍaṁ
vahāmi । tahā lōiṁdiyamuṁḍā sāhuṇō savvavirayā ahaṁ puṇa khuramuṁḍō sasihāgō thūlapāṇāivāyaviraō ya bhavāmi । tahā
nikkicaṇā samaṇā bhagavaṁtō majjha puṇa kiṁcaṇaṁ kaṇayapavittayaṁ kannēsu aṁguliyāē kaṇayakaṁcaṇiyā ya bhavau । kiṁ ca--
aṭṭhārasasīlaṁgasahassa sārasirikhaṁḍagaṁdhasugaṁdhiṇō sāhuṇō ahaṁ puṇa sīlēṇa duggaṁdhō, aō vāsēmi vāsāīhiṁ vatthāṇi sarīragaṁ
ca । viṇijjiyamahāmōhā ya varamuṇiṇō ahaṁ ca mōhēṇa puṇa channō aō chattayaṁ sirōvari dharēmi । aṇuvāhaṇā sāhuṇō
majjha puṇa uvāhaṇāō havaṁtu । sēyavatthadhāriṇō muṇivasabhā majjha puṇa kasāyakalusiyamaṇassa kasāyāṇi havaṁtu vatthāṇi । 
taha sāvajjabhīrūṇō bahujīvasamāulaṁ jalāraṁbhaṁ dūraṁ dūrēṇa aṇagārā pariharēṁti । majjha puṇa ṇhāṇaṁ piyaṇaṁ ca parimiya-
jalēṇa havau । ēvaṁ sō sammattamūlapaṁcāṇuvvayadharō tappaḍhamapayaṭṭiyaparivvāyagapāsaṁḍiyavēsadhārī jai jaṇa - vilakkhaṇō na
gihī na yā vi pavvaīō । bhagavaō nissāē mahīmaṁḍalaṁ vihariumāruddhō । 
--
taṁ puṇa vilakkhaṇavēsaṁ ubhaḍāgāraṁ sāhusamāsaṇṇadēsasaṁṭhiyaṁ daṭṭhūṇa jaṇō samalliyai dhammaṁ ca pucchai । sō
vi sāhuguṇapurassaraṁ savittharaṁ aṇagāradhammaṁ tāṇa puraō panavē । tē bhāṁti - " tumaṁ kiṁ na karēsi jai dhammaṁ ?" sō
bhaṇai - - " gurukammō na tarāmi kāuṁ" । jāhē tē tēṇa dhammadēsaṇāē akkhittā bhavaṁti tāhē sāmi samīvaṁ paṭṭavēi । bhayavaṁ
pi sāhudhammaṁ gāi ēvaṁ sāmiṇā saha viharaṁtassa kayāi garūyaṁ sarīrakāraṇaṁ saṁjāyaṁ mirīissa । asaṁjaō tti na kiṁ
ci paḍiyāraṁ kuṇaṁti sāhuṇō । taō sō garuyavāhipīḍiō kēṇāvi apaḍiyarijjatō citiumāraddhō--"ahō mē ihabhavē
cēva udiṇṇaṁ asuhakammaphalaṁ niyagā vi paraṁ va pēcchaṁti sāhuṇō । ahavā na sāhūṇa dōsō savvasāvajjavirayā bhagavaṁtō
kahaṁ mē bhaṭṭhapaiṇṇassa saṁsārasūyarassa vēyāvaccaṁ kuṇaṁti majjha vi na juttaṁ kāriyaṁtō appaṇō samāṇaguṇaṁ maṁdadhammāṇaṁ sahāyayaṁ
kiṁ pi jōēmi jēṇa sō gilāṇassa mē paritappai" । ēvaṁ vicitayaṁtō vāhivihuriyamāṇasō kaha kaha vi pauṇī
bhūō । 
aṇṇayā samāgaō bhagavaō samīvē dūrabhaviō kavilō nāma rāyauttō । nisuō sāmisamīvē dhammō na bhāviō
cittē, vilakkhaṇaṁ daṭṭhūṇa gaō miriissa samīvē pucchiō dhammō । sō bhaṇai -- " natthēttha dhammō gaccha bhagavaō samīvē" । 
puṇō vi gaō । amayabhūyaṁ pi niyakammadōsēṇa na ruiyaṁ bhagavaō vayaṇaṁ । puṇō vi samāgaō । miriī bhaṇai -- " kiṁ
tuha samīvē jō vā sō vā dhammō natthi ?" maṁdadhammō dūrabhaviō maha samō cēva ēsa cēva kōi vihiṇā ghaḍiō । 
havau maha cēva sahāyagō" tti citiūṇa bhaṇiyamaṇēṇa - - " kavilā ! itthaṁ pi dhammō ihaṁ pi dhammō । " ēvaṁ ca bhaṇatēṇa
nivvattiō sāgarōvamakōḍākōḍīpamāṇō guvilō bhavōdahī । bhaṇiyaṁ ca--
<lg n="2685">
  <l>dubbhāsiēṇa ēkkēṇa miriī dukkhasāgaraṁ pattō</l>
  <l>bhamiō kōḍākōḍī sāgarasarināmadhējjāṇaṁ</l>
</lg>
dikkhiō kavilō jāō sahāō parivvāyagapāsaṁḍaparūvaṇēṇa vaḍḍhiyaṁ micchattaṁ॥2686॥
aṇṇayā gāmāgara - nagara - khēḍa - kabbaḍa - maḍaṁba - dōṇamuha-paṭṭaṇāsama-saṁnivēsa saṁvāha saṁkaḍaṁ mahīmaṁḍalaṁ viharaṁtō bahusamaṇa-
samaṇisahiō viṇīyanayarīē purimatālujjāṇē ahāphāsuē paēsē samōsaḍhō । juyāi jiṇavarō samappiūṇa pāḍihāriyaṁ
pīḍha - phalagamāiyaṁ sāhūṇa saharisamāgaṁtūṇa vaddhāviō niuttapurisēhi bharahāhivō । ” jassa ṇaṁ dēvāṇuppiyā daṁsaṇaṁ patyaṁti
jassa ṇaṁ dēvāṇuppiyā nāma gōyassa vi savaṇayāē kimaṁga puṇa daṁsaṇayāē harisavasa - visappamāṇahiyayā bhavaṁti' sē ṇaṁ
niggaṁthassa pavayaṇassa dēsaē nāyaē paiṭṭhāvaē aṇēgasamaṇasaya sahassāhivaī samaṇagahagaṇacaṁdaparivaḍḍhaē cōttīsabuddhāisaya

tē biṁti suṇasu sāvaya ! āyariyā bhuvaṇabhāṇu nāmēṇa । ēttha purē saṁpattā ahāvihārēṇa viharatā

samahiyaguṇāṇa dijjau bharahāhiva ! ēsa nūṇa āhārō । sō āha samahiyaguṇā kē annē sāhuṇō mōttuṁ
huṁ viṣṇāyaṁ gihiṇō āraṁbhapariggahāṇa jē virayā । paṁcāṇuvvayaguṇavvayasikkhāvayadhāriṇō sammaṁ
ēvaṁ vihasaḍḍhāṇaṁ viyarijjai ēsa kiṁ viyārēṇa ? । ēvaṁ citiyabharahō saḍḍhāṇa davāvaē bhattaṁ
vimhiyamaṇō mahappā suravairūvēṇa bhaṇai naranāhō । kahaha kiṁ ērisaṁ ciya rūvaṁ saggē vi tumhāṇa
hasiūṇa bhaṇai sakkō nahu sakkā māṇusēhiṁ taṁ daṭṭhē । uttamapurisōsi tumaṁ aṁgulimēgaṁ
pajalaṁtaduvālasataraṇitēyatullā padasiyā ēgā । iṁdēṇa aṁgulīvimhiēṇa bharahēṇa sā diṭṭhā
dēvā tumaṁ sāmī ahaṁ pi chakkhaṁḍavāsimaṇuyāṇa । tā taha karējja suravai jahā thi । mittayā hōi
ēvaṁ karēmi bhaṇiūṇa bhagavaō paṇamiūṇa payakamalaṁ । varamauḍakuṁḍaladharō sakkō adaṁsaṇō jāō
sakkaṁgulipaḍimāē bharahō aṭṭhāhiyaṁ mahāmahimaṁ । niyariddhivittharēṇa karēi lōyāṇa paccakkhaṁ
paivarisaṁ lōgō vihu iṁdamahaṁ kuṇai pamuiō saṁtō । bharahāō samuppaṇṇō iṁdamahō jīvalōgammi॥3080 ।

ammi diṇē bharahō sāvaē saddāviya bhaṇaṛa - " mā tubbhē āraṁbhaparapēsaṇāiyaṁ kukammaṁ karēha, ahaṁ bhē vittiṁ pakappēmi ।

saha savaṇagōyarē mahayā mahayā saddēṇa ēvaṁ paryāpayavvaṁ - 'jiō bhavaṁ vaṭṭaē bhayaṁ tamhā mā haṇa haṇa haṇa" tē vi tahēva

raṁbhapasattaṁ mamaṁ saṁbhārēṁti । ahō mē visayāmisaluddhayā ! 1 ahō mē saṁsārābhinaṁdittaṇaṁ ! ahō mē dhammē udāsīṇayā ! ahō

•
aṇṇammi dinē vinnattō mahāṇasiēhi "dēva bhōyaṇavēlāē alavakhā saṁkhā sāvayāṇa na najjai sāvayāsāvayavisēsō

taṁ suṇiya bharahō bhaṇai - - " suparikkhiē kāūṇa bhuṁjāvēha । " taō tē parikkhiumāraddhā kō bhavaṁ sāvaō kai
sāvayāṇa vayāṇi ?” sō bhaṇai - - " na saṁti sāvayāṇa vayāṇi । sammattamūlāpaṁcāṇuvvaya ṇi sattasivakhāvayāṇi cēva sāvaya-
dhammō । ” ēvaṁ jē sāvayadhammakuṁsalā tē puḍhō kāūṇa raṇṇō uvaṇiyā nāṇa- daṁsaṇa- dēsaca raṇadharatti kāgiṇīrayaṇēṇa
tihi rēhāhi laṁchiyā । chaṭṭhē chaṭṭhē māsē puṇō vi aṇuōgō kīrai । parikkhā nivvaḍiyā puṇō vi kāgiṇīrayaṇēṇa
laṁchijjaṁti bhōyaṇaṁ ca lahaṁti sēsā paḍisēhijjati । paidiṇaṁ bharahasīhaduvārē 'jiō bhavaṁ vaḍḍhaē bhayaṁ tamhā māhaṇa tti'
bhaṇati । taō tē lōē māhaṇa tti pasiddhi gayā । tē vi niyaputtabhaṁḍāṇi saṁvaḍhiyāṇi sāhūṇa samappaṁti jaṛa nittharaṁti
tō samaṇadhammaṁ giṇhaṁti । aha nō tāhē ahigayajīvājīvā ittāṇi sāhusussūsaṇā parāyaṇāṇi sāvagāṇi bhavaṁti । annō
vi jaṛa kō vi tāṇa samīvē saṁbujjhai । tā taṁ pi jai icchā samaṇadhammaṁ gārhati bharahēṇa dinaṁti' lōgō vi tāṇa dāṇaṁ
dāumāraddhō । bharahēṇa cēva tāṇa sajjhāyanimittaṁ titthayarathui - - ' sāhū - sāvaya-sāmāyārī saṁti - kammapurassaraṁ āyariyā vēyā
kayā ēvaṁ vaccai kālō ।

pannāsā lakkhēhiṁ samaikkatēhi ayarakōḍīṇaṁ । hōhī
ayarakōḍīṇaṁ । hōhī kamāō ajiō bāvattaripuvvalakkhāū
tīsāē lakkhēhiṁ samaikkaṁtēhi ayarakōḍīṇaṁ । ajiyāō saṁbhavō saṭṭhi puthvalavakhāō hōhī
taha dasahi u lakkhēhiṁ sāgarakōḍīō saṁbhavajiṇāō । abhinaṁdaṇaji iṁdō pannāsaṁ puvvalakkhāū
aha navahiṁō lakkhēhiṁ samaikkatēhiṁ ayarakōḍīnaṁ । abhinaṁdaṇā u sumaī cālīsaṁ puvvalakkhāū
naē sahassēhi samaikkatēhi ayarakōḍīṇaṁ । sumaijiṇā paumābhō tīsaṁ ciya puvvalavakhāū
nauiē
navahiṁ sahassēhiṁ taō samaikkatēhi ayarakōḍīṇaṁ । paumappabhā supāsō vīsaṁ ciya puvvalakkhāū
sāgarakōḍisaēhi navahiṁ jiṇāu supāsanāmāō । dasapuvvasayasahassāuō caṁdappahō bhayavaṁ
tattō bōlīṇāē nauē sāgarāṇa kōḍīṇaṁ । caṁdappahāō suvihī hōhī dō puvvalakkhāū
tō sāgarōvamāṇaṁ navahiṁ u kōḍīhiṁ suvihināmāō । sirisīyala jiṇacaṁdō hōhī igapuvvalakkhāū
ayarasaēṇēgēṇaṁ chāvaṭṭhī varisasayasahassēhiṁ । chabvīsāē tahā varisasahassē hi ūṇāē
aya rōvamakōḍīē samaikkaṁtāē sīyalajiṇāō । sējjaṁsō caurāsī saṁvaccharasyasahassāū
sējjasajiṇidāō caupannāē gayāē ayarāṇaṁ । vasupujjō
tīhi ayarēhiṁ taō gaēhiṁ vasupujjajiṇavariṁdāō । vimalajigidō saṭṭī saṁvaccharasaya sahassāū
vimalajiṇidāhiṁtō samaikkatēhi navahiṁ ayarēhiṁ । hōhītī saṁvaccharalakkhāūṇaṁ taṛa
cauhi ayarōvamēhiṁ samaikkatēhiṁ ṇaṁtaijiṇāō । dhammajiṇidō hōhī dasavaccharasayasahassāū
ayaratigēṇa gaēṇa paliyacaubbhāgatigavihīṇēṇaṁ । dhammajiṇāō saṁtī saṁvaccharasaya sahassāū
tattō paliyaddhēṇaṁ samaikkaṁtēṇa saṁti nāmāō । paṁcāṇauī vaccharasahasāū

taṁ darisēi jiṇidō bharahanariṁdēṇa pucchiō saṁtō saṁpai imassa jīvō rayaṇāhiva ! kammamalamailō
jaccasuvaṇṇaṁ vapuṇō sukkajjhāṇānalēṇa saṁjōgaṁ । saṁpāviyakayapuṇṇō kamēṇa ṇaṇa nimmalī hōhī
paḍhamō dasārasīhō tiviṭṭa nāmēṇa pōyaṇāhivaī । piyamittacakkavaṭṭī mūyavidēhāē hōūṇa
hōhī maha sāricchō apacchimō sayalajiṇavaridāṇaṁ । nāmēṇa mahāvīrō titthayarō bhārahē vāsē
taṁ suṇiya bharahanāhō harisavasullasiyabahalarōmaṁcō । āpucchiūṇa piyaraṁ miriīmabhivaṁdiō jāi
gaṁtuṇa bhaṇai bharahō puraō hōūṇa nēva tē jammaṁ । na viya kuliṁgaṁ vaṁdē maṇammi gavvō na kāyavvō
navavāsudēvapaḍhamō muyavidēhāē hōsi cakkaharō । jaṁ hōhisi titthayarō apacchimō tēṇa vaṁdāmi
taṁ vayaṇaṁ sōūṇaṁ tivaī apphōḍiūṇa tikkhuttō । abbhahiyajāyaharisō mirii imaṁ bhaṇiumāḍhatō
titthayarāṇaṁ paḍhamō piyāmahō mahapiyā vi cakkīṇaṁ । ahahyaṁ ca dasārāṇaṁ ahō kulaṁ
ēgatō majjha kulaṁ annattō tulai tihūyaṇaṁ sayalaṁ । ēgattō maha jāī annattō maṁdarō mērū
ērāvaṇō gayāṇaṁ harituraō jaha ya sēsaturayāṇaṁ । jaha caṁdō tārāṇaṁ iṁdō jaha sēsadēvāṇaṁ
taha maha kulaṁ pahāṇaṁ savvakulāṇaṁ pi majjhayārammi । iya bhaṇirēṇa nibaddhaṁ nīyā gōttaṁ duhavivāgaṁ
bharaō vi vaṁditayaṁ puṇō vi risahēsaraṁ paṇamiūṇa । cauraṁgabalasamēō viṇīyanayariṁ aṇupaviṭṭō
aha bhai bhuvanāhō risahō saṁjaṇiyatihuyaṇāṇaṁdō । para hiyakaraṇēvakaraī paramappā paramakāruṇiō
viyasiyapuṁḍarīyamuhaṁ puṁḍarīyaṁ vimalakamaladalanayaṇaṁ । guṇahāri jaṇahāri bharahasyaṁ bhuvaṇasupasiddhaṁ
puṁḍariya! vaccasu tumaṁ suraṭṭā visayammi niyayagaṇasahiō । mahi-mahilabhālatilaō atthi girī tattha sētuṁjō॥ । 3252॥

  <l>daradiṇṇakaṁṭhapāsāē maggaō āgayā tumaṁ jhatti</l>

<lg n="3284">

</lg>
aha bhaṇai gaṇahariṁdō ajja vi dikhāē tujjha navi samaō । samayammi kīramāṇaṁ savvaṁ ciya suṁdaraṁ hōī॥ । 3285॥
<lg n="3286">
  <l>sammattamūlamaṇuvaya-guṇavaya- sikkhāvaēhiṁ cicaiyaṁ</l>
  <l>sāvayadhammaṁ pālēhiṁ tāva jā hōi samaō ti</l>
</lg>
sā bhaṇai na mē kajjaṁ kālavilaṁbēṇa dēhapavvajjaṁ । jēṇāhamaṇasaṇavihiṁ kāūṇa marāmi ajjēva
taṁ suṇiya bhai ēgō vaṇayaradēvō ahō bhamaṁtāṇa । sarisēṇa samaṁ jōgō jāyai niyamēṇa jīvāṇa
ēsā vi maha saricchā sacchaṁdā aṇuciyā sudhammassa । amayasamāṇaṁ na piyai guruvayaṇaṁ kaṇṇapuḍaēhiṁ
kaṁtisirī jaṇaṇīē puṭṭō gaṇasāmiō kahaṁ ēsa । sacchaṁdō puvvabhavē kō vā āsi tti sāhēsu
gaṇahārī bhaṇai taō puvvabhavē āsi vāṇiō ēsa । ucchaṇṇajaṇaṇi jaṇaō niraṁgaṇō nidvaṇō dhaṇiyaṁ
maha aṇṇayā kayāī pavvaiō vijayasēṇasūrīṇaṁ । pāyaṁtiē paḍhatō dummēhō viṇayaparihīṇō
cōijjatō rūsa tavaṁ pi na karēi maṁda pariṇāmō । aṇṇammi diṇē sahasā bhaṇai guruṁ aṇasaṇaṁ karimō
bhai guruṁ saṁlēhā paḍhamaṁ ciya tāva hōṛa kāyavvā । davvē bhāvē ya taō pacchā puṇa aṇasaṇaṁ jutaṁ
saṁlihiyasarīrāṇaṁ kāurisāṇaṁ paṇaṭṭasattāṇaṁ । aṇasaṇakaraṇaṁ mayamāraṇaṁ ti na hu tēṇa maha kajjaṁ
jamagasamagaṁ dugaṁ pihu karēmi pēcchaṁ tayā havaha tubbhē । iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ guruṇā vārijjatō vi kammavasā
kayabhattapariccāō sahasā dhāūhiṁ khubbhamāṇēhiṁ । aṭṭajjhāṇōvagaō mariūṇaṁ vaṁtarō jāō
annēsi pēsaṇakarō dīṇō hīṇō ya sayaladēvāṇa । daṭṭhūṇa vijayasēṇō āyariē bhaṇiumāḍhattō
bhayavaṁ ! bhavabhayasaṁbhaṁtasattasatāṇa rakkhaṇasamatthaṁ । jaṁ na kaya tuha vayaṇaṁ tēṇāhaṁ ērisō jāō
tā saṁpayaṁ payacchasu hiōvaēsa gurūhi sō bhaṇiō । sāhujaṇa cēhayāṇaṁ sayā vi sussūsagō hōjjā
sāhujaṇa-cēiyāṇaṁ
guruvayaṇaṁ pālitō ēsō sāhūṇa cēiyāṇaṁ ca । bhattibahumāṇapuvvaṁ vaṭṭaṁtō gamai diyahāī
caīūṇa vaṁtarabhavā rāyā hōūṇa suravarō hōhī । iya sōkkhaparaṁparaēṇa sijjhihī aṭṭhamē jammē
kaṁtimaīē vihiyamaṇāē puṭṭhō puṇō vi gaṇahārī । pahu ! kēṇa kāraṇēṇaṁ ēmāivayajōgayā natthi
sō āha majjhimavaē visidvagihidhammacaraṇaō cēva । bhōgaṁtarāyajaṇiyassuvakkamō kammuṇō hōhī
paṇā iṭṭhā bahulōyasammayā visayasōkkhamaṇuhaviḍaṁ । saṁpattaputtabhaṁḍā pacchā paḍivajji ṁ dikkhaṁ
paripāliūṇa vihiṇā ājammaṁ nikkalakapavvajjaṁ । khīṇaghaṇaghāikammā nivvuipuragāmiṇī hōhī
nirukmaṇi sōvakkamāṇi kammāṇi duvihabhēyāṇi । niruvavakamāṇi bhaddē ! narasēha naravaridassa
sōvakkamāī jaha sui suhāē bhōgaṁtarāiyaṁ baddhaṁ । taṁ kusalakammajōgā khavijjaē aṁtarā cēva
kaṁtimaīē bhaṇiyaṁ narasēharanaravarassa kammāi । niruvakkamāī kaha kahasu maha pasāyaṁ karēūṇa
aha bhaṇai puṁḍarīō jai tē kōūhalaṁ maṇē atthi । tā suṇasu sāvahāṇā cariyaṁ narasēharanivassa
atthitthajayapasiddhā rayaṇāya ra mēhala vva vararayaṇā । mahimahilāēṁ bhālayalatilayatullāma rapuri vva
nāmēṇa vējayaṁtīpurīpurāṇā payāṇa suhavāsā । narakēsarirāyasuō rāyā narasēharō tattha
gaṁbhīrō bahurayaṇō amukkamērō mahīharāvāsō । rayaṇāyarō vva rēhai auvva mahimō mahīvālō

tassayā kayāī purisā cattāri gahiyavarakhaggā । atthāiyāē paḍihārasūīyā savihamallīṇā

khēmaṁkararāiṇō puttā
raṇasūra-sūra- raṇamuhraṇappaha, bhāyarō sagā savvē । piuṇā rajjē ṭhabiyā bhuyarajjā ēttha saṁpattā
rannā bhaṇiyaṁ giṇhaha rajjāṇi karēi majjha payasēvaṁ । paḍibhaṇiyamaṇēhiṁ taō vinatti dēva ! nisuṇēhi
jai supasaṇṇō dēvō tā amhē aṁgarakkhagē kuṇau । paḍivaṇṇamimaṁ raṇṇā diṇṇō ēkkēkkagō gāmō
tēhi vi mahāpasāō tti bhaṇiyapaḍivaṇṇamēva nivavayaṇaṁ । rayaṇīē ēkkēkkē paharē rakkhati rāyataṇū
ēvaṁ vaccai kālō raṇasūrō niyapaōyaṇavasēṇa । gāmaṁ pai saṁcaliō pattō ya mahāḍavīmajjhē
ētyaṁtarē payaṁḍō rayarēṇubharēṇa bhariyagayaṇayalō । aṁdhāritō disibahumuhāī uddhāīō pavaṇō
maggaṁ mōttūṇa taō raṇasūrō rēṇu rakkhaṇaṭṭhāē । vaḍaviḍavivivaramajjhē pavisittu ṭhiō vigayacēṭṭō
ētyaṁtarē sakhēyaṁ vaḍōvari jōgiṇīṇa saṁlāvaṁ । nisuṇēi añja vihalō divasō amhāṇa vōlīṇō
aṇṇā paḍiṇiyaṁ mā khijjaha khamaha ittaraṁ kālaṁ । āsannā phalariddhī jai aṇukūlō vihī amha
iyarahitaō bhaṇiyaṁ kahaṁ kahaṁ kahasu vimhaō amha । sā bhai saṇiyasaṇiyaṁ sā saṁkā suṇaha jai ēvaṁ
narasēharassa raṇṇō rayaṇīē ajja paḍhamapaharammi । saṁbhāvijjai maraṇaṁ bhuyaṁgamāō maī majjha
tassaṇurāēṇa purō
aṁtēuravēlaittapamuhajaṇō । niyajīviyaniravēkkhō marihī nissaṁsayaṁ cēva
ēyaṁ sōūṇa lahu raṇasūrō valiyaniyagharē pattō । suttō nibbharanihāē jāva atthaṁgaō sūrō
sēvāsamaē caliō khaggaṁ vittūṇa rāyapāsamma । thakkō dīvaṁtariō nipphaṁdōṁ' dinnadiṭṭhīō
ētthaṁtarammi sahasā caliō caṁdōvagō naridassa । raṇasūrēṇa vi diṭṭhō viyāṇa vivaraṁtarē dhūmō
tattō palaṁbamāṇaṁ kayaṁtamuhakuharadāruṇaṁ diṭṭha ṁ । sappassa muhaṁ phuṁkārabhariyabhuvaṇōyaraṁ bhīmaṁ
dakkhattaṇēṇa gihiyasappamuhaṁ tēṇa vāmahatthēṇa । dāhiṇakarēṇa chiṁdiya khittaṁ raṇō karaṁḍammi
khaṁḍākhaṁḍi kāuṁsō uragō tēṇa tammi pakkhittō । nivabhōgaṁgakaraṁḍē kayakajjō jāva uvaviṭṭha
tā dēvīē dēhē kararuhasarasavaṇasannihāṇammi । pēcchai ya ratabiṁdū chijjaṁtabhuyaṁgama vaḍiyaṁ
jai kaha vi divvajōgā rattaṁrattēṇa saṁgayaṁ hōjjā । tā nūṇamavāēṇaṁ hōyavvaṁ dēvadēvīē
ēyaṁ vicitiūṇaṁ raṇasūrēṇaṁ karēṇa sō phusiō । bhaviyavvayā niyōgā raṇṇāsuttēṇa saccaviō
punō paharō sūrō samāgaō jaṁpiyaṁ ca naravaiṇā । kō ēttha jāmaillō sūrēṇa payaṁpiyaṁ ahayaṁ
raṇṇā bhaṇiyaṁ turiyaṁ raṇasūrasiraṁ gahāya āgaccha । sō bhaṇai kiṁ nimittaṁ āha pahū ! kiṁ viyārēṇa ?
sūrō bhaṇai na sakkā raṇasūrasirassa chēyaṇa kāuṁ । jaṁ sō sahassajōhī payaṁḍabhūyadaṁḍakaliyō ya
kiṁ vā viyāriūṇa sahasacciya jē kuṇaṁti kajjāī । pacchā vitaraṇa suhaṁ pacchāyāvēṇa na hu hōi
