<pb n="267"/>

siririsahasā midēsaṇā
sajaṇassa
punnāga - nāga-sīvannisarasasahayārapamuhaviḍavillā
ricchaṁcha-bhalla - saddala - sarahahari-makkaḍakkaṁtā
tattha ya dīhavasvisvikōṭṭarēsu ya mihuṇagaṁ vasai । tassa kaha kaha vi jāō salakkhaṇō sūyagō ēgō
pakkhānilapaidiṇacūṇidāṇaō vaḍhiō ya sō tēhi । thēvōvaladdhanahagamaṇasattijuttōnnadiyahammi
tāvalayāē nīḍā uḍḍattā jāva gaṁtumāraddhō । dubbalapakkhattaṇaō tā paḍiō addhamaggammi
taddēsamā gaēhi gahiō sō tāvasēhi kōḍḍēṇa । nīō niyayāvāsaṁ karāviō sayalakalagahaṇaṁ
tihi vārammi pasatthē miliūṇaṁ muṇikumārayajaṇēṇa । suganāsō tti salīlaṁ paṭṭiyaṁ nāyamēyassa
tammōhamōhiyāiṁ jaṇaṇī - jaṇayāṇi tassa tatthēva । āgaṁtūṇa ṭhiyāī suyavayaṇā lōyaṇaparāī
ēvaṁ vaccai kālō anna diṇē suṇai sūyagō ēvaṁ । vakkhāṇaṁ kulavaiṇā kōraṁtaṁ tāva
jalahijalamajjhayārē harimēlō nāma atthi varadīvō । sahayārapāyavō atthi tassa īsāṇa kōṇammi
dēvāsuranara- kinnara -
vijjāharamihuṇasēviyacchāō । amiyaphalō amiēṇaṁ sittō mūlāō dēvēhi
dēvāṇubhāva ucciya tassa phalaṁ jōhajīvaī jīvō । tassa jarā rōgā vi hu nāsaṁti puṇannavō hōi
sōūṇa imaṁ vayaṇaṁ suyanāsō sūryagō vicitēi । atthi maha gamaṇasattī jarābhibhūyāṇi jaṇagāṇi
gaṁtūṇa tattha dīvē sahaya । raphalā ṇi dōnni āṇēmi । niyajaṇaṇījaṇayāṇaṁ rōgaṁ ca jaraṁ ca nāsēmi
saṁpattajōvvaṇō jō na viṇīō hōi jaṇaṇi jaṇayāṇa । kiṁ tēṇa jaṇaṇijōvvaṇaviuḍaṇamēttēṇa puttēṇa
iya citiūṇa caliō kamēṇa pattō maṇicchiyaṁ ṭhāṇaṁ । darapakkā daḍhabaṁdhā duaṁbayāmaṁjarī gahiyā
valiō calaṁtapakkhauḍajaṇiyagurukhēyakhēiyasarīrō । gamaṇāsattō saṁtō jalahijalē nivaḍiō sahasā
ētthatarammi diṭṭhō samuddadattēṇa pōyavaṇiēna । taddēsamāgaṇaṁ gahiō saṁjāyakaruṇa
bhaṇiō ya sō suēṇaṁ uvayārī jīviyappayāṇēṇa । majjha tumaṁ kiṁ kīrai paccuvayārē na mē sattī
tahavihu hasu aṁbayamēgaṁ mā kuṇasu patthaṇaṁ vihalaṁ । valipaliya rōgaja raharaṇapaccalaṁ diṭṭhamāhappaṁ
jāīē cēva tiriō ēsō kammēhiṁ supurisasamāṇō । īya citiūṇa gahiyaṁ samuddadattēṇa aṁbaphalaṁ
laṁghittu lahuṁ jalahiṁ sugō gaō jaṇaṇi-jaṇayapāsammi । vaṇiō vihu vijayapuraṁ pattō khēmēṇa kusalēṇa
bhariūṇa thālamēgaṁ maṇi- mōttiyapavaravatthamāīṇaṁ । thālōvari tamaṁbaṁ mōttūṇa gaō nivasagāsē
naravaipāyāṇa purō thālaṁ mōttūṇa vihiyapaṇivāō । uciyāsaṇē nisaṇṇō puṭṭhō kusalaṁ nariṁdēṇa
īsi hasiūṇa bhaṇiō raṇṇā kiṁ ēttha aṁbayā natthi । vaṇiṇā kahiō savvō jahaṭṭiō vaiyarō tassa
vimhiyamaṇēṇa suciraṁ tamaṁbayaṁ pēkkhiyaṁ' nariṁdēṇa । sammāṇiūṇa sēṭṭhī visajjiō niyayagēhammi
phalamēgaṁ parivārō bahuō mahavallahō ya tā nūṇaṁ । ēgāgiṇō na juttaṁ bhōttuṁ accabbhuyaṁ vatyuṁ
jaō-
dēvagurusaṁvibhattaṁ dinaṁ suhisayaṇabaṁdhavajaṇāṇa । jaṁ bhujjai taṁ bhuttaṁ sēsaṁ uyaraggivijjhavaṇaṁ
iya citiūṇa bhaṇiyā purisā rōvēi bīyamēyassa । pālēha payattēṇa jā phalai kahēha tā majjha
tēhiṁ vi tava vihiyaṁ jāō aṁbō namaṁtasāhālō । darapikkaphalō rammō rakkhijjai paurapurisēhi
kaha kaha vipaṇapayaṁ phalamēgaṁ nivaḍiyaṁ taō turiyaṁ । rayaṇīē visaraṇaṁ khaddhaṁ visabhāviyaṁ jāyaṁ
1 pulaiyaṁ pā0 । 2 aha jē0 ।

268
'jugāijiṇidacariya
daṭṭhaṇaṁ paccūsē paḍhamaphalaṁ nivaḍiyaṁ pamōēna । ghēttūṇa gayā purisā naravaiṇō pāyamūlammi
sāṇaṁdamāṇasēṇaṁ raṇṇā uvarōhiyassa taṁ diṣṇaṁ । tēṇa vi bhuttaṁtarasā paṁcattaṁ pāviō vippō
savisāō naranāhō sahāsamakkhaṁ payaṁpiuṁ laggō । na hu hōi amayarukkhō visarukkhō ēsa maraṇaphalō
rē dhā dhā dhāvaha nisiyakuhāḍē gahāyavēgēṇa । āmūlaṁ taṁ chiṁdaha visarukkhaṁ kiṁ viyārēṇa !
tēhi vivachinna āhaō vāṇiō mahīvaiṇa ॥ rē pāva pāva ! pāhuḍamuvaṇitō kaha na lajjihasi
pariṇāmiyabuddhīē dīhaṁ daṭṭhūṇa tēṇa vaṇiēṇa । bhaṇiō rāyā naravara ! nahavai visapāyavō ēsa
āṇēha phalaṁ ēga nivaḍiyarukkhāō jēṇa daṁsēmi । sāmissa paccayaṁ sayalalōyapaccakkhamihaṁ pi
naravaivayaṇēṇa lahuṁ phalamēgaṁ ghēttumāgaō purisō । jarajinnō saḍiyataṇuṁ mariumaṇō āṇiō purisō
taṁ tassa phalaṁ dinaṁ jhaḍa tti sō rōgavajjiō jāō । saṁjāyapaccaēṇaṁ visūriyaṁ naravariṁdēṇa
aviyāriyakajjakarō jaha sō naranāha sōiuṁ laggō । taha mā tumaṁ pi pacchā pacchāyāvēṇa ijjhisi
vōlīṇō jāmō jāmiṇīē vīō samāgaō taiō । gahiyanisiyaggakhaggō saṁpattī raṇamūhō tattha
ghaḍiyā saddēṇa nivō paḍibuddhō bhagaḥ kōvarattacchō । rē raṇasūrassa siraṁ ghēttūṇa lahuṁ samāgaccha
ki avaraddhamaṇēṇaṁ bhaṇai nivō tujjha kiṁ viyārēṇa ? । sō āha maha na sajjhō raṇasūrabhaḍassa sirachēō
aviyāriūṇa kajjaṁ kīrataṁ dēi dāruṇaṁ dukkhaṁ । suṇa sāvahāṇahiyaō sāmiya ! akkhāṇayaṁ ēē
vissapurē vissaṁbhara rāyā savvatthapāyaḍapayāvō । aṇṇadiṇē hēḍāūyavaṇiēṇa samappiō turaō
ārūḍhō naranāhō hēlāē haō pahāviō turiyaṁ । dhārijjatō vēgaṁ giṇhai vivarīyasikkhō vva
ēsa gaō ēsa gaō ēsō jāi tti jaṁpiranarāṇa । maṇapavaṇajaiṇavēgō jhaḍatti addaṁsaṇī hūō
bahurukkhasauṇasāvayaghūya ghukkāratā sajaṇaṇāē
aidulahabhattapāṇiyapaṇaṭṭhajiyajīviyāsāē
chūḍhō mahāḍavīē naranāhō tēṇa duṭṭaturaēṇa । khinnō millai vaggaṁ ṭhiō haō sō vi uttiṣṇō
niyasāmi dōhakāri tti kaliyapāṇēhiṁ sō harī mukkō । rāyā vi saṇiya saṇiyaṁ vaḍapāyavamēgamallīṇō
sahā chuhā kilaṁtō jā ciṭṭhai naravarō tahiṁ tāva । pēcchai vaḍasāhāō jalabiṁdu nivaḍamāṇaṁ sō
vaḍapāyavapattēhiṁ puḍayaṁ kāūṇa muyai tasē । daramariyapuḍē bhamirō pavaṁgamō kaha vi saṁpattō
 । 
jāva karē kāūṇaṁ payaṁpiyāmi tti vavasiō rāyā । tā tēṇa pavagēṇa bhūmīē pāḍiō puḍaō
ārūḍhō vaḍasāhāē vānarō naravaī vi savilakkhō । ghēttūṇa puṇō millai pattapuḍaṁ tammi ṭhāṇammi
bhariyaṁ puṇō vi giṇhai puṇō vi sō vānarō pavāḍē । ēvaṁ ca tiṣṇi vārāē cautthavārāē parikuviō
citas rāyā kō ēsa vairiō majjha avayarai ēvaṁ । parisusiyatālu - galayaṁ mayaṁ pi maṁ māriō mahai
ēga va dō va tiṇṇi va bārāō khamijja jō khamī hōjja । vāraṁvāraṁ avayārakāriṇaṁ kōṇumarisējja ?
jai kaha vi puṇō vigdhaṁ kāhī mah ēsa vānarō pāvō । tā taha kaha vi karissaṁ jahā samappiti ālīō
puṇaravi mukkō raṇṇā puṇaravi payapūriō puḍō jāō । jā girahai puhaivaī tāva harī jhatti ōiṇṇāṁ
naravaikarāō dhuṇiuṁ bhūmīē nivāḍiō puḍō' hariṇā । parikuviyanariṁdēṇaṁ haō harī tikkhachuriyāē

bhaṇa dēva !
sumariyapuvvabhavēṇaṁ lihiya miṇaṁ vānarēṇa savisāyaṁ । mā pibasu vaccha ! salilaṁ ayagaramuhaniggayaṁ ēvaṁ
puvvabhavē tujjha piyā rāyā raṇasēharō ahaṁ āsi । kammavasā mariūṇa aḍavīē vānarō jāō
vānara lihiyaṁ daṭṭhūṇa naravaijāyagaruyanivvēō । niyacariyaṁ nidaṁtō vunnamaṇō dukhiō jāō
khaṇamēttēṇa vimukkā pāṇēhiṁ pavaṁgamō marēūṇa । paḍhamanikāē juimaṁ mahiḍḍhiō vaṇayarō jāō
rāyā vi jāva picchai taṁ ṭhāṇaṁ tāva natthi sō biṁdū । ṭhāṇaṁtarē paḍatō diṭṭhō sō vimhiyamaṇēṇa
jā niyai uvari huttaṁ tā pēcchai ayagaraṁ mahāghōraṁ । tassa muhāō paḍataṁ lāla salilaṁ pibībhacchaṁ
ētthaṁtarammi tarasā payamagulaggā samāgayā sēṇā । pīyaṁ pāṇaṁ bhuttaṁ ca bhōyaṇaṁ naravariṁdēṇaṁ
ēsō ayagararuvēṇa kō vi maha vēriō mahāpāvō । iya ciṁtiūṇa raṇṇā sō vihu saṁpāviō nihaṇaṁ
ahaha maha bālavilasiyamahaha kahaṁ nigghiṇaṁ vihiyamēyaṁ । ēgaṁtahiō jīviyadāyā jaṁ ghāīō pavagō
na tahā maha vasaṇamiṇaṁ kammavasā nivaḍiyaṁ dahai dēhaṁ । jaha nikkāraṇamāraṇakaraṇaṁ hariṇō duhaṁ dēi
tāsu viyāriyakaraṇaṁ suhamaulaṁ dēva ! dēi jīvāṇaṁ । aviyāriyakaraṇaṁ puṇa paē paē dēi dukkhāī
taiē vi vōlī paharē turiē samāgaē pattō । karagahiya divva khaggō raṇappahō rāyapāsammi
ētthaṁtarammi paḍhiyaṁ muhamaṁgalapāḍhaēṇa purisēṇa । jō sahai na sō purisō parābhavaṁ nīyalōyāṇa
purisapayāhayadhūlī vi kuṇai kēsaggahaṁ lahuṁ cēva । sō tīē vina hu tullō parābhavē jō samāsatthō
taṁ suṇiya bhai rāyā kō paharē ēttha majjha saṁnihiō' । viṇayavihiyaṁjalīō raṇappahō bhaṇai
rē ! raṇasūrasarīraṁ khaṁḍākhaṁḍi karēha maha puraō । jēṇa disidēvayāṇaṁ dēmi bali niyayahatthēṇa
raṇasūrō raṇasūrī khalī kaō kēsari vva dujjōhō । mā hu karējja pamāyaṁ ruddhā rayaṇīē dēvassa
tā uggayammi sūrē hya-gaya-raha- jōhajaṇiyapaḍirakkha' । kāūṇa sāmisāla pacchā taṁ māraissāmi
nisuṇēha tāva ēgaṁ kahāṇayaṁ jaṁ suyaṁ maē dēva ! । ēgammi purē kulaputtayassa bhajjā yā naulī ya
samamēva pasūyāōṁ parōpparaṁ paramapīijuttāō । puttāṇa vi tāṇa daḍhaṁ annānnaṁ vaṛḍhai pīī
vaccatēsu diṇēsu niyadharavāvāra vāvaḍā jāyā । kulaputtassaya ghariṇī puttaṁ maṁtrīē mōttūrṇa
putta naulō ya duvē kīlaṁtā jāva tattha ciṭṭhēti । tā vubbhaḍajamabhaḍa bhiuḍibhīsaṇō āgaō sappō
vubbhaḍajamabhaḍabhiuḍibhīsaṇō
khaiūṇa tayaṁ ḍibhaṁ valamāṇō naulaēṇa savvaviō । dhāvitu taō ruddhō sayakhaṁḍō sō kaō tēṇa
ruhirāvalittavayaṇō kulaputtayabhāriyāē sō puraō । tuha puttamāragō māriō tti cāḍūṇi pakarēi
ruhirāvalittatuṁḍaṁ ta daṭhṭhē sā gayā suyasamōvē । diṭṭhō paṁcattagaō puttō aha tīē kōvēṇa
musalēṇa haō naulō sō vi maō takkhaṇā tahi ṭhāṇē । pacchā diṭṭhō sappō khaṁḍākhaṁḍi kaō tattha
pacchāyāvēṇa taō tīē maṇē dāruṇaṁ mahādukkhaṁ । saṁjāyaṁ tattha khaṇē suyamaraṇāō vi amahiyaṁ
tā paḍhamaṁ kōvavasē jā buddhī hōi sā na kāyavvā । kiṁpāgaphalāṇaṁ piva na suṁdarō tīē pariṇāmō
ēvaṁ bhaṇiūṇa ṭhiō raṇappahī jāva tāva rayaṇī vi । rōṇō akayasuhāṇa va maṇōrahāhiyayamajjhammi
māgahajaṇamaṁgalatūrasaddasavaṇēṇa bōhiō rāyā । kayapābhāiyakiccō vimaṇamaṇō ciṭṭhaē jāva

<pb n="270"/>

270
jugāijidicariyaṁ
tāvāgaō turaṁtō vimalamaī nāmarāyabaramaṁtī । viṇaēṇa paṇamiūṇaṁ rāyāṇaṁ bhaṇiumāḍhattō
dēva ! raṇasūrabhiccō dēvaṁ viṣṇavas tumha payapuraō । jai khuṭṭō navakhaṁḍa attāṇaṁ attaṇā kāha
raṇṇā bhaṇiyaṁ āṇēha āṇiō namiya bhaṇai naranāhaṁ । kiṁ nikkāraṇakōvō kīrai amhārisāṇurvāra
raṇṇā bhaṇiyaṁ paccakkhadaṁsaṇē kamakāraṇē kōvō । sō āha sayaṁ sāmiya ! bhōgaṁgakaraṁḍayaṁ pēccha
diṭṭhō karaṁḍamajjhē khaṁḍākhaṁḍī kaō mahāsappō । vimhiyamaṇēṇa puṭṭhō raṇṇā kō ēsa paramatthō
āmūlāō savvō vi sāhiō vaīyarō naridassa । tuṭṭhō rāyā diṇṇaṁ vatthāharaṇāiyaṁ tassa
sāmaṁta-maṁti-bhaḍa - bhōiyāulē maṁḍavē nisaṇṇassa । ujjāṇāō purisō samāgaō suṁdarō nāma
dēva ! tuha malayatilaē ujjāṇē sūriṇō samōsariyā । bahusamaṇasaṁghasahiyā bahussuyā sutthiyā nāma
sakkāriūṇa purisō visajjiō appaṇā saparivārō । gayakhaṁdhasamārūḍhō caliō guruvaṁdaṇaṭṭhāē
aha tipayāhiṇapuvvaṁ sutthiyasūri namēvi naranāhō । uciyāsaṇē nisaṇṇō dhammaṁ sōuṁ samāḍhatō
bhō bhō bhavvā ! nisuṇēha dhammasavvassamappaṇō patthaṁ । bhāvāṇusāraō cciya sahalaṁ savvamaṇudvāṇaṁ
tā sujhāvasuddhī kāyavvā hōi sayalajōgēsu । sō puṇa kasāyakalusiyacittassa na jāyaē niyamā
nīyāṇa nayaṇa - vayaṇēsu vasai dēhēsu majjhimanarāṇa । uttimanarāṇa kōvō kālēṇa phalēṇa nivvaḍai
savvuttimapurisāṇaṁ hōṁti kasāyā na cēva kaiyā vi । aha huṁti maraṁti maṇē maṇayaṁ pina pāyaḍā huṁti
jaō--
dhannāṇaṁ khu kasāyā jagaḍijjatā vi parakasāēhiṁ । nēcchati samuṭṭhēuṁ suniviṭṭhō paṁgulō cētra
sijjhati sayalakajjāī tassa purisassa atthasārāī । rōsō suraṁgadhūli vva jassa na hu pāyaḍō hōi
kalusaphalēṇa na jujjai ki cōjjaṁ jaṁ ihaṁ vigayarāgō । saṁtē vi jō kasāē nigiṇhaī sō vi tattulō
kōhaṁ khamāē māṇaṁ ca maddavēṇajjavēṇa māyaṁ ca । saṁtōsēṇa ya lōhaṁ haṇēi jai sivasuhēcchā bhē

abbhatthiyā' viva kā tucchā payaīē bīyacaṁda vva । bhīrusuṇaga vva bhagā masagō viva tikkhatuṁḍālā
pisuṇā tā tāṇa bhatthaṇā vi vihalā na tīē maha kajjaṁ । atthāṇa patthaṇā jaṁ garuyāṇa vi dēi lahuyattaṁ
tā jamihā saṁbaddhaṁ chaṁdālaṁkāravajjiyaṁ jaṁ ca । jaṁ siddhaṁtaviruddhaṁ suyaṇā sōhitu taṁ savvaṁ
siddhatasārakusalā khamaṁtu suyadēvayā vi maha khamaō । jaṁ ḍibhavihiyadumbilasiya ēsu garuyā na
vikkramanivakālāō saēkkārasēsu sasu । siri jayasiṁharnāradē rajjaṁ paripāliya tammi
khaṁbhāyatthaṭṭiēhiṁ siyapakkhē cittavijayadasamīē । pussēṇaṁ suraguruṇā samatthiyaṁ cariyamēyaṁ
